story:
MAGNETIPS are an innovative set of Gel Pens - each has been combined with super strong Neodymium Magnets to create a pen set with incredible features.

Each pen in our sets will attract one another, allowing you to draw in new and creative ways, and when not used for writing and colouring they will completely transform the way you use pens and the look of your desktop. 

 

Scroll down to find out what makes our pens so different... 

 

 The new Magnetips Gel Edition uses the same cheerful colour palette as in our original set. We have carefully chosen 20 vibrant tones which not only look great on paper but also have a strong visual effect when combined together on you desk.

  For the new Gel Edition, we will be using a fast-dry water based Gel inks. We have patiently calibrated the tones to match as closely as possible to our existing pallet and the pen body colour.

We have successfully tested a pre-production batch and the feedback from users was absolutely great!

The 0.7 mm stainless steel Rollerball tip provides a smooth writing experience and the gel ink has a great flow which allows for fast, easy and accurate colouring.

 

The refill tip is carefully made to the highest precision. That means that the new pens can be left open for over a week without drying out. 

 MAGNETIPS are constructed from durable ABS plastic and are easily refillable by simply unscrewing the pen body and inserting a new refill. Over their lifetime, we estimated that MAGNETIPS can produce over 60% less waste than normal disposable colouring pen.

 

 

Magnetips can enhance your creativity-you can use them as normal pens for colouring , drawing, writing and doodling, but the real magic happens when they come together thanks to the strong magnets- magnetips will help you create beautiful artwork without the need for any other instruments.

To further enhance the Magnetips experience, we designed them to interact with metallic chrome balls and provide endless possibilities for creative play and fidget that will help you concentrate.

Each of our pens has uniquely design conceived ends which fits the Chrome Balls and enhance the ability for building by adding a super flexible moving joint to your creations. 

 The Balls will attract strongly to the magnets and have a durable Chrome finish which will not easily rust. 

By adding magnets to our pens we actually created one of the worlds most satisfying fidget pens!

Magnetips can help you fidget and play at your desk - great for stress relieving, regaining your focus and for boosting your attention levels after long hours at work. 

We have only put forth a few examples...but we're sure you can come up with your own ways to fidget and play!

 

  We want MAGNETIPS to be the centrepiece of you desktop. This is why we have decided to make our pens in two distinct finishes-Colour finish and Matt black finish-to suit every taste and any room style. Both editions are made from the same durable materials and are refillable.

We know it's a hard choice...but you can simply pre-order both...

*Both Editions write in 20 colours and use the same refills.

 By making a pledge today, you get an amazing discount over the retail price of MAGNETIPS products!

Once you have selected your chosen rewards-simply click on the corresponding box on the REWARDS part of the campaign page.

 

 Interested in featuring our pens?

To get our full press kit and high-res. photos please write to: press@magnetips.co
story_txt:
MAGNETIPS are an innovative set of Gel Pens - each has been combined with super strong Neodymium Magnets to create a pen set with incredible features.

Each pen in our sets will attract one another, allowing you to draw in new and creative ways, and when not used for writing and colouring they will completely transform the way you use pens and the look of your desktop. 
....Very satisfying
 In each pen, we are using two super strong Axially Magnetised Rare-Earth Neodymium Magnets - one of the strongest and most permanent types in existence.
The magnet in the pen lid and the magnet in the pen body are fixed in opposite polarities. This ensures the lid will always be attracted to the pen body. 

Never lose your pen cap again...
On average,  Neodymium magnets will only lose less than 1% of their strength over 10 years. They won't even lose their strength if they are held in repelling or attracting positions with other magnets over long periods of time, So your pens will keep their unique properties for a very long time.
 
Scroll down to find out what makes our pens so different... 
 



 




 The new Magnetips Gel Edition uses the same cheerful colour palette as in our original set. We have carefully chosen 20 vibrant tones which not only look great on paper but also have a strong visual effect when combined together on you desk.

 

  For the new Gel Edition, we will be using a fast-dry water based Gel inks. We have patiently calibrated the tones to match as closely as possible to our existing pallet and the pen body colour.
We have successfully tested a pre-production batch and the feedback from users was absolutely great!

The 0.7 mm stainless steel Rollerball tip provides a smooth writing experience and the gel ink has a great flow which allows for fast, easy and accurate colouring.

 
The refill tip is carefully made to the highest precision. That means that the new pens can be left open for over a week without drying out. 

Fast-dry ink means fewer smears when writing and colouring
 

 MAGNETIPS are constructed from durable ABS plastic and are easily refillable by simply unscrewing the pen body and inserting a new refill. Over their lifetime, we estimated that MAGNETIPS can produce over 60% less waste than normal disposable colouring pen.
 

Easily refillable pen structure
 

We want every desk in the world to look stunning. That's what we had in mind when we first created MAGNETIPS.

 


 With our pens, you can easily transform the look of your desktop in seconds and become more organised.

They will stick together, or to any metallic surface with ease, and can double as a stunning desktop organiser when not used for drawing. 

 

 

 
 


Magnetips can enhance your creativity-you can use them as normal pens for colouring , drawing, writing and doodling, but the real magic happens when they come together thanks to the strong magnets- magnetips will help you create beautiful artwork without the need for any other instruments.




To further enhance the Magnetips experience, we designed them to interact with metallic chrome balls and provide endless possibilities for creative play and fidget that will help you concentrate.
Each of our pens has uniquely design conceived ends which fits the Chrome Balls and enhance the ability for building by adding a super flexible moving joint to your creations. 


 

 


 


 The Balls will attract strongly to the magnets and have a durable Chrome finish which will not easily rust. 

  
Invent new and beautiful ways to keep MAGNETIPS on your desk



 

By adding magnets to our pens we actually created one of the worlds most satisfying fidget pens!
Magnetips can help you fidget and play at your desk - great for stress relieving, regaining your focus and for boosting your attention levels after long hours at work. 
We have only put forth a few examples...but we're sure you can come up with your own ways to fidget and play!

 

 


  We want MAGNETIPS to be the centrepiece of you desktop. This is why we have decided to make our pens in two distinct finishes-Colour finish and Matt black finish-to suit every taste and any room style. Both editions are made from the same durable materials and are refillable.
We know it's a hard choice...but you can simply pre-order both...
*Both Editions write in 20 colours and use the same refills.

Colour Edition pen Vs Black Edition pen

*You can mix the caps between the Black and the colour editions to achieve a new look for your pens


 By making a pledge today, you get an amazing discount over the retail price of MAGNETIPS products!
Once you have selected your chosen rewards-simply click on the corresponding box on the REWARDS part of the campaign page.
 

 


 


 
 
 Interested in featuring our pens?
To get our full press kit and high-res. photos please write to: press@magnetips.co

story:
This famous Japanese katana-style paper knife is something known within the sword industry as a Japanese sword made with the "Gifu Prefecture Seki-city" design.

These Japanese Katana-style paper knives are made in the image of the katanas which famous heroes used during the warring states in the Sengoku period of Japan's history.

Created by skilful edged tool craftsmen, each blade is created one by one giving it superb sharpness, not only is the design top-notch but also the functionality.

※ Please note that although the sheath shown in these pictures is black, this was a limited-time offer for a separate site. The sheath for this sword will come in red.

Featured in all of these different publications

We have 3 different types of these katana paper cutting knives; The first is a katana that was used near the end of the Edo era by the shogunate police and military force, a sword used by Hijikata Toshizou. Secondly, we have Sakamoto Ryoma's sword who was a hero of the Edo era. Finally, we have the third design, Oda Nobunaga's sword who was a huge figure in the Sengoku era and is known across the world.

【Katana Paper Knife Hijikata Toshizou Model "Izumi no Kami Kenesada"】

Hijikata Toshizou; also called the "Demon of the shogunate" by his colleagues, had a favourite sword by the name of "Izumi no Kami Kenesada", with both the blade itself and the sheath in mind, we have created this product with utmost care and attention to detail. We worked together with the Hijikata Toshizou Museum in Tokyo's Hino City to create a sword that has an uncanny resemblance to the original.

Sheath: Wild Boar and Pheonix

Blade: Hamon Pattern (Sanbonsugi), Izumi no Kami Kenesada Seal (Marking)

(Joint-creation alongside the Hijikata Toshizou Museum)

(Submitted by the Hijikata Toshizou Museum)

【Katana Paper Knife Sakamoto Ryoma Model "Mutsunokamiyoshiyuki"】

Sakamoto Ryoma, a man who after leaving Tosa which was in the Kōchi prefecture, changed Japan's history hugely by forming the Satchō alliance as well as helping with the restoration of the imperial rule. He had a beloved sword called "Mutsunokamiyoshiyuki", which, just like all of our katana's, has had great care taken in the attention to detail of both the blade and the sheath. 

Sheath: Pebbled red accent

Blade: Double bladed pattern, Mutsunokamiyoshiyuki seal (Marking)

(Sakamoto Ryoma Memorial Museum Offer)

【Katana Paper Knife Oda Nobunaga Model "Heshikiri-Hasebe "】

In the Sengoku period of Japan, when the whole country was devided, Oda Nobunaga, who was known for expanding his territory unresisted, had a beloved sword called "Heshikiri-Hasebe", it is this sword and its sheath that we have studied and designed this final model around.
The sheath is a 2-tone black and gold. You can almost feel Oda Nobunaga's majesty.

Sheath: Black, Gold

Blade: Ripple pattern crest, Heshikiri-Hasebe seal (Marking)

(C) Suwabara Hiroyuki / Seven Continents

<Characteristic 1>

These famously known paper knives are created one by one with great detail by edged-tool craftsman, thanks to this, they have a sharpness unrivalled by any other product.
These knives with their sharp cutting strength and durability have been "tempered" which is a method also used in the creation of Japanese swords.

PLEASE NOTE:  DUE TO THE NATURE AND TRAIT OF THE PAPER KNIVES, THE SHARPNESS HAS BEEN SLIGHTLY DULLED IN COMPARISON TO OTHER EDGED TOOLS, WE ASK FOR YOUR UNDERSTANDING OF THIS MATTER. 

※ The craftsman sharpening the edges with great skill and precision.

Through just owning a single one of these, you will be able to cut open letters and packages at home or at your office with great ease.

<Characteristic 2>

Thanks to the included stand, by placing the paper-knife on top of your desk, it acts as a great addition to your interior design giving off a cool air to it.
For people who really want to own a Japanese sword but always think "I don't know where to put it!" or "I can only put it in a Japanese-styled room!", by owning one of these paper-knives, you can place this anywhere to enjoy that "Japanese feel" whilst also getting the usefulness of the product, there is no doubt this product will be useful in your everyday life.

※The mat and backdrop are not included with the product.

 

【Nail Clipper Oda Nobunaga (Heshikiri-Hasebe) Model】

High-quality nail clippers which an edged-blade craftsman has painstakingly created in the image of Oda Nobunaga's beloved sword "Heshikiri-Hasebe". Through sliding the lever section, you can see the Oda Family Crest inside of the clippers giving you an even further sense of high-quality and attention-to-detail. 

These nail clippers are sharper than any you've owned before, allowing you to maintain your nails at a greater precision which you have never experienced before now.

【Paper Knife Washitsu (Japanese-style room) set】

Use this Washitsu-style room set to show off your paper knife's beauty and elegance.

There are 4 different pictures of the 4 seasons in Japan placed into the back of the room allowing you to change them to match the current season.
Furthermore, you can even place your family photos, photos of your children, or any other picture you would like allowing you to match the piece to any room in your house.
On top of all this, it comes with an LED lamp which you can turn on and off using the switch allowing you to light up the background image beautifully for ambience.

Included in the set is a paper knife of your choice, the miniature washitsu room, a horizontal stand for your knife and it's sheath, pictures of the 4 seasons of Japan and 3 AA batteries.

When cutting envelopes and such during your everyday life, simply cutting it with your typical paper-knife is boring and has no excitement what-so-ever, using this as our reason, we decided we wanted to make something that was fun to use when even doing a mundane task such as cutting open an envelope.

It was then that we thought about the beloved swords that many famous samurais used to have, if we used those, then you would be able to be excited when cutting open things and have a better sense of fulfilment afterwards.

Our company has been active in the city of Seki which sits within the Gifu Prefecture for over 70 years, creating mainly scissors and paper-knives.

We have created various different types such as office scissors, kitchen scissors, industrial scissors, tailor scissors, and many more, through following our customers' wishes, we have released many original products.

In more recent years, we have been able to strengthen our brand, and further polish our product quality and design.

Q1: Are there any dangers with using these sharp blades?

A1: Due to the product being created for use as a paper-knife, it is very good at cutting through papers. If used for its intended purpose there should be no issue of injuries to your finger or hand, however, we ask that you never swing the blade around or use it carelessly.

Q2: What materials are being used?

A2: We are using stainless steel which is used often on edged tools due to its ability to be tempered. Stainless steel, when compared to iron is very good at not rusting, however, if the product gets wet or is left inside of liquid for long periods of time there are chances of it rusting, so we ask that you take care in those regards. When using the product as a typical paper-knife, there should be no rusting.

Q3: Can we use this to cut cardboard boxes also?

A3: Due to this product being made for use in cutting paper, we ask that you try to avoid using it to cut thicker materials such as cardboard. There are chances of the blade breaking or bending, so we ask that you try to use it only for its intended purpose of cutting things such as envelopes.

Q4: What is the size of the knife?

A4: Its entire length is around 21cm, the same as your typical paper-knife.

Q5: What is the length of the blade itself?

A5: Around 20cm.

Through just owning one of our paper-knives, you are able to go about your everyday life in a more fun manner.

Furthermore, we believe this product can be used not only as a present for your friends but to your special someone as well.

We are praying for your support, and hope that in the future we can release more designs of swords from various famous swordsmen throughout Japanese history.

We look forward to hearing your opinions and receiving your support.
story_txt: This famous Japanese katana-style paper knife is something known within the sword industry as a Japanese sword made with the "Gifu Prefecture Seki-city" design.These Japanese Katana-style paper knives are made in the image of the katanas which famous heroes used during the warring states in the Sengoku period of Japan's history.Created by skilful edged tool craftsmen, each blade is created one by one giving it superb sharpness, not only is the design top-notch but also the functionality.※ Please note that although the sheath shown in these pictures is black, this was a limited-time offer for a separate site. The sheath for this sword will come in red.Featured in all of these different publicationsWe have 3 different types of these katana paper cutting knives; The first is a katana that was used near the end of the Edo era by the shogunate police and military force, a sword used by Hijikata Toshizou. Secondly, we have Sakamoto Ryoma's sword who was a hero of the Edo era. Finally, we have the third design, Oda Nobunaga's sword who was a huge figure in the Sengoku era and is known across the world.【Katana Paper Knife Hijikata Toshizou Model "Izumi no Kami Kenesada"】Hijikata Toshizou; also called the "Demon of the shogunate" by his colleagues, had a favourite sword by the name of "Izumi no Kami Kenesada", with both the blade itself and the sheath in mind, we have created this product with utmost care and attention to detail. We worked together with the Hijikata Toshizou Museum in Tokyo's Hino City to create a sword that has an uncanny resemblance to the original.Sheath: Wild Boar and PheonixBlade: Hamon Pattern (Sanbonsugi), Izumi no Kami Kenesada Seal (Marking)(Joint-creation alongside the Hijikata Toshizou Museum)(Submitted by the Hijikata Toshizou Museum)【Katana Paper Knife Sakamoto Ryoma Model "Mutsunokamiyoshiyuki"】Sakamoto Ryoma, a man who after leaving Tosa which was in the Kōchi prefecture, changed Japan's history hugely by forming the Satchō alliance as well as helping with the restoration of the imperial rule. He had a beloved sword called "Mutsunokamiyoshiyuki", which, just like all of our katana's, has had great care taken in the attention to detail of both the blade and the sheath. Sheath: Pebbled red accentBlade: Double bladed pattern, Mutsunokamiyoshiyuki seal (Marking)(Sakamoto Ryoma Memorial Museum Offer)【Katana Paper Knife Oda Nobunaga Model "Heshikiri-Hasebe "】In the Sengoku period of Japan, when the whole country was devided, Oda Nobunaga, who was known for expanding his territory unresisted, had a beloved sword called "Heshikiri-Hasebe", it is this sword and its sheath that we have studied and designed this final model around.The sheath is a 2-tone black and gold. You can almost feel Oda Nobunaga's majesty.Sheath: Black, GoldBlade: Ripple pattern crest, Heshikiri-Hasebe seal (Marking)(C) Suwabara Hiroyuki / Seven Continents<Characteristic 1>These famously known paper knives are created one by one with great detail by edged-tool craftsman, thanks to this, they have a sharpness unrivalled by any other product.These knives with their sharp cutting strength and durability have been "tempered" which is a method also used in the creation of Japanese swords.PLEASE NOTE:  DUE TO THE NATURE AND TRAIT OF THE PAPER KNIVES, THE SHARPNESS HAS BEEN SLIGHTLY DULLED IN COMPARISON TO OTHER EDGED TOOLS, WE ASK FOR YOUR UNDERSTANDING OF THIS MATTER. ※ The craftsman sharpening the edges with great skill and precision.Through just owning a single one of these, you will be able to cut open letters and packages at home or at your office with great ease.<Characteristic 2>Thanks to the included stand, by placing the paper-knife on top of your desk, it acts as a great addition to your interior design giving off a cool air to it.For people who really want to own a Japanese sword but always think "I don't know where to put it!" or "I can only put it in a Japanese-styled room!", by owning one of these paper-knives, you can place this anywhere to enjoy that "Japanese feel" whilst also getting the usefulness of the product, there is no doubt this product will be useful in your everyday life.※The mat and backdrop are not included with the product. 【Nail Clipper Oda Nobunaga (Heshikiri-Hasebe) Model】High-quality nail clippers which an edged-blade craftsman has painstakingly created in the image of Oda Nobunaga's beloved sword "Heshikiri-Hasebe". Through sliding the lever section, you can see the Oda Family Crest inside of the clippers giving you an even further sense of high-quality and attention-to-detail. These nail clippers are sharper than any you've owned before, allowing you to maintain your nails at a greater precision which you have never experienced before now.【Paper Knife Washitsu (Japanese-style room) set】Use this Washitsu-style room set to show off your paper knife's beauty and elegance.There are 4 different pictures of the 4 seasons in Japan placed into the back of the room allowing you to change them to blades?A1: Due to the product being created for use as a paper-knife, it is very good at cutting through papers. story:
“They" had problems with this specific site  (blame Java problems)

Got to http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/fusion-powered-car-part-2/x/2450189 for current site

 

The hope of clean limitless power

I will be spending the rest of the year constructing and modifying a Model A to run on fusion power.

I am a 62 year old retiring physics prof who has been working on “cold fusion” for 24 years. I am ready to stop turning knobs and actually try putting it to the test. I am not getting any younger. Now is time to dream big and “go for it”. It is bold. It is daring. It is crazy but I have to try. I have a few “hot” samples and I have a ’28 Model A Ford that I will use for a standalone test of the concept. It will take about $25,000 to get fancy Lithium Iron Phosphate batteries, steam engine, a generator, mechanical and electrical items. I need to raise $20,000 for it. (questions- check out https://www.facebook.com/dennis.fusioncar.5 )

I will be scaling up an existing experiment involving electric stimulation of a deuterium containing metal lattice system for higher levels of heat. I will be using “Cold Fusion” (also known by its current "politically correct term" as LENR) to generate heat to boil water** to drive a steam engine ** and turn an electric generator. I don’t expect to have enough power to run the car directly but I hope to “trickle charge” some batteries enough to run the car after very long charging times. I am hoping for about 5 Watts of net electrical energy. I am close. The heating should scale with volume/mass and my losses will scale just as surface area. I even have a few samples that have been “self heating”.

It is a long shot. I cannot promise success but I definitely will give it my best effort. Please spread the word to friends and those you think would be interested. I will post updates as I go via https://www.facebook.com/dennis.fusioncar.5

See I told you it was bold and daring but after 24 year of seeing so much hope for a better world in the bottom of a test tube, I need to see if I can make it work. Researchers have amassed a lot of data but it sits mostly ignored and or disbelieved. (see http://lenr-canr.org/ and specifically see my paper there: http://www.lenr-canr.org/acrobat/CravensDtheenablin.pdf )  If I can demonstrate a credible application of “cold fusion”, it will change the entire world.

What Happens If I Surpass My Goal?

I would opt for 1) +$20K, the more efficient and powerful Stirling generator from WhisperGen instead of the steam engine 2) +$10K, larger batteries and better current control for more range 3). +$10K, Scale up samples for higher thermal output levels and shorter charging times 4). +$5K, have some special parts machined.

Nerd stuff in rough numbers:

Model A because: 1) exempt from state inspection restrictions, 2) can move with just 1 to 2 HP, 3) high gas tank can be used for gravity feed water to steam system, 4) keeps fusion system as focus, 5) easy access to system, 6) and the mystique – people smile at a slow old Model A; Steam because: 1) Peltiers only get me 2% efficiency, steam about 8% conversion, 2) Stirlings at this level are very costly; Target power levels: 1) COP 20, 2) 100 W thermal, 3) net electrical output 6 W, 4) drive motor at 2 kW ave, 4) charge to run time ratio 333 hours(2 weeks) charge for 1 hour drive time. Battery storage: 1) Lithium Iron Phosphate 2) >80 AH, 3) 72 Volt array; Fusion approach: electric stimulation of D and Pd loaded Carbon mesopore powder spiked with rare earths and thorium.

Fusion? I will leave it to theorists to debate if it is reallydd  fusion, virtual neutron fusion, or something else- strong nuclear force or weak nuclear force events. I just want to take it out of the lab and use it.

** Steam:  Right now I expect to boil water and use a steam engine. However, if I get enough funding and can locate a 2-20 watt Stirling engine, I will use a Stirling engine instead.  It will give me a little more efficiency without pumping water and complications involved in condensing the steam.

If underfunded

If I get less than half, I will not have enough for the car project. However, I would try for a scaled down demo. Perhaps a simple LED and a small “toy” ¼ W Stirling.

story:
Hi there! Our names are Matthew Manos (Founder & Managing Partner at verynice) and Katherine Slovin (Design Director at verynice), and we are getting married! 

We consider ourselves to be quite lucky folks.

When conceptualizing what we wanted to set up for our wedding registry, we looked no further then what we do every day: give half. 

Inspired by verynice's 50% pro-bono business model, we have decided to donate half of our wedding gifts to two incredible non-profit organizations in Los Angeles: Dig Deep and The Downtown Women's Center. The other half of the funds will go toward our honeymoon in Kauai. We are pretty thrilled about it, and we can't wait to start our new life together!

Our names are Matthew Manos (Founder & Managing Partner at verynice) and Katherine Slovin (Design Director at verynice), and we are getting married! We consider ourselves to be quite lucky folks.When conceptualizing what we wanted to set up for our wedding registry, we looked no further then what we do every day: give half. Inspired by verynice's 50% pro-bono business model, we have decided to donate half of our wedding gifts to two incredible non-profit organizations in Los Angeles: Dig Deep and The Downtown Women's Center. story:
Shh. It's a Birthday Surprise!

One day not long ago, while far from the Caribbean on another adventure at sea, Kim found herself in a not so Royal environment. During another sleepless night abroad Kim, stepped out of her hotel room and a foreign thief slipped in and stole her laptop. OH NO! When she returned to her room, there was no laptop; just an open window. There are thirsty people everywhere.  SMH

Dear Family & Friends of Kimberly, 

Let us turn Kimberly’s Open Window into a Window of Opportunity and together, give Kimberly a new BIRTHDAY COMPUTER!

Let's chip in and raise a cup for Kimberly Wilkes’ Birthday!

Kim will be returning from this Royal Caribbean tour on Monday June 24th(two days after her Birthday). Kimberly will be presented with the check of raised funds on Saturday June 29th. it will be on video and shared with all of you. Please make your donation by Wednesday June 27! Every Little Bit COUNTS! Thanks.

*Our Goal is set for $700. We can reach this goal together!

Contact Kita P or Bronco Wilkes for more information: kitap86@gmail.com 

Warmest Regards,
Kita P and Bronco Wilkes

story:
My goal has always been to create my own company, depend on myself and become a source of employment for people who can not find a job.

I need $ 10,000.00 for rental of premises, purchase products and pay various permissions necessary for my business begins to operate quickly, 

We will focus on the auto light led lighting, halogens, light bars, etc.

we want to import all kinds of lights in our country are new and hardly anyone sells, creating a need for our customers.

Every donation will not only help me develop my company, will also help people who need a job, I hope to grow and hire more people.

I would appreciate sharing this idea to get as far as possible.


Mi meta siempre a sido crear mi propia empresa, depender de mí mismo y convertirme en una fuente de empleo para personas que no por diversas razones no puedan encontrar un trabajo.  

Necesitamos $10,000.00 para alquiler de un local, compra de productos y pagar varios permisos necesarios para que mi empresa comience a operar a corto plazo.

Nosotros vamos a enfocarnos en la iluminación automotriz con luz led, halogenos, barras de luces, etc.

nosotros queremos importar todo tipo de luces que en nuestro paìs son una novedad y casi nadie se dedica a vender, creando una necesidad en nuestros clientes.

Cada donación no solo me ayudará a desarrollar mi empresa sino que también ayudará a las personas que necesitan de un trabajo, espero ir creciendo y contratando más personas.

Les agradecería compartan esta idea para llegar tan lejos como sea posible.

story:
We kindly welcome you to our official site. It was tough, it was hard, but we made it, we found great supporters, good friends, and we continue forward!
Become our fan on /clickotrigger
Copyright © 2013 Ltd.
An funded company.

Us

Well, a small startup company creating automation solutions for use with a smartphone. Our main idea is to achieve good results on automation projects with a small budget. We provide a hardware and software solution to trigger multiple electrical devices with a simple smartphone. An example is a garage door, alarm system, lights switch and many more. This campign is important for us to get the project fully running. We want to add support for all modern mobile devices like iPhone, Android(done), Blackberry, Windows Phone. By participating in this campign, you help us make a great innovative product with a market finish which we believe will be part of everyone's life as car/security remotes are nowadays. We strive to achieve a usable solution for advanced automation for projects on limited budget.

Use with web (First beta available at viacont.de/clicko)

You

If you want to automate daily routine tasks of switching things ON or OFF; if you want to carry less things with you and control everything with your phone; if you're a technician or manufacturer of electrical gate locks, light switches, alarm systems and want to add a full blown access control system to your device; if you are a developer and want to use the simple Clicko API for use with your next great mobile application... then this project could really help you to reduce the cost of automating your equipment!

The Universal Wireless Trigger

The device is a small (50mm x 23mm) board with

  • Bluetooth
  • A powerful 10A/250VAC relay
  • Dry contact input to keep it in sync with manual switches running in parallel (manual lights switch, alarm system keyboard)
  • Micro USB power and connection to a computer - you can safely power the device with your phone's charger!
  • I2C pins for expansion with optional hardware
  • Serial interface for expansiono with optional hardware
  • SPI interface for firmware updates
  • Additional pins to trigger the same relay by other system (a button or other type of automation system)
  • Reset pins for recovery - bring the device in initial state
  • Automotive power supply (7V-35V AC/DC) through screw terminals
  • Coming Soon: Bluetooth 4.0 and iOS support for $19.99
  • Coming Soon: NFC with cable and antenna for $29.99
  • Coming Soon: Battery-backed RTC with infinite trigger log for $9.99

Front

Back

What can it be used for?

Many, many applicaitons. With the smartphone in your hand you can

  • Open/close your garage door

  • Arm/disarm your house security system Follow this blog for a fully working setup with Crow Runner alarm system

  • Lock/unlock your house Follow this blog for a fully working setup with a $25 door lock!

  • Lock/unlock your car or start/stop the engine. Expect very soon a setup with Audi A6 - unlock the car, disable the immobilizer and disarm the alarm with a single finger swipe on the screen!

  • Roll/unroll your electric roller blinds
  • Turn on/turn off your lights, electrical equipment, HVAC, etc.
  • Interrupt/restore AC/DC power
  • New: schedule ON/OFF times of electrical equipment (water heater, HVAC)
  • New: connect various electrical equipment wiressly to an Raspberry PI Internet gateway through Bluetooth, and control them from anywhere in the world with your favourite web browser!
  • New: you can issue temporary 6 digit access codes to your Clicko devices, even if they are not connected to the Internet! Security is handled through 4096 bit RSA signatures - more secure than your online banking!
  • New: you can give or revoke access to your Clicko devices to any user in the Clicko Cloud service

This wonderful tiny device makes your life easier, it lets you go out just with your phone and no keys in your pocket.

The device works either by using Bluetooth in 15m range, or from anywhere in the world when connected with a Bluetooth/Internet gateway. With it's powerful API, in case you're a developer, you can create a fully functional security system with access control.

The device is designed with the help of experienced security professionals and is compatible with all alarm systems in use today! If used as electric switch, it's powerful relay can trigger electric devices consuming up to 2.5kW of energy!

Why is it different?

You may ask yourself, aren't there other solutions? Can I make my own with Arduino, Raspberry PI, etc. Well, here is why our device is different, very different:

  • Small.
  • Cheap.
  • Energy saving.
  • Automotive.
  • Universal.

Our concept is to have lots of small cheap triggers instead of a single big expensive device for home automation. Those triggers are so small that you can embed them in your lights switch, wall socket, car alarm, house security system. You can automate anything.

The device supports feedback from triggered electric equipment. For example you will always know from your phone that your security system is armed/disarmed before triggering the switch. With an ordinary analog remote control, you would just shoot in the dark.

The Clicko device has 4 types of trigger control.

  • ON/OFF - that is the simplest case, used for lamps for example.
  • Trigger - switch on for a user-defined time and then switch back off, used for opening gates for a limited time.
  • Toggle - switch on and wait for a user-defined time then report ON state and turn relay OFF. Used for some garage doors.
  • Pulse Toggle - send short pulse to the relay, wait for a user-defined time, report ON state. This is used for delayed arming of alarm systems.
  • Feedback - this is used for alarm system that may fail arming because of an opened door, or garage doors that may fail closing due to obstacles. Triggering fails if the feedback is not set and this is reported by the smartphone application. Feedback also captures state changes of the triggered equipment so that it is properly reflected on the smartphone.

All settings are set only once and remembered inside the device's flash memory. After pairing a new phone, it will automatically download those settings.

Are there any other similar products?

Yes, but only slightly similar. Take a remote controllable light bulb, for example Apple's HUE light bulb or LIFX light bulb. Those light bulbs can be controlled by the smartphone. But we are different in many ways, the biggest difference is that we control the switch and not each lightbulb separately. You can still use your old light switch and your old light bulbs and only integrate our small remote control module hidden behind the switch. In addition to that the manual switch and the remote control are kept in sync and can work together without limitations. This is cerainly just a small example on the many ways our device can be used.

Where does the funding go?

Even if the campign is incomplete, all claimed items will be shipped on time. This project will be completed independent from the results of the funding campign. But with your help it will get the market finish sooner and you'll be the first to try this new innovative product.

With the funds we collect we shall cover part of our expenses on the first batch of PCB boards. With the rest, we shall create another board of the same size with Bluetooth 4.0 module compatible with iOS devices and latest Android BLE ready phones and tablets. With BLE we shall add more features like triggering on presence sensing and much, much longer battery life of the phone. The more we collect, the sooner we can start with iOS, Windows Phone and Blackberry.

How can you help?

Except claiming a perk, we shall be really gratefull if you tell your friends and colleagues about us, if you write about us in your blog, if you mention us at both your electronic and real social activities. A simple good word from you is precious for us.

How does this project help other people?

When the product is released, it will help small projects on tiny budget to become alive without spending money for expensive equipment for complex automation solutions.

The Viacont Team
story_txt:
We kindly welcome you to our official site. It was tough, it was hard, but we made it, we found great supporters, good friends, and we continue forward!Become our fan on  /clickotrigger
Copyright © 2013  Ltd.  An  funded company.

Us
Well, a small startup company creating automation solutions for use with a smartphone. Our main idea is to achieve good results on automation projects with a small budget. We provide a hardware and software solution to trigger multiple electrical devices with a simple smartphone. An example is a garage door, alarm system, lights switch and many more. This campign is important for us to get the project fully running. We want to add support for all modern mobile devices like iPhone, Android(done), Blackberry, Windows Phone. By participating in this campign, you help us make a great innovative product with a market finish which we believe will be part of everyone's life as car/security remotes are nowadays. We strive to achieve a usable solution for advanced automation for projects on limited budget.


Use with web (First beta available at viacont.de/clicko)


You
If you want to automate daily routine tasks of switching things ON or OFF; if you want to carry less things with you and control everything with your phone; if you're a technician or manufacturer of electrical gate locks, light switches, alarm systems and want to add a full blown access control system to your device; if you are a developer and want to use the simple Clicko API for use with your next great mobile application... then this project could really help you to reduce the cost of automating your equipment!
The Universal Wireless Trigger

The device is a small (50mm x 23mm) board with

Bluetooth
A powerful 10A/250VAC relay
Dry contact input to keep it in sync with manual switches running in parallel (manual lights switch, alarm system keyboard)
Micro USB power and connection to a computer - you can safely power the device with your phone's charger!
I2C pins for expansion with optional hardware
Serial interface for expansiono with optional hardware
SPI interface for firmware updates
Additional pins to trigger the same relay by other system (a button or other type of automation system)
Reset pins for recovery - bring the device in initial state
Automotive power supply (7V-35V AC/DC) through screw terminals
Coming Soon: Bluetooth 4.0 and iOS support for $19.99
Coming Soon: NFC with cable and antenna for $29.99
Coming Soon: Battery-backed RTC with infinite trigger log for $9.99
Front

Back

What can it be used for?
Many, many applicaitons. With the smartphone in your hand you can

Open/close your garage door

Arm/disarm your house security system Follow this blog for a fully working setup with Crow Runner alarm system



Lock/unlock your house Follow this blog for a fully working setup with a $25 door lock!



Lock/unlock your car or start/stop the engine. Expect very soon a setup with Audi A6 - unlock the car, disable the immobilizer and disarm the alarm with a single finger swipe on the screen!

Roll/unroll your electric roller blinds
Turn on/turn off your lights, electrical equipment, HVAC, etc.
Interrupt/restore AC/DC power

New: schedule ON/OFF times of electrical equipment (water heater, HVAC)

New: connect various electrical equipment wiressly to an Raspberry PI Internet gateway through Bluetooth, and control them from anywhere in the world with your favourite web browser!

New: you can issue temporary 6 digit access codes to your Clicko devices, even if they are not connected to the Internet! Security is handled through 4096 bit RSA signatures - more secure than your online banking!

New: you can give or revoke access to your Clicko devices to any user in the Clicko Cloud service
This wonderful tiny device makes your life easier, it lets you go out just with your phone and no keys in your pocket.
The device works either by using Bluetooth in 15m range, or from anywhere in the world when connected with a Bluetooth/Internet gateway. With it's powerful API, in case you're a developer, you can create a fully functional security system with access control.
The device is designed with the help of experienced security professionals and is compatible with all alarm systems in use today! If used as electric switch, it's powerful relay can trigger electric devices consuming up to 2.5kW of energy!
Why is it different?
You may ask yourself, aren't there other solutions? Can I make my own with Arduino, Raspberry PI, etc. Well, here is why our device is different, very different:

Small.
Cheap.
Energy saving.
Automotive.
Universal.
Our concept is to have lots of small cheap triggers instead of a single big expensive device for home automation. Those triggers are so small that you can embed them in your lights switch, wall socket, car alarm, house security system. You can automate anything.
The device supports feedback from triggered electric equipment. For example you will always know from your phone that your security system is armed/disarmed before triggering the switch. With an ordinary analog remote control, you would just shoot in the dark.
The Clicko device has 4 types of trigger control.

ON/OFF - that is the simplest case, used for lamps for example.
Trigger - switch on for a user-defined time and then switch back off, used for opening gates for a limited time.
Toggle - switch on and wait for a user-defined time then report ON state and turn relay OFF. Used for some garage doors.
Pulse Toggle - send short pulse to the relay, wait for a user-defined time, report ON state. This is used for delayed arming of alarm systems.
Feedback - this is used for alarm system that may fail arming because of an opened door, or garage doors that may fail closing due to obstacles. Triggering fails if the feedback is not set and this is reported by the smartphone application. Feedback also captures state changes of the triggered equipment so that it is properly reflected on the smartphone.
All settings are set only once and remembered inside the device's flash memory. After pairing a new phone, it will automatically download those settings.
Are there any other similar products?
Yes, but only slightly similar. Take a remote controllable light bulb, for example Apple's HUE light bulb or LIFX light bulb. Those light bulbs can be controlled by the smartphone. But we are different in many ways, the biggest difference is that we control the switch and not each lightbulb separately. You can still use your old light switch and your old light bulbs and only integrate our small remote control module hidden behind the switch. In addition to that the manual switch and the remote control are kept in sync and can work together without limitations. This is cerainly just a small example on the many ways our device can be used.
Where does the funding go?
Even if the campign is incomplete, all claimed items will be shipped on time. This project will be completed independent from the results of the funding campign. But with your help it will get the market finish sooner and you'll be the first to try this new innovative product.
With the funds we collect we shall cover part of our expenses on the first batch of PCB boards. With the rest, we shall create another board of the same size with Bluetooth 4.0 module compatible with iOS devices and latest Android BLE ready phones and tablets. With BLE we shall add more features like triggering on presence sensing and much, much longer battery life of the phone. The more we collect, the sooner we can start with iOS, Windows Phone and Blackberry.

Except claiming a perk, we shall be really gratefull if you tell your friends and colleagues about us, if you write about us in your blog, if you mention us at both your electronic and real social activities. A simple good word from you is precious for us.

The Viacont Team

story:
Fulfillment is Complete and Our Campaign Is Closed!

 

Shipping NOW! Order at: sonicsoak.com!

 

Thank you all for your support! If your order is still missing, please email us at team@sonicsoak.com!

 

Sonic Soak is a device that aims to revolutionize cleanliness and hygiene in our daily lives by using ultrasonic cleaning technology. Sonic Soak's modulated ultrasonic waves travel through water to clean at a microscopic level.

Using ultrasonic technology to clean at the microscopic level, Sonic Soak revolutionizes washing technology and allows you to clean like never before. 

 

The Sonic Soak is the answer to achieving a truly clean wash by cleaning at the source. Clean what the washing machine can’t with ultrasonic technology and see results that would shock even the neatest of freaks.

 

Unlike other crowdfunding campaigns, we've already spent months developing a manufacturing-ready model and only need funding for the initial batch order. Purchase yours today and you won’t need to wait long to get the Sonic Soak in your hands, laundry, and basically anything else that could use a good ultrasonic cleaning.

Sonic Soak generates modulated ultrasonic waves that travel through the water to clean at the microscopic level. So you can “wave” goodbye to dirty and say hello to a genuinely clean load of laundry.

We can’t wait to get Sonic Soak out to you. We've already invested months of time and money into developing a fully working and production-ready model - and we're ready to get this out to you wherever you are within months after reaching our goal.

As a thank you for supporting our campaign, we are offering an exclusive discount only available to backers of this Indiegogo campaign. Once this campaign ends, these prices will no longer be available - get yours now.

 

Sonic Soak is the only device that can clean virtually anything that will fit into a container of water (no ultrasonic floor cleaner yet - but hopefully soon!). But more importantly, Sonic Soak cleans everything better than anything else in your house.

Think you don't need it?  Think again.

 

 

Many studies have shown that standard washing machines do not kill enough germs and bacteria, turning your laundry into a living, breathing bacterial soup. Over time, this bacterial soup gets into your "freshly washed" clothes, dish towels, and face towels - into you and your family's body and food.

Studies show that handwashing fruits and vegetables only removes about 75-80% of dirt, chemicals, and pesticides. 

A recent study showed that that 95% of adolescents ages 8-15 had indications of pesticide exposure, when experts say that even low levels of exposure are associated with serious health risk.

Not only that, Sonic Soak cleans fruits you never could before. Don't have the time to individually clean each grape? Can't reach every strawberry pore? Just throw them in with Sonic Soak!

When was the last time you cleaned your razor, toothbrush, or powder brush? Because of their direct contact with the human body and lack of maintenance, medical experts say that personal hygiene tools are the single most significant vector of infection and disease in the household.

No more pulling out your cleaning toothbrush or sponge and trying to get at every nook and cranny - just drop in baby nipples, bottles, and toys in with a Sonic Soak and let it do all the work!

The gentle cleaning from Sonic Soak is perfect for delicates, hand wash only items, and hard-to-clean items that can’t stand the ferocity of the washing machine. Sonic Soak thoroughly cleanses items without causing excess wear and tear that traditional washing machines create through their tumbling mechanism, and is even gentler than traditional hand washing.

When traveling, imagine having an unlimited supply of clothing, but just carrying a single bag. This is only made possible by Sonic Soak. Go ahead, soil your best hand-wash only shirt on the first day of your trip. Sonic Soak will come to the rescue. No need to call laundry service - let Sonic Soak do the rest, and you’ll have a brand new shirt in minutes.

Does your washing machine clean apples? We didn’t think so. Sonic Soak operates as much more than just a laundry washing alternative. It also expertly cleans fruits, vegetables, accessories like glasses and jewelry, and also works great to wash those pesky, hard-to-clean items like baby bottles, carafes, razors, and the like. Sonic Soak cleans all these and more:

For over 2 years, we've spent countless hours working tirelessly to refine Sonic Soak over multiple generations of the product. Since launching our first generation in 2016, we've sold tens of thousands of units and have continually improved the device through customer feedback and production experience. In the past few months alone we’ve worked around the clock to finalize the third and best generation of Sonic Soak for our Indiegogo launch and to ensure that the latest generation of Sonic Soak is fully functional and production ready. And we’ve done it.

The reason why we are so confident that we can fulfill our promises is simply because we have done it before. We've already raised over ¥5,600,000 and fulfilled orders for over 12,000 backers in China for the first and second generation versions of Sonic Soak. We decided to launch the first and second generation in China in order to gain valuable experience and feedback necessary to develop the best possible ultrasonic cleaner for the rest of the world. By backing this campaign, you will be among the first in the world to receive the third and best generation of Sonic Soak. With the third generation, we've integrated the best materials and an extra powerful ultrasonic transducer to ensure that you can achieve the best possible clean anytime, anywhere, for everything that needs cleaning.

Sonic Soak was established with the goal of becoming a global innovator through the utilization of ultrasonic technology. Our team of engineers, designers, and innovators are focused on creating a new standard that meets the unique laundry challenges of the 21st century. With the right experience and R&D already done, Sonic Soak guarantees innovative, high quality products for their customers.

Does it really work?

Yes, it really does. Ultrasonic technology has been used for years in medical and industrial applications and has proven to provide unparalleled cleaning results. We’ve harnessed this technology and compacted it into this sleek package using a stainless steel exterior to ensure that the Sonic Soak does what it promises. Not to mention, in addition to lab testing, we’ve meticulously tested the Sonic Soak on our own clothes, accessories and even ourselves. 

What is this ultrasonic technology you speak of?

Ultrasonic technology comes as a result of ultrasound, an oscillating sound pressure wave that operates at a frequency beyond the human range of hearing. In water, these powerful waves produce a process called cavitation which creates bubbles that do the cleaning. This technology has been used for years in medical and industrial applications as a means of truly powerful cleaning, but Sonic Soak has scaled it down and made it accessible to the average consumer.

What do I need to make Sonic Soak work?

All you need is a clean container of water and connection to electric power.

What kind of container do I use to wash my clothes?

You can use a sink, a bucket, a bowl, even a plastic bag. Anything that can safely hold water would work. Sonic Soak is not picky.

What do I do with my clothes after using Sonic Soak?

Sonic Soak has the cleaning part covered, so the next step would be to rinse and dry, and your stuff is all set to be worn again the next day.

How much laundry can I wash in one load?

We recommend washing up to 4 lbs worth of items. Heavier items like jeans and bedding are not recommended for use with Sonic Soak.

Can the Sonic Soak replace my washing machine?

For frequent travelers and small households and families, Sonic Soak is the perfect washing machine replacement. It's perfect for helping you save on water, space, and energy - especially if you don't have large loads of laundry.

What’s the difference in quality between using Sonic Soak and washing in the machine?

Thanks to ultrasonic waves that reach clean at the microscopic level of your dirty items, Sonic Soak can reach areas your washer can’t. In the end, you get clothes that are not only much cleaner, but also gently washed without all the banging and sloshing from the washing machine.

When will I receive my Sonic Soak?

Shipping will begin less than 2 months after project funding ends. You will be immediately notified when we’ve hit our target, and your ultrasonic cleaning dreams will come true in no time.

Since this is the third generation, does that mean I can just buy the previous generations elsewhere?

Yes you can! But these versions were not made for international sale and uses significantly cheaper parts, much weaker transducer, and are not guaranteed to meet safety standards internationally.

Is the Sonic Soak compatible with my country's voltage?

At the end of the campaign, we will send out a survey asking about your preferred voltage. You can request 110V rated OR 220V rated Sonic Soak unit - the Sonic Soak is not dual voltage.

Indiegogo's shipping location lists me in the wrong country?

This is a known problem on Indiegogo - nothing wrong with your address. At the end of the campaign, we will send out a survey confirming where you would like your Sonic Soak shipped.

I am a retailer / wholesaler - how can I become a Sonic Soak distributor?

Please contact us at team@sonicsoak.com

story:
THE LITTLE THINGS

So often, it is the little things that have a lasting impact, especially in times of stress.  For families entering the Ronald McDonald House of the Four States for the first time, it may very well be the welcome rug just inside the doors.  Curt Medlin, owner of The Mark of Excellence: Carpets by Design created this beautiful thirteen foot entry rug to welcome families and visitors, and reassure them that they are in good hands.  So many times this design brings sunshine through storms of life, a rainbow of peace and protection over a family, an emulation of unity and a reminder that they are not alone.

The rug has become worn and frayed after seventeen years of families and staff passing over it, a testament to how many families the House has helped over the years. Families are also frayed and worn after spending hours at the bedside of their sick child. The design brings hope and smiles.  Curt Medlin has pledged to design a new rug for the entryway of the Ronald McDonald House of the Four States, but we need your help.

HOW TO HELP 

The Mark of Excellence: Carpets by Design will donate all the labor, but we need to raise $3,500 to cover the cost of materials for the rug.  All funds exceeding $3,500 will be donated to the Ronald McDonald House of the Four States.

We will make sure that everyone knows that you contributed with a sign that will be displayed during the Ronald McDonald House of the Four States presentation ceremony on August 20, with a list of names of the contributors. You may remain anonymous if you like. The sign will remain posted for 30 days so that families will know who helped bring a smile to their face and wipe a tear from their eyes. 

MY STORY

My name is Travis Duff and I work with Curt Medlin, owner of The Mark of Excellence: Carpets by Design who custom made the rug design that has lasted for 17 years.

I am a Ronald McDonald House success story. My family stayed in the Ronald McDonald House of the Ozarks in Springfield, Missouri when I was in critical condition at COX hospital. I was born 8 weeks early, weighing 2.8 pounds. My lungs and heart were not completely developed and the House took care of my family while I was in the hospital. 24 years later, I get to be involved with a project like this with a team of amazing individuals to support a great cause. This is my chance to give back, our chance to create another rug that will last another 17 plus years of bringing hope and sunshine to families in need. 

ABOUT THE HOUSE

For nearly 17 years the Ronald McDonald House of the Four States in Joplin, Missouri has been a ‘home away from home’ for the families of seriously ill children (0 – 18 years) and ill expectant mothers being treated at Freeman Health System and Mercy Hospital Joplin.

Since opening in 1998, the House has welcomed over 2,600 unduplicated families who have called it home during one of the most stressful times in their family’s life. 

ABOUT THE CHARITY

Ronald McDonald House is the cornerstone program for Ronald McDonald House Charities.  All monies needed to operate the program are derived through individual and/or corporate donations.  Ronald McDonald House is a tax exempt, nonprofit organization established as a 501c3.  Donations are tax deductible.  It is the only worldwide service of is kind.  Forty years after the first Ronald McDonald House opened in Philadelphia in 1974, there are 348 Ronald McDonald Houses in 38 countries and regions. 

YOUR CHALLENGE

Help us fund. Open your heart to giving to a great cause, be a part of a warm welcome, be a part of bringing smiles to faces full of tears and fears.

I am a Ronald McDonald House success story. My family stayed in the Ronald McDonald House of the Ozarks in Springfield, Missouri when I was in critical condition at COX hospital. I was born 8 weeks early, weighing 2.8 pounds. My lungs and heart were not completely developed and the House took care of my family while I was in the hospital. 24 years later, I get to be involved with a project like this with a team of amazing individuals to support a great cause. This is my chance to give back, our chance to create another rug that will last another 17 plus years of bringing hope and sunshine to families in need. 
ABOUT THE HOUSE
For nearly 17 years the Ronald McDonald House of the Four States in Joplin, Missouri has been a ‘home away from home’ for the families of seriously ill children (0 – 18 years) and ill expectant mothers being treated at Freeman Health System and Mercy Hospital Joplin.

Since opening in 1998, the House has welcomed over 2,600 unduplicated families who have called it home during one of the most stressful times in their family’s life. 

ABOUT THE CHARITY
Ronald McDonald House is the cornerstone program for Ronald McDonald House Charities.  All monies needed to operate the program are derived through individual and/or corporate donations.  Ronald McDonald House is a tax exempt, nonprofit organization established as a 501c3.  Donations are tax deductible.  It is the only worldwide service of is kind.  Forty years after the first Ronald McDonald House opened in Philadelphia in 1974, there are 348 Ronald McDonald Houses in 38 countries and regions. 

YOUR CHALLENGE
Help us fund. Open your heart to giving to a great cause, be a part of a warm welcome, be a part of bringing smiles to faces full of tears and fears.

story:
SHOP NOW

 

The cleanest sheets you’ll ever own.

Your sheets contain up to a billion bacteria cells after just one week. Our sheets inhibit 99% of all bacterial growth using advanced silver technology that never washes out.

Why are we laying our fresh faces onto a pillowcase that hasn’t been washed in days?

After just one night of use, your pillowcase and bed sheets can accumulate a horrifying array of bacteria, allergens and fungus. Dermatologists recommend washing your pillowcase every two or three days. But who has time for that?

 

The average adult washes their sheets every 2-3 weeks.

Studies suggest that some men change their sheets just four times a year and women, every two and a half weeks ... Sound about right? Our fabric is engineered to stay fresh, clean and comfortable night after night — regardless of how often you toss them in the washer.

 

 

 What makes Silvon special?

  • Antimicrobial Silver: By fusing innovative fibers with natural silver, Silvon prevents the growth of unwanted bacteria directly on the fabric surface.
  • Completely Permanent: Similar products wash out or degrade in strength over time. However, because the silver is woven directly into our fabric, it will never wash away.
  • Incredibly Soft: We’ve paired our technology with Supima cotton grown right here in the USA. Supima cotton is among the softest, most durable cotton in the world.
  • All Natural – No Chemicals: Similar products use harsh chemical treatments to adhere silver particles to fabrics. We use the real thing – 99% pure natural silver.
  • Eco-Friendly: With Silvon we find new uses for the materials that naturally exist right in front of us. These advanced textiles also increase the time you can go between launderings. This helps save water and energy on a large scale.

 

 

Silver, it's natural. 

Silver is naturally oligodynamic – simply put this means that it prevents the growth of bacteria. By fusing our fibers with natural silver, these properties are permanently ingrained in the fabric.

The best part? No harsh chemical ingredients are used in our fabrics—just pure, bacteria-killing silver and cotton.

The Science

Basically, silver carries a positive charge, and bacteria is negative (go figure). The silver is attracted to the bacteria, breaks its cell wall and the bacteria is destroyed before it has a chance to reproduce.

Advanced technology now allows us to weave silver coated fibers directly into our fabric. These silver fibers are proven to prevent bacterial growth on the fabric surface. 

Does it work?

This technology has been verified by more than a decade of testing at research institutions including Pennsylvania State University and Cornell University. Silvon is tested in accordance with the highest antimicrobial standards (ASTM E2149). Furthermore, Our fabric is put through rigorous wash tests to ensure protection that will last the lifetime of the product.

 

 

Great. But comfy?

Advanced silver fibers and supple Supima cotton come together to create the perfect sleep surface.

A pillowcase isn’t much good if it’s not conducive to an amazing night’s sleep. That’s why we combined our technology with long-staple Supima cotton. One hundred percent of this cotton is grown in the US, and it’s among the most durable, softest cotton in the world.

 

 

How It’s Made

No harsh chemicals, no nanotechnology – those were our guidelines. We’ve partnered with a US-based antimicrobial tech company that uses natural silver to prevent bacterial growth on fabrics. Their proprietary process completely covers advanced fibers with silver while allowing them to remain extremely soft, flexible and comfortable.

Responsibility

Silvon is committed to manufacturing products that surpass the most stringent safety and environmental protection standards. All of our products abide by strict guidelines, and supports human ecology through bio-compatibility and the absence of harmful substances in the manufacturing

 

 

Oh, and if you have a furry friend?

Your pet may be bringing more than love and warmth to your bed. Your four-legged friend is another source that enables bacteria, mold and allergens to grow.

 

 

Color Options

Silvon is now available in two colors, Grey and White. You can select any reward, and at the end of the campaign we will contact all of our backers to confirm your color selection.

 

 

The Silvon Sheets

The Silvon Sheets are now available in both color options. You can select any size, and at the end of the campaign we will contact all of our backers to confirm your color selection. Each sheet set includes 1 fitted sheet, 1 flat sheet and 2 pillowcases.

 

 

Size Guide:

 

 

 

 

Simplicity in design

We think less is more, which is why we don’t include unnecessary patterns or detailing. Instead, we designed the simplest, most comfortable fabric we could, using premium natural materials, without the premium price.

 

 

Details Make The Difference

From pillowcases with a tidy envelope closure to sheets with grippy elastic, all of our products incorporate thoughtful details with you in mind.

 

 

Care Instructions

Although our fabric helps keep bacteria from swarming your pillowcase, dust and other debris can sometimes accumulate. We recommend washing every 10-14 days with your normal laundry. Wash it on a cool or warm cycle, and tumble dry on low heat or hang to dry. Do not use chlorine bleach.

Advanced textiles can also be beneficial to the environment. Silvon will increase the time you go in between launderings, saving water and energy.

 

 

Why Us?

We don’t wear the same tee shirt for weeks on end – why do we lay onto a pillowcase that hasn’t been washed in days? This simple question became the beginning of an incredible journey to make a revolutionary fabric that would, hopefully, create a whole new category of bedding. 

Almost two years ago we launched our first product, SleepClean. It was an instant success. We had thousands of happy customers, and can be found in retail stores around the world.

 

 

But we constantly ask whether there is a better way. We wanted to create a solution that was completely permanent and avoid the use of any chemicals in our manufacturing process. We searched for new ways to use the world’s smartest natural materials. After years of researching, testing, and chasing this vision, we’ve harnessed the incredible benefits of natural silver to create a pillowcase and then bed sheets like no other.

Rewards:

 

Add-ons and Adjusting Your Perk

If you would like to add additional products to your pledge, simply add the price of the additional product to your current pledge amount. If you would like to change your reward selection all together follow the steps in the link below:

How to Upgrade Your Perk

 

Thank you – really.

There’s nothing more important than sleep. And it all starts with creating the right environment. We want to bring textile innovations to the bedroom – and believe that Silvon is a product that everyone can benefit from. We’re glad that you share this vision and we’re grateful to you for helping us bring this product to the world.

*These antimicrobial properties are incorporated to inhibit bacterial growth only on the product itself. Silvon is not a disinfectant and does not protect the user or others against food-borne illnesses or disease. We still recommend the use proper hygiene and cleaning procedures.

We're Shipping! 
We’re Shipping! It is with great excitement that we announce that shipping has begun! We’re incredibly proud of how far we’ve come – and we’re not slowing down. Our first batch of sheets and pillowcases arrived at the Silvon warehouse and we’re starting to ship orders right away. 

Inventory will continue to arrive at our warehouse in increments over the next few weeks. We are perfectionists, and wanted to make sure that all of our backers receive an amazing product – not something that was rushed through production. Good things take time - and we cannot express how thankful we are for your early support, patience and optimism.

story:
About

Featured In

Did you know that up to 40% of dogs experience anxiety during their lives, almost exclusively from being left alone? That means that every morning that you leave your furry friend at home, they could be suffering until you get back.

Leaving your dog home alone without any interaction or stimulation can lead to a variety of mental, physical and behaviour issues.

Nearly half of all house pets are obese, as they simply lack the regular exercise required to stay fit.

The perfect way to keep your pet mentally and physically active, even when you aren’t home!

  • Our expertly-designed smart ball allows your pet to play all day long through a variety of preprogrammed activities that stimulate their mind and get them moving!
  • Featuring AutoStart and AutoStop functions, GOMI continuously moves in irregular patterns through an evolving algorithm. This keeps your pet engaged and their mind stimulated, keeping them physically fit and lessening the possibility of anxiety or depression.
  • The GOMI comes programmed with 12 different interactions offer something new, exciting and intriguing for your pet no matter how long they play!
  • When you come back home, the GOMI app will let you know how the pet played with Gomi while you were away. The GOMI app will help you know what your pet is doing while you are away and help you manage it healthier.

GOMI makes your pet exercise even when you are busy or not home, by stimulating his curiosity through autonomous movements.

We are the first. The original. The only interactive smart pet toy on the market today! These smart interactions make sure your pet never gets bored and play for a long time,

  • When the dog bites the GOMI, GOMI vibrates.
  • When the dog grab or drop GOMI, it rolls away and escapes by itself.

The GOMI uses FDA-Certified Polycarbonate coating that is strong enough to withstand even the hardest bites from your pet.

The Sustainable Soy Ink ensures that your dog or cat is free from any harmful substances, so they can enjoy the smart ball as much as they want!

The antibacterial nature of the GOMI means that it can go wherever your pet takes it! From the yard to the living room and anywhere in between, you don’t need to worry about germs or bacteria.

The GOMI is designed to be 100% waterproof and easy-to-clean, so you can freshen it up for your pup or kitty in no time!

Once the GOMI gets dirty, simply run it under hot water and it will be clean and ready to roll.

Our innovative wireless charger gives the GOMI the power it needs for hours of play! Once your pet is done, simply place the ball back on the charger (or train your furry friend to do so!) and it will be quickly ready for more fun in no time.

  • Full charging Time: Maximum 4 hours
  • Activity time: Maximum 16 cycles
  • 1 Cycle is made of 30mins = 5mins Play mode + 25mins Sleep mode
  • Can move continuously for maximum 80 mins.

Even if the pet touch the GOMI during Sleep mode, the toy will move for 1 minute. This interaction allows your pet to feel like a living animal and play for a long time. If the GOMI moves without sleep mode, the dog will soon get tired. GOMI is Smart!!!

With no charging ports anywhere on the device, your pet remains 100% safe during play.

Want to make sure your pet gets their needed activity, even while you’re away?

  • Just log in to the GOMI App and you receive immediate control of the ball’s movements!
  • Get the GOMI rolling to catch the eye of your pet, encouraging play to keep them moving.

Want to track your pet’s play habits and activity throughout the day?

  • Stay Connected Through Bluetooth.
  • GOMI includes a full mobile app for your smartphone, allowing you to receive real-time data about your pet’s interactions with it.

Nothing is more frustrating for a pet or their owner than losing a toy!

The GOMI app makes it easier than ever to find the ball, as well as control its movement. Plus, the LED lights and movement of the ball let you find it under couches, under beds and anywhere else your pets take it!

We designed GOMI to easily roll around, giving your dogs and cats endless hours of entertainment. From the moment they see the ball rolling, they will instantly be mesmerized at it actives their predatory senses.

With embedded dimples that cause irregular movement, as well as the built-in algorithm that keeps your pets guessing, the GOMI is unlike any pet toy they have ever seen!

It rolls easily and quietly on hard floors, carpets and even lawns, letting your furry friends enjoy play time without disturbing you.

Add a wide range of accessories to make the GOMI exclusive to your pet!

With eye-catching feathers, cute animal bands and colorful covers, you can create a personalized GOMI that your dog or cat will enjoy.

Box

PLUS, we include some accessories such as Skin Bands and a randomly chosen feather to get you started on customizing your ball for your beloved pet!

By creating a Kickstarter campaign, we want to get the GOMI to the market faster, while listening to what YOU have to say about it!

We chose to raise funds for the GOMI through Kickstarter and crowdfunding for many reasons. One of those is because the manufacturing and production is expensive and we need your help!

Another one is because crowdfunding allows us to hear feedback and ideas DIRECTLY FROM YOU, the customer, which we can use as reference in the final part of the design process.

A third reason is because we are introducing a brand new product into the market. We want to educate consumers and connect with early adopters and people who are interested in what we are creating. In order to afford to place a large-scale order with our manufacturer, we need YOUR help. Placing a larger order means we are able to get the cost per unit down lower, which allows us to pass that savings on to you.

Our trusted manufacturing partners need a minimum financial commitment from us to get started on a larger manufacturing run. This is why we have set our funding goal to $5000. By hitting this funding goal, we are able to put in a larger order to our manufacturing partners enabling us to serve customer demand. Crowdfunding allows us to design without compromise and run a company we are proud to work for. We owe our existence to our backers, who help us design the most thoughtful carry solutions on the planet. We imagine a world where for-profit companies treat their employees, partners, customers, and communities as peers, and where quality of output is not hindered by the need to squeeze out maximum profit. Your support helps us to realize that goal. Thank you. •We truly believe in Kickstarter as a platform, where like-minded entrepreneurs and early adopters bring together innovative, disruptive, and sophisticated projects to life. We already support a dozen projects from other people on Kickstarter with our own money - we put our money where our mouth is.

Our Kickstarter campaign aims to bring GOMI to pets around the world, faster!

Q1. Is GOMI hard enough for my pet?

A1. GOMI is SAFE & DURABLE. Even for high-power biters.

Over the past three years, we focused on building the most durable and BITE-safe GOMI. After several safety tests and field tests with real customers in Korea (with our first generation of GOMI), we are very confident with what we have built. That’s why we are here! We dare your furry friends to break it ;)

Q2. Is there any guarantee that the GOMI will be delivered in July?

A2. GOMI will be delivered in July. And that's for sure.

We are already in the process of developing the mold for the mass production and are preparing for the next step.

Besides We plan to regularly update the mass production process for Backer during GOMI funding.

Q3. How long the charge will last?

A3. This is the information about GOMI charging and activity time:

  • Full charging Time: Maximum 4 hours
  • Activity time: Maximum 16 cycles
  • 1 Cycle is made of 30mins = 5mins Play mode + 25mins Sleep mode
  • Can move continuously for maximum 80 mins.

Even if the pet touch the GOMI during Sleep mode, the toy will move for 1 minute. This interaction allows your pet to feel like a living animal and play for a long time. If the GOMI moves without sleep mode, the dog will soon get tired. GOMI is Smart!!!

Q4. Is the GOMI safe for small dogs?

A4. The little dogs also play safely and well with the GOMI.
