story:
Home is a sacred place. Don’t let bad air ruin it. With Wynd Halo and the Wynd Home Purifier, you can monitor—and physically perfect—your environment. 

Wynd Halo has 10 sensors to monitor allergens, smoke, germs, pollution, and more. It features a new innovation called Air ID which classifies the actual pollutants in the air so that you can take the right course of action. Wynd Halo pairs seamlessly with the Wynd Home Purifier to remove any contaminants from your environment quickly and automatically.

 We take 20,000 breaths every day, but what’s in the air we’re breathing? Wynd Halo can tell you and make it better. 

Wynd Halo monitors the air and gives you a summary of your environment at a glance.

Wynd Halo houses more sensors than any other environmental monitor. It also introduces a new technology called Air ID, which determines the actual composition of your air—from pollen, to pet dander, to smog—so that you can take the right course of action to improve your environment. 

Wynd Halo fits in anywhere. You can put it in the bedroom, office, or baby’s room—and mount it on the wall using the wall-mount accessory (available as an add-on).

 Most air quality sensors just measure the general concentration of things (particles or chemicals), but can’t tell you what’s actually there. We think it’s important for you to know whether your air has pollen, forest fire smoke,  or smog from the nearby industrial plant.

Over the past two years we’ve developed an innovative technology called Air ID. By combining raw sensor data with contextual data from the cloud, Air ID can tell you what you are actually breathing.

In response to issues detected via Air ID, the Wynd app can recommend actions to help you stay healthy.

In addition, the Wynd app can alert you of any major issues in your environment so that you can quickly react to serious issues.

Halo will launch with 5 customizable optimizations. In each setting, Halo can activate connected devices such as purifiers (including the Wynd Home Purifier), thermostats, humidifiers, and lights. Over time, we’ll be adding more optimizations via software updates.

To change temperature, light, and more, Halo works with platforms such as Alexa, Nest, and Apple HomeKit. 

We designed the Wynd Home Purifier to work seamlessly with Wynd Halo. Wynd Halo monitors the air, and the Wynd Home Purifier cleans it up. The Home Purifier uses Halo data to remove allergens, mold, germs, chemicals, odors, and air pollution from your home.

The Wynd Home Purifier achieves rapid cleaning speeds by using 2x the filter surface area of typical purifiers and precision turbine engineering. This design increases airflow while lowering noise—meaning it can clean quickly and quietly.

The Wynd Home Purifier isn’t just any air purifier. It’s the most powerful air purifier in its class, able to clean 537 cubic meters of air per hour—or, 1,200 square feet in 30 minutes.

* Class is defined as connected (wifi and app-enabled) air purifiers with prices less than $500 USD. 

The V-Series HEPA filter is designed to clean a broad range of pollutants in your environment, including both particles and gases.

The Wynd Home Purifier uses a proprietary HEPA filter that removes particulates and gases, including allergens, mold, germs, toxic odors, air pollution, and more. 

In addition, the filter material is embedded with silver to kill germs. In third-party testing, the filter killed 99.97% of staphylococcus aureus (staph) and escherichia coli (E. coli) bacteria that was on the material. 

At its core, Wynd Home Purifier works seamlessly with the Wynd Halo so you shouldn’t need to make any manual adjustments. After pairing with the Halo, the Wynd Home Purifier goes to work when needed to maintain a healthy and clean environment.

The Wynd Home Purifier doesn't just operate on full blast all day: It only turns on when needed. With smart scheduling, if you’re not home, the purifier can turn down automatically. It turns up a couple hours before you get home, so that the air's fresh when you return—and it even lowers its volume when you're home, so that you can enjoy a quiet atmosphere. Smart scheduling saves electricity and extends filter life.

It can also work with other IOT platforms, like Alexa and Apple HomeKit, to control its cleaning power.    

With automatic optimizations and integration with internet connected devices, your Halo and Home Purifier can automatically optimize the air around you for whatever you're doing.

We are honored to be working once again on industrial design with Mike Nuttall, the co-founder of the world-famous design firm, IDEO. His focus on making technology products intuitive, elegant, and timeless is core to our philosophy at Wynd, and can be seen in many elements of the Wynd Halo. See below for his narration of the Halo design story. 

The Wynd Halo houses 10 unique sensors that provide insights into each facet of your environment. Each sensor is tuned to monitor key health and comfort metrics.

When we needed a PM (particulate matter) sensor for our first product in 2015, we realized there wasn’t one available that was right for us—so we got our in-house team of MIT alums to invent one. Since then, we’ve had a lot of time to improve it. The latest version is highly accurate, measures various particle sizes, syncs with the cloud, and automatically recalibrates. 

We also improved the laser: The new PM sensor uses a blue laser—which has a finer wavelength—to measure particles as small as 0.1 microns (700x smaller than the diameter of human hair). These particles are key elements of pollution, allergens, dander, and germs.

On the hardware, Halo analyzes the measurements from the PM sensor 100,000 times per second to determine the size and fundamentals of various pollutants.

In addition to particulate matter, Halo includes a number of other sensors, including volatile organic compound (VOC), temperature, humidity, light, noise, and others—so that you can get the full profile of your environment. 

Wynd Halo combines measurements from all of its sensors to produce actionable information about your environment.

Most pollution sensors measure things in generality. For example, particulate sensors report only report dust concentration and size. We wanted to go deeper and ask the question: What is the actual composition of the air? Is it pollen, dander, smog, or something else?

Using a combination of hardware sensors, machine learning algorithms, and cloud data, Wynd Halo can determine the actual composition of pollutants in your air—from plant pollen to traffic pollution. Knowing the composition of what’s in your air is fundamental to taking the right action.

 

The Wynd Home Purifier was specifically designed to maximize airflow. Most purifiers use one filter, but ours uses two: This doubles the air intake area, so that the purifier can output massive amounts of air. Dual filters create super-fast cleaning speeds and significantly lengthen filter life.

The purifier houses a powerful turbofan which spins at 987 RPM to clean your space quickly. At max, the Wynd Home Purifier generates 537 cubic meters of air per hour, which is enough to clean a 1,200 square foot space in under 30 minutes.

Here's a quick demo of the Wynd Home Purifier in action:

ADD-ON INSTRUCTIONS

You do not need to choose a different reward tier for your add-ons.

NEW BACKERS:

  • Add the amount for each add-on item you want to your Pledge amount 
  • Send us a direct message (click "Contact me") on Kickstarter telling us which add-on items you want (i.e., "a set of V-Series Filters")
  • After the campaign is over, we'll confirm with you which add-ons you want.

PREVIOUS BACKERS:

  • Click the Manage button to manage your pledge amount
  • Click Change your pledge and add the pledge amount for each add-on item you want
  • Send us a direct message (click "Contact me") on Indiegogo telling us which add-on items you want (i.e., "a set of V-Series replacement filters")
  • After the campaign is over, we'll confirm with you which add-ons you want.

 

We created Wynd out of a need to enable healthy and comfortable environments for ourselves and our families wherever we go. 

Ray (founder) frequently traveled to Asia, where poor air quality is a well-known problem. He hated the way pollution made him feel, and wanted to be able to take healthy air with him on the go. We launched our first product, a smart and portable air purifier, on Kickstarter in 2016 and it became the most funded air purifier ever. 

We are excited to be back and introduce two products, Wynd Halo and Wynd Home Purifier, that bring worry-free, fresh air to your home.

story:
Please see what the third party say about X30 Pro

The Cons Of Traditional Vacuum Cleaner

NEX-V All-round Roller Brush

It is hassle-free from switching between hard floors and carpets cleaning heads. Simply use this V-shape all round brush head to deep clean across all floor types.

The bumpy design of NEX-V brush surface can even clean the mess and dirt in the crevices of the floors.

Through vibration when spinning at high speed, the NEX-V brush can smack the hidden dust mites out of the carpet and suck them up simultaneously.

Here is the real video shooting with high speed camera:

Vacuum And Mop In One Step

The X30 Pro can do a nice job of keeping your floor clean and get the job done in no time. Save you a lot of time and effort without the need of extra tools.

Magnetic Mop Box

Deep clean your floor and remove stains or stubborn grime more effectively in one go with the water-resistant roller brush and the attachable magnetic mop box.

ROIDMI adopts the patented state of art technology: ISD - Intelligent Slow dripping that can control the speed of water drip to wet the pad without holding too much water. That’s the perfect status for mopping the hard floors.

With the magnetic mop box design, it can be easily attached to the brush head or unloaded.

Novaron® Antimicrobial Coating

A silver-based antimicrobial agent derived from inorganic ion exchangers developed by Toagosei and Toray Japan.

If you magnify the surface 10,000 times, you can see the Novaron® coating contains of silver ions in the crystal structure.

We Kill Dust Mites Too. Nowhere To Hide.

The X30 Pro comes with a professional dust mites killing brush head, its 800 rpm high speed can disperse all the hidden dust dirt and dust mites from your sofas and beds effectively.

Grooming Service For Your Pet

You can give your pet a nice comforting massage with the pet hair brush grooming attachment, to remove your pet's hair and dead skin directly.

A Variety Of Attachments, More Than Just Floor Cleaning

Empty the Dust Cup With Just One Touch

Keep Your Hands Extra Clean

OLED Color Screen

Display The Real-time Performance And Detailed Status While Cleaning

Wireless Charging

The magnetic dock is the charger, simply drop your X30 Pro into the dock. Vacuum charging has never been so fast and convenient.

Only One Is Enough

One NEX X30 Pro can fulfill all your needs. As powerful as Dyson and perhaps even better, definitely 100% worth buying.

Perks

Referral Program Is Coming

Welcome to join our referral program.For more details, please go to read our latest update.

Global Service

We will supply 2-year warranty coverage on ROIDMI machine, excluding consumable filters. How does it work: If you are located in the country with ROIDMI distributors, we will coordinate with the distributor for the maintenance. Or else, ROIDMI will be responsible for the maintenance. If your vacuum cleaner comes across any quality issue or requires any part replacement during the warranty period, all your need to do is to provide us the relevant videos and pictures. Once the after-sales department verifies, the new replacement will be sent to you without the need to send the machine back to China. These are the countries with ROIDMI distributors: Europe, the United States, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, etc.

For spare parts, you can easily buy them from AliExpress or our local distributors.

Performance Comparing

What Is In The Box?

Manufacturing Now

For the first batch, total 500 units are under production now. This video shows our advancing manufacturing line in Wuxi. Since we start the shipment, we’ve locked all the orders with order number before #694.

Work With Partners:

story:
Air: Powerful Mini Projector For Everyone

Liavs Air isn't only a projector, it's a full entertainment system. Included with built-in speaker, WiFi capability, HDMI input and USB connectivity directly from your phone.

Air is small, smart and super easy to set up. You can turn it on in seconds and connect your device as fast. Then Air can USB or wirelessly mirror content from any iOS or Android mobile device, and charging them at the same time

This means you can simply connect the Air to your phone,  laptop, or gaming console, and turn any flat surface into a silver screen up to 120".

 

Why Liavs Air

Unboxing Review

by SCOTT DUMAS

"It's really really fun and bring the family together"

 

Super Portable, Pocket-sized

7 oz only, similar to iPhone 8 Plus

 

Brilliant Colours And Breathtaking Contrast

Powered by the most advanced DLP® Pico IntelliBright™ algorithms, Liavs Air projects your pictures and videos in brilliant colors and breathtaking contrast.

 

Turn Any Flat Surface Into Silver Screen

Up to 120"

You can simply connect the Air to your phone,  laptop, or gaming console, and turn any flat surface into a silver screen.

 

Built-in Speaker

Heart-Pounding Sound, Wherever You Sit

With the high quality built-in speaker, Liavs Air delivers room-filling sound,  it’s like you’re in a theatre wherever you sit.

 

Audio Output To Your Favorite Speaker

Plug in your favorite speaker and you’ve got a mobile movie theater to share your movies and TV shows with your friends wherever you want.

 

Wireless Screen Mirroring

From Any iOS or Android Devices

 

USB Screen Mirroring and Charging

For Any iOS or Android Devices

 

Connect With Nearly Any Device

Wi-Fi connectivity, HDMI input, and USB Input

With incredibly stable Wi-Fi connectivity, HDMI input, and USB Input, Air is able to connect with nearly any device.

 

2.5 Hours Video Playtime

Enough For A Full Length Movie

 

Suitable For Binging

 

Share Your Photos

On a bigger screen

 

Share Your Favorite Series

In the backyard

 

Binge Your Favorite Games

Anytime, anywhere

 

Perks

 

Molds And Production

Air is ready for mass production, we only need your orders to start it.

 

Liavs Air vs Other Projectors

 

Technical Specifications

 

Timeline

About Liavs

Liavs Team is a group of engineers and designers who have been worked in consumer electronic industry for years. We are pushing the boundary of the the design and technology to make our life more convenient and with higher quality. 

Air is one of our latest designs in 2018 and we introduced the most advanced technology to improve the projecting quality while minimizing the size of the projector. The final product that we presented to you is a balance of both functionality and portability, but there is no compromise on projecting quality. So you can be sure that this tiny projector can bring you convenience that you've never experienced.

 

Risks and Challenges

While we're doing a lot of the work ourselves, obviously we have to rely on others (manufacture, shipping) to provide their end. We're confident that these parts will be no problem, but there still could be something that comes up, be it components supply, shipping, the manufacturing line schedule or any other of the many things that can delay the process. We will do our best, and hope to deliver on time, and whatever happens we will keep you updated every step along the way.

We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

Thanks from the whole team  :)

 
Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
Our Story

Catipilla is a new pet business launched in late 2017. Our products provide a safe and stimulating environment for cats to enjoy their lives and improve their well-being. As pet lovers, enhancing their quality of life is important to us and this was the inspiration behind the creation of Catipilla. Our launch range proved an instant success with Catipilla products now being enjoyed by cats in homes, catios, and catteries within 12 countries. We pride ourselves in producing high-quality, innovative products that improve animal health and well-being by encouraging natural behaviours. We also design products that will last, are great to look at and can be used indoors or out. 

Indiegogo Campaign

Our Indiegogo campaign will enable us to bring a new product to our range. Cat scratching posts offer cats a safe place to clean and sharpen their claws, stretch, and tone muscle; more instinctive behaviours. Many cat owners will know the damage that cats can do to curtains, sofas, and carpets if they don't have somewhere to scratch.

Catipilla's wall-mounted scratching posts come in 3 different lengths – 75cm, 60cm and 50cm. They are replaceable, 100% recyclable and made from the highest quality materials including 8mm sisal rope and anodised aluminum. We have built and tested numerous prototypes and have UK-based manufacturers lined up to create the tooling and assembly lines required to build the product. 

Product Specification & Installation

We have designed this module to be as easy to install as possible. Using just 4 screws, the scratcher will be up in next to no time. You can then take advantage of the clever design to replace a worn scratching cylinder in 30 seconds flat. All the materials selected for this module have been chosen for their quality, longevity and aesthetic appeal. 

 

 
 
 
All of this only becomes possible with the support of the Indiegogo community so please help us. We are looking to raise a minimum of £5,000 on Indiegogo and have some unique pre-launch offers for you with discounts of up to 40%. With this funding in place, we will be able to deliver scratchers within 3 months and bring this exciting new product to cat-loving homes. We are committed to honouring all pledges and rewards made by the Indiegogo community.
 
 

 

Please help us to achieve our goal and let's bring Catipilla's wall-mounted scratchers to market. Help us to spread the word using your own social media channels and through the Indiegogo sharing tools.

Let's make the 'cat' world a better place together.
story_txt:
Our StoryCatipilla is a new pet business launched in late 2017. Our products provide a safe and stimulating environment for cats to enjoy their lives and improve their well-being. As pet lovers, enhancing their quality of life is important to us and this was the inspiration behind the creation of Catipilla. Our launch range proved an instant success with Catipilla products now being enjoyed by cats in homes, catios, and catteries within 12 countries. We pride ourselves in producing high-quality, innovative products that improve animal health and well-being by encouraging natural behaviours. We also design products that will last, are great to look at and can be used indoors or out. Indiegogo CampaignOur Indiegogo campaign will enable us to bring a new product to our range. Cat scratching posts offer cats a safe place to clean and sharpen their claws, stretch, and tone muscle; more instinctive behaviours. Many cat owners will know the damage that cats can do to curtains, sofas, and carpets if they don't have somewhere to scratch.Catipilla's wall-mounted scratching posts come in 3 different lengths – 75cm, 60cm and 50cm. They are replaceable, 100% recyclable and made from the highest quality materials including 8mm sisal rope and anodised aluminum. We have built and tested numerous prototypes and have UK-based manufacturers lined up to create the tooling and assembly lines required to build the product. Product Specification & InstallationWe have designed this module to be as easy to install as possible. Using just 4 screws, the scratcher will be up in next to no time. You can then take advantage of the clever design to replace a worn scratching cylinder in 30 seconds flat. All the materials selected for this module have been chosen for their quality, longevity and aesthetic appeal.  

 
 

 
All of this only becomes possible with the support of the Indiegogo community so please help us. We are looking to raise a minimum of £5,000 on Indiegogo and have some unique pre-launch offers for you with discounts of up to 40%. With this funding in place, we will be able to deliver scratchers within 3 months and bring this exciting new product to cat-loving homes. We are committed to honouring all pledges and rewards made by the Indiegogo community.
 
 
 Please help us to achieve our goal and let's bring Catipilla's wall-mounted scratchers to market. Help us to spread the word using your own social media channels and through the Indiegogo sharing tools.Let's make the 'cat' world a better place together.

story:
How it works

The Electric Paint Lamp Kit is easy to use and makes a perfect gift. The Touch, Dimmer, and Proximity lamps all show off different aspects of Electric Paint and the Light Up Board and are perfect for your home, office or workshop. 

PAINT - Electric Paint Buttons

Use Electric Paint to create the controls for your lamp. Follow our templates or make your own shades!

PLUG - Connect the Light Up Board

After your Electric Paint buttons are dry, twist your Light Up Board into the template to connect it.

Plug the micro USB cable into the Light Up Board and power from a power pack, laptop or phone charger. Works worldwide!

Clip on the included lampshade and you've made a lamp perfect for your home, office or workshop!

PLAY - You've made a lamp!

You did it! You've just transformed a piece of paper into a touch-sensitive lamp. Where will you put yours?

 

Make Three Different Lamps

Turn the Touch Lamp on and off like Bibi! Use the Electric Paint scroll wheel to adjust the brightness on the Dimmer Lamp like Jon! Hover your hand over the Proximity lamp and be amazed like Matt!

 

Color, create and customize!

Ready to take it to the next level? Great! The lamps in the Electric Paint Lamp Kit are made of paper which means they are easy to customise. Cut and color the included lamp shades or make your own.

Want to move beyond our templates? No problem, we'll be providing design files to make it easy to print and cut your own.

Do you have a Silhouette Cameo or similar cutting machine? If so you can really go crazy, making lamps out of any material you can think of! Back the project for updates on how we used our Silhouette Cameo to make the lamps for our video.

 

What is Electric Paint?

Electric Paint is an electrically conductive paint! Non-toxic and water-based you can paint buttons, circuits or use as a conductive adhesive on almost anything including paper, plastic, and textiles. 

Electric Paint is electrically conductive which means it can carry a current to light an LED or be used as a sensor as it is in the Electric Paint Lamp Kit.

Use the included 10ml Electric Paint tube to create touch-sensitive controls for your lamps in almost any size or shape.

Want to learn more about Electric Paint? Great! Check out the video below and head over to bareconductive.com for technical information, application ideas and tons of projects.

 

What is the Light Up Board?

The Light Up Board is the heart of the Electric Paint Lamp Kit. It works straight out of the box, is powered by USB and requires no programming or special tools. 

The Light Up Board is inspired by the numerous community projects which use our Electric Paint to control lighting projects

The board's six bright LEDs and three different modes provide the light for your lamps and the super easy connector system means that you can create lamps on any sheet material.

The Light Up Board's connector system enables you to create lamps on any sheet material. All that’s need are a few simple cuts and a twist!

The Light Up Board is for more than paper! Get creative and use three different lighting modes to take your project anywhere!

 

Why are we making Electric Paint Lamps?

The Electric Paint Lamp Kit is a direct response to our community, who have been using Electric Paint to make touch-sensitive buttons for interactive books, wallpaper, installations and more.

 

Rewards

Thinking about backing? Awesome! We'd love to have you on board and we want to make it easy. Our rewards all feature our Electric Paint Lamp Kit in different quantities. We're also discounting multiples so you get more for your money. Running a workshop or interested in reselling? Go for the x5 or x10 perks!

Each Kit Includes the following:
1 x Light Up Board 
1 x Electric Paint 10ml Tube 
1 x Micro USB Cable 
1 x Touch Lamp Template 
1 x Dimmer Lamp Template 
1 x Proximity Lamp Template 
1 x Instruction Test Sheet

 

Who is Bare Conductive?

Us! You might know us from Electric Paint – the first consumer-facing electrically conductive paint, from the Touch Board, or maybe you've seen our recent Mashable video that's had 60M views!

But if you don't know us, you might know someone from our incredible community of creators who have used our technology to make murals that talk, paintings that sing and countless other amazing projects! We wouldn't be here without them- thanks, everyone!

For more on us, our technology and what our community is up to head over to bareconductive.com

 

Thanks!

Thanks to our friends who've helped make this campaign possible. Special thanks to Sidekick for collaborating on an awesome video.


 

Risks and challenges

Crowdfunding isn't easy! We have experience designing, manufacturing, and distributing, and we've produced and shipped over 200,000 products since we started our company, but we can still make mistakes. So as with all of our new product launches, we're approaching this campaign carefully.

The largest single risk for this project is the production of the Light Up Board. It is a brand new PCB and we have not yet completed a full-scale production run. Our pre-manufacturing runs have caught a number of issues (as they are designed to do), but there is still the risk that we'll have a design problem, components supply issue, or supplier failure. We mitigate these risks by working with our manufacturers to check the design at each stage, having replacement components on our BOM and having backup suppliers in our supply chain.

Production of our Electric Paint tubes, lamp templates and product packaging presents less of a risk as we are in series production with these (or very similar) items. Nonetheless, we strive to mitigate the potential risks in the manufacture of these items through planning, communication, and redundancy.

story:
Years ago, there was only one option if you needed to grind up some herbs: rubbing stones together with your bare hands. Herb grinders have come a long way from that, of course, but if you look around the market, you'll probably sense there's something missing. Taking all the best design concepts and improving on them, we have created Stona to be the premier combo mortar-grinder-grater, putting extreme grinding power in your hands. 

 

 

 

The innovative, unique design and function stands out and is completely different from most herb grinders on the market. Stona was created to be more than a product of functionality and convenience but a ritual.

 

 

What's special about Stona?

Perfect for dried herbs and dried flowers, Stona slices instead of shredding, its razor-sharp microblades (more than 900 in total) working together to give you a choice as to just how fine you want the grind to be, changing out either of the two grater plates according to your tastes or needs. Stona comes with two changeable magnetic stainless steel grater plates – one for a fine grind and one for a medium grind.

 

 

The microblades are situated 30% underneath the upper grating surface, preventing them from slicing anything but your herbs.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Stona comes with two changeable magnetic stainless steel grater plates – one for a fine grind and one for a medium grind – unlike anything else on the market, and its woodcasing is both attractive and efficient. The lid is made from durable space grade anodized aluminum, the storage chamber is air-sealed, and you never need to screw anything together.

 

We produce 95% of our components locally, including wood curated from the Bavarian forest, handcrafted mouth-blown smoked glass - which is uniquely made by traditional glassmakers - and wood parts produced and finished in Germany. In addition, we are using 100% organic linseed oil for the wood finish and ensuring that everything in Stona is sustainable and recyclable. 

 

 

 

You can build your collection of herbs quickly with the Stonitos, storage jars, which are air-sealed and tinted for long-lasting freshness. Each Stonito jar is made from mouth-blown glass and a wooden lid, which pops on and off.

You can add one ore more storage jars as add-ons to your pledge. You will find the add-ons when you go through the check out process.

 

 

 

 

Living and working in Germany, we're passionate about grinding herb. We've worked in the automotive industry, and this project is a labor of love for us, much more fulfilling than any other day job we have ever had. In the living room, in the kitchen, and even out in the Alps, this grinder is something we created to make your life easier – and to make grinding something you can finally get excited about.

 

 

 

 

Any questions or comments you would like to share with us?

Contact us via email at info@iamstona.com

or

Send us a message on Facebook

 

Be part of this amazing project! Your contributions will make it possible for us to offer Stona to a wider market, and to say thanks, we are offering Stona here first – a true crowdfunding product launch! 

Know someone who has some extra herbs or spices to grind? Let them know what Stona is and why it will make a difference in their lives. Spread the word far and wide!

Thank you so much for your support!

-Stona Team

We've set a high bar for ourselves, and we don't intend to compromise on that. Unless we can make Stona the best grinder out there, we don't see the point in making it at all. You can count on us to remain committed to building high-quality products and keeping our contributors updated every step of the way.

story:
We turn on the faucet at least 4-5 times a day, to wash our hands, to wash our face, to wash vegetables, to wash the dishes, to wash our hair…

But, have you really washed them clean?

MiniBle S is a thumb-sized faucet aerator that can upgrade the quality of our home water usage. Installed on the average faucet, water flows through the MiniBle S and is filled with abundant amounts of nanobubbles, which are able to achieve the effects of cleansing, bacteria-killing and food preservation.


Unlike ordinary water, water that flows through MiniBle S is filled with nanobubbles that burst and create instantaneous high temperatures of 5500°C and high pressure,lasting less than 3 milliseconds and harmless to humans, but effective in killing bacteria and breaking down chemicals such as pesticides and detergents.


Tested to be 2-3 times more effective than ordinary water in removing harmful substances.
 


The nanobubbles created by MiniBle S are 500 times smaller than the size of human pores and can enter into the skin or vegetables surfaces to bring away dirt and achieve thorough cleansing.

*The size of human pores is approximately 20-50 micrometers while MiniBle S nanobubbles are only 100 nanometers(0.1micrometer).


Same tap. Save 30% water usage. You will be saving 43,800 gallons per year, enough to fill 4 swimming pools!

Join us, for a cleaner HOME and Earth！


MiniBle can fill per cc of water with up to 500 thousand negative ions, which helps to relieve stress and refresh your day. Offering you the experience of soaking in the atmosphere of nature.


In the past, it would take motorized machines to create an abundant amount of fine bubbles through vibrations and applying pressure.


MiniBle S is the World’s Most Compact Nanobubble Generator: With the patented micro Gas Liquid Mixing(mGLM)technology, no additional energy is required and simply by using water pressure, the finest nanobubbles ever are created.
 

No additional consumption of energy, no additional consumption of resources .

Pesticide residue test I

Removal rate of pesticides with MiniBle S nanobubble water is 2-3 times of that with ordinary water.


Pesticide residue test II

Most produce have a Preharvest Interval (PHI), the wait time between a pesticide application and when the produce can be harvested. This means that by the time of harvest, the pesticide residue on the produce is of a safe level for human consumption.

To test the effectiveness of MIniBle S in reducing pesticide residue, we requested from a farmer for lemon produce still within the preharvest interval to conduct the washing test and the results of the pesticide residue were all within tolerance levels.

*Rigorous testing conditions: Lemons harvested just 3 days after applying pesticides.


Antibacterial Test - E. coli

4-log reduction in eliminating bacteria and continuous inhibiting effects.


We are the HerherS team, made up of a father and his two sons, brought together by ideals and environmental issues, and dedicated to designing products that“improve human lives and protect the environment”. Our team has 26 years of experience in research and development and has been operating since 1991.


As the problems of pollution increase, we hope to take action for our earth, our society, and our next generation, and MiniBle S is our first step to making a change.

We have come to Kickstarter to launch a crowdfunding campaign because we need to reach those who care about the environment and social issues to influence even more people together!

story:
Ultra-Absorbent Premium Microfiber Towels

A Cleaning Expert Built A Better Towel

YouTube sensation and cleaning expert Melissa Maker introduced the world to Maker's Clean microfiber cleaning cloths in 2016 and people lost their minds! Microfiber has revolutionized the cleaning industry, so we thought, why not revolutionize the bath towel industry too?!

Now, we're proud to introduce a full line of premium microfiber bath towels. Featuring our unique waffle weave pattern, these anti-microbial towels will dry you faster and more efficiently than traditional cotton towels.

Unlike cotton, which just pushes water and debris around, microfiber's unique construction absorbs and removes liquids at an astonishing rate—no longer will you feel like you're drying yourself with a wet dog. And, because of microfiber's unique ability to dry unbelievably fast, and the fact that it is anti-microbial, we have also effectively eliminated that musty, mildewy, "towel funk" smell which develops over time in traditional cotton towels.

With over ten years of professional experience, we know a good towel when we see it, and when we see a great towel, we put our name on it.

The Perfect Multi-Purpose Towel

Aside from drying quickly, these non-linting, anti-microbial towels are also super compact, folding up at less than half the size of a traditional cotton towel—perfect for going across town or across the country.

What Is Microfiber Anyway?

Microfiber can be hard to understand because everything is so, well, microscopic! To give you an idea, each fiber in microfiber is three times finer than cotton, eight times finer than wool, and one hundred times finer than a human hair!

These fibers, made from 80% polyester and 20% polyamide, are woven together to create a yarn, which is then woven into a cloth material that is incredibly absorbent. In fact, they can hold approximately 8 times their weight in water and can dry you up to 10 times faster than traditional cotton towels! 

The Microfiber Difference: Microfiber vs Cotton

Why does microfiber dry so quickly, and why is it used by cleaning experts everywhere? In short, microfiber is made up of ultra-fine fibers which are then split to produce an "asterisk" type of shape. This shape is designed specifically to create maximum absorbency and to pick up microscopic materials like dirt, debris, and water. This is in contrast to traditional cotton towels, whose thick pillar shape just pushes dirt and water around, and doesn't do such a good job at absorbing. In addition to this, microfiber is anti-microbial and the "asterisk" shaped fibers also dry incredibly quick.

A Word From Our Founder

Melissa Maker is an entrepreneur, cleaning expert, founder of Toronto’s most popular boutique cleaning service, star of the Clean My Space YouTube channel, and editor of the Clean My Space blog. Dishing out expert advice has garnered her over a hundred million YouTube views, a published book, and has led to her appearance on The Today Show and Rachael Ray, as well as features in Real Simple, InStyle, and Better Homes and Gardens.

Aside from drying quickly, these non-linting, anti-microbial towels are also super compact, folding up at less than half the size of a traditional cotton towel—perfect for going across town or across the country.


What Is Microfiber Anyway?
Microfiber can be hard to understand because everything is so, well, microscopic! To give you an idea, each fiber in microfiber is three times finer than cotton, eight times finer than wool, and one hundred times finer than a human hair!
These fibers, made from 80% polyester and 20% polyamide, are woven together to create a yarn, which is then woven into a cloth material that is incredibly absorbent. In fact, they can hold approximately 8 times their weight in water and can dry you up to 10 times faster than traditional cotton towels! 
The Microfiber Difference: Microfiber vs Cotton
Why does microfiber dry so quickly, and why is it used by cleaning experts everywhere? In short, microfiber is made up of ultra-fine fibers which are then split to produce an "asterisk" type of shape. This shape is designed specifically to create maximum absorbency and to pick up microscopic materials like dirt, debris, and water. This is in contrast to traditional cotton towels, whose thick pillar shape just pushes dirt and water around, and doesn't do such a good job at absorbing. In addition to this, microfiber is anti-microbial and the "asterisk" shaped fibers also dry incredibly quick.

A Word From Our Founder
Melissa Maker is an entrepreneur, cleaning expert, founder of Toronto’s most popular boutique cleaning service, star of the Clean My Space YouTube channel, and editor of the Clean My Space blog. Dishing out expert advice has garnered her over a hundred million YouTube views, a published book, and has led to her appearance on The Today Show and Rachael Ray, as well as features in Real Simple, InStyle, and Better Homes and Gardens.

story:
Update!
Kuku Tini has a new home!

A BIG Vinaka Vakalevu to all the Funders, our team of builders, volunteers and support crew. Checkout the update page for photos and more!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kuku Tini is an amazing man,

He started a permaculture garden even without knowing it many years back and has been living under a tarp and some scrap roofing iron for many years.

His age is catching up with him and it is very hard to watch him suffer with no clean or dry place to escape to.  This fundraiser will happen with or without your help but will be so much more successful if you can assist.  We will take any materials we can gather up to build something to keep him dry and in a better place.  After he has a dry place to live we will assist him to receive as much medical treatment as possible to hopefully slow the problems with his feet.

Tini's Life:

Tini was born March 4th, 1939 in Suva, Fiji.

He was one of 7 children with 5 boys and 2 girls in the family.

He was named after Ratu Peni Mataitini.

At about 16 years of age he came to Taveuni with his family and helped plant in Vuna and Udukacu where he stays now.  He went to join the British Army when he was 17 but his mother requested that he return home to do the planting with his brother for the family.   

He now lives in an amazing food forest full of Fiji medicine, exotic fruits and tropical plants of all kinds that he started over 50 years ago.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The money is going straight towards the purchase of materials to build a roof and hopefully a tin house
  • We are donating as many materials as we have and all of our time to build and manage two staff to help with the build
  • If we don't reach our goal we will use any money to make Tini a roof, dry bed, dry feet, and some medical assistance.
  • If you would like we did a recording of Tini playing the guitar as he said it was his dream.  We could offer a song or possibly a short video of him playing his song.

Impact

  • We can do it... it will change one person's life from suffering to manageable.

You Can Help

If you can't contribute then please help us spread the word,
Thanks and love.

story:
Mission Statement

Green Light Evolution's aim is to focus on Canada's amazing collection of artists from coast, to coast, to coast. Our goal is to enhance the art that is emerging in our beautiful country and entice, encourage, and engage artists from different areas and disciplines to provide a hub where new, creative collaborations can be made.  Connection is key and we want this site to facilitate, educate, and inspire artists to show the world that Canada has a strong artistic identity. Through building and reinforcing our artistic community nationwide, we plan on building long-lasting partnerships, friendships, and camaraderie within Canada's artistic mosaic.


The Idea
The goal here is to create a website to act as a hub for Canadian artists, so that they can connect with each other across all mediums, see what projects are up and coming, and collaborate on new works of art. 
We will have monthly feature articles from all parts of the country, to praise and promote artists and/or art groups for their hard work, and extraordinary dedication and talent; we will also have daily news and reviews. 
There will be galleries for photography and visual arts, as well as sections for music, acting, dance, and other performance based arts.  We plan on including a live messaging board to encourage artists to share their works, processes, and opinions; this will make it easier for contributing Canadian artists to meet each other and collaborate on new, amazing pieces.
A weekly video blog will be posted on our YouTube channel to give you a quick breakdown of what's going on in the arts throughout Canada. 
Green Light will also be hosting events and workshops across the country  for artists of all walks, including, but not limited to:
     ~Creative Writing Workshops
     ~Character Building Workshops
     ~Cabarets
     ~Comedy Shows
     ~Concerts
     ~Combat Workshops for stage/screen
     ~Character Voice/Vocal Workshops
The People
Matt Dale and Anthony Leclair, since completion of their initial post-secondary work, have spent over a decade, between the two of them, working in the arts. 
Matt Dale hails from the small town of Sundre, Alberta. After high school he took a two year Theatre Performance & Creation course at Red Deer College. He then spent four years performing in several plays in central Alberta, as well as working as dramaturge and performing in educational anti-tobacco and body image shows for the Mountain View school board in Alberta. He wrote for and performed in a sketch troupe called BullSkit for three years, performed as 'Joliet' Jake Blues in several onstage revivals of The Blues Brothers, spent a summer guiding interactive tours in the underground tunnels in Moose Jaw, Saskatchewan, and has also spent a lot of time in Alberta writing one act plays and short films. Matt moved to Toronto to specialize in comedy at Humber College's Comedy Writing and Performance program and kept active in the sketch comedy community for two years in the troupe 'The Birch Street Crooners'. As a huge fan and supporter of the arts, Matt is thrilled to be working on a project that will bring Canada's artists together and unite our creative minds.

Anthony Leclair comes from the small town of Deep River, ON, in the heart of the Ottawa Valley. Having discovered his love for writing, music, and theatre there, he then travelled to North Bay, ON to attend Canadore College's Theatre Arts Program. Graduating in 2009, Anthony moved to Ottawa, ON where he found steady work as a musician, releasing his first official album. After leaving Ottawa in 2011, Anthony moved several times between Deep River, and North Bay for various theatre and film productions, he took several stage combat certification courses in Toronto, and began to settle into some writing for Toronto magazine, Swept Media, of which he is now the managing editor. Spending a year in Halifax, NS, Anthony worked as a busker, and put up a dramatic read of Michael Healey's 'Proud'; the first in the maritimes. He also connected with GUFF Music Magazine, based in Halifax, to which he still contributes. Coming back to Ontario, Anthony made the move to Toronto to complete his actor combatant training at Rapier Wit, and is now living in Toronto hosting a weekly open mic at the Black Irish, writing for Raz Mataz Music Magazine, and working with Red One Theatre Collective on a production of Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf. He feels incredibly lucky to have met Matt, and hopes that together they can reach out to artists all across the country, so that they may learn from, and share with artists from coast, to coast, to coast.  


The Breakdown
With your help, we are aiming to raise $1000.00 to get the green light on this project.
This money will be balanced between creating our website, and funding our official launch, which will be a grand gala devoted to Canadian arts, held at the historical Gladstone Hotel, in downtown Toronto, 
$400.00 will be allocated to the website.
     ~$300.00 will be paid to the website designer.
     ~$100.00 for administrative fees to host/publish the site.
$600.00 will be allotted for the launch at the Gladstone Hotel:
     ~$350.00 for rental of the space
     ~$50.00 for canvasses and supplies for our 'Art Fusion' (a fun exercise where visual artists are each given 5min on a single canvass, and must expand on each other's creation) raffle. 
     ~$200.00 remaining, will go to promotion of the event (business cards, advertising, and merchandise).

Perks
Any contribution to this cause will be extremely appreciated.  Our different levels of perks are as follows:
$5.00-$9.00 donations will get you a personal thank you on our social media and site.
$10.00-$19.00 donations will also get you the personal thank you as well as the opportunity to suggest up to 3 different artists or art groups for us to cover on the site right off the bat.
$20.00-$29.00 donations will earn you the first two perks as well as your choice of one first generation piece of Green Light Evolution merchandise.
$30.00-$49.00 donations gets you all the thank you, the artists recommendations, and two pieces of merchandise. 
$50.00 donations and up will get you all of the above, plus free admittance to any and all Green Light Evolution functions, and workshops, as our special sponsor for life.
If, by chance, we do not reach our goal of $1000.00, the funds we do collect, up to $400.00, will be going to the building of the website, and any funds remaining beyond that point will be spent on the launch gala.  

Impact
Our main intent through Green Light Evolution is to strengthen our artistic community in Canada by connecting creative minds from coast, to coast, to coast. 
We want to open up a path for artists to be able to explore, and engage with all forms of artistry, and to provide a stable support system for artists of all mediums. 
We as artists must rely on each other for not only the future, but for the present state of arts in Canada; we must evolve together from humble beginnings to work toward reaching our true potential, wherever that may lie. 

Risks & Challenges
We so often hear tell of Canada's lack of artistic identity, but we know there is a constancy of amazing Canadian art to be found around us everyday, and though we know the road to connecting us all may be long, and not always well paved, we want to travel it to meet you, and share with Canada your craft and capability.


Other Ways You Can Help
Apart from using the Indiegogo share tools, you can always help us by spreading the word and promoting us through our social media (Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, etc), and by sharing with us and introducing us to artists across the country; we may not know you yet, but we want to.

story:
MEET YOUR NEW LEELUU FRIENDS: OWL, HEDGEHOG AND CAT!

LeeLuu Nightlights are the cuddliest, most magical soft nightlights to help kids sleep! They can sense your touch and they give children a comforting light when they need it.

Each animal is handcrafted and its cover is machine washable making Leeluu designed to last!

 
 

 

 


LeeLuu Prototypes tested at home.

 

 

 

READ WHAT OTHERS THINK ABOUT OUR CUTE LEELUUS:

Read more here: Core77 (En)  |  FastCoDesign (En)   |  mental_floss (En)   |  rakunew (Jp) | Babyology (En) |
In addition some great Mum Bloggers have written about LeeLuu:
Puutalobaby (Fi) , Lily (Fi), LifeLoveWife (Ger)

 

 

A MAGICAL LIGHT EXPERIENCE

 

Children travel through their imagination on their way to sleep. LeeLuu is a companion on that journey, a friend who spreads a comforting light. 

LeeLuus feel like magic because they are touch-controlled. This is also very practical, children instantly get the light they need, when they need it, without having to get out of bed.

The LeeLuus work in the most simple and intuitive way. You can turn them on by squeezing or hugging them. To get the right brightness, gently pat them on the back.

Squeeze or hug to switch your LeeLuu on

Pat its back to adjust brightness

 

DESIGNED TO LAST

LeeLuu is designed to stay with your child as they grow. That’s why the LeeLuus are both washable and easily rechargeable. You can remove the fabric cover with a childproof zipper and wash it. The batteries are charged with a standard Micro-USB cable (included in the package), the same as is used for many smart phones.

 


TEXTILES THAT FEEL

LeeLuus are touch controlled. This is possible because of textile sensors that can "feel" human touch.

This is enabled through conductive fabrics, fabrics that can be used to measure changes in electric field. Through measuring these changes, a multitude of inputs can be sensed, for example touch.

Developing textile sensors and great applications for them is LeeLuu Labs core expertise. We have patent pending for our own unique textile sensor technology. Our goal is to develop even more products based on this new patented tech.

 

IN THE DARK, YOUR IMAGINATION CAN TURN SCARY.

 

Kids have active imaginations. That’s a wonderful thing, but it can also make night time a bit scary for them sometimes. Fear of darkness affects 8 out of 10 kids and many children don't get enough sleep because of it. Like many parents, our co-founder Emmi Pouta has had this challenge with her own children. Her experience helped us when we created LeeLuu Nightlights.

 

 

WHO IS WORKING ON THIS?

LeeLuu Labs is a startup based in Helsinki, Finland. Our founders are from Finland, Sweden and Germany. We share a strong background in design. Developing products for the real needs of people is at the heart of what we do.

From left to right:

Hanna  Markgren

Is an industrial designer who leads all the work we do with users. She is also the maker of all our beautiful illustrations.

 

Lisa Gerkens

Is an industrial designer who has specialized in products with built-in electronics. She builds the coolest prototypes so we can test out all our products quickly with users.

 

Heini Salovuori

Is our business developer specialized in customer experience. She’s the one who makes sure all our creative ideas make proper business sense.

Emmi Pouta

Is a textile designer in charge of the textile technology that enables the LeeLuus to be touch-controlled. She has two children who are our very own in-house testers.

 

 

 

CO- CREATED WITH 100 KIDS

 

We love building and product development! Our first LeeLuus were developed together with over 100 children in the Helsinki area and their families. The kids helped us design both how the LeeLuus look and feel, and how they work. Read more about how we work with kids on Core77.

The LeeLuus have also been tested at home with families. The biggest “problem” from those tests was that kids didn’t want to give the LeeLuus back. You can read a review from Krista at the Puutalobaby family blog (in Finnish). She tells us her kids immediately fell in love with the LeeLuus.

 

Textile design and Characters

 

 

 

Workshopping with kids

 

LeeLuu visiting testers at home

 

 

 

DESIGN FROM FINLAND

We are happy to have been awarded the Design from Finland mark, together with great brands such as Iittala and Marimekko.

 

 

EUROPEAN PRODUCTION & TESTING

 

In order to be part of every step of the production process, we’re producing the LeeLuus here in Europe.

Before shipping, the LeeLuus will be properly tested and certified. Our independent partner Grant4com will be in charge of the testing process. They will help us make sure all the LeeLuus fulfil all necessary certifications and safety regulations.

 

 

 

 

 

PROJECT TIMELINE

 

We will be ready to start producing as soon as this campaign reaches its goal. We have selected our partners for production who are waiting for our go-ahead. In this campaign we sell the complete first batch of LeeLuus and are aiming to deliver before Christmas 2016!

 

USE OF FUNDS

Crowdfunding is a way for us to get enough funding to manufacture our first batch of LeeLuus. This is a visualisation of how we intend to use the campaign funds upon reaching our goal.

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

 

We spend a great deal of time figuring out all challenges and potential problems that might arise.

While the LeeLuus are ready to produce, please be aware that a lot can happen during the production. In order to make sure the best possible product comes to your house some minor changes might happen.

We have chosen our estimated shipping date very conservatively and left some buffer for potential delays. We can’t give a guaranteed shipping date, but we will do our utmost to ship on time.

 

FAQs:

 

 

First time to Indiegogo? No worries, Its super easy!

  1. Have a good look at the campaign and watch our cute video!
  2. Decide how many LeeLuus you would like to purchase for yourself and/or to give away. 
  3. Select the right perk on the right side of the page.
  4. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
  5. Share our campaign and help make LeeLuu happen!
  6. When the campaign is over we will contact you and ask what characters you want.
  7. We will keep you updated about our manufacturing progress.
  8. You will receive your LeeLuu!

    If you have any troubles at all send us a message to crowdfunding@leeluu.fi 
    We are happy to help!
I don't have a PayPal account? What do I do?

No worries, you don't need one you can also pay with all common credit and debit cards! For further questions just send us an email to crowdfunding@leeluu.fi or call us at +358(0)469535849

What’s a LeeLuu?
LeeLuus are soft nightlights. They glow from within and are controlled by touch.

 

How many characters are there?
There are three characters. Hedgehog, Owl and Cat. As soon as the campaign is over we’ll contact you and ask you which one you want.

 

Are the skins changeable and washable?
Yes they are! You can remove them very easily without having to fiddle with any cables.They can be replaced with a new skin or then washed.

 

Can I buy extra-skins?
Not right now, but soon you will be able! Just follow our journey and we will keep you updated.

 

Are LeeLuus Safe?
They certainly are! LeeLuus meet all necessary safety regulations and standards of the EU and the USA.

 

Where are you producing?
We are producing in Europe. It’s important for us to be able to be part of the process and make sure everything goes according to plan.

 

How do I charge my LeeLuu?
Just open the childproof zipper to access the Micro-USB charging socket, then take the cable (yes it’s included comes with your order) and plug it in!

 

How long do the batteries last?
The batteries last up to 20 hours on full strength. Average use is 30 mins to 2 hours per day.

 

What is the lightsource in LeeLuu?
LeeLuu has 6 electrically efficient LED lights. LEDs don’t produce heat and are cool to the touch.

I don't live in the EU or USA can I still get a LeeLuu?
We can make that work! Please send a request at crowdfunding@leeluu.fi  Make sure to put "Other country Order" in the subject and we will get back to you!

 

Why does Hedgehog have purple ears?
It's just mad cute and goes well with his spikes.

 

How do I choose the character?
Once all orders all in and the campaign successfully finished, we will contact you to confirm your buy and choose your character (Hedgehog, Owl or Cat)!

 

How does this crowdfunding thing work?
Crowdfunding is there for people to make projects happen together. When many people buy a LeeLuu in advance we can afford a production run and you will get your LeeLuu! This is a great way to make cool project come alive!

 

What is inside LeeLuu? How does LeeLuu keep its shape?
LeeLuus’ essentially have 4 parts: a plastic enclosure that holds electronics and batteries, a foam piece that gives shape, a textile sensor, the cute cover that holds it all together.

 

For what age-group of children is LeeLuu suitable for?
LeeLuu is primarily designed for kids between 3-12 years old. We have learned that it is the key age in which children travel through their imagination on their way to sleep. LeeLuu is a companion on that journey, a friend who spreads a comforting light.

Who did your lovely video and awesome photography?
That was George. You can find him here (he lives in the internet) http://www.georgeatanassov.com/ 

 

Can adults buy LeeLuus?
Yes you can, they are totally good for grown-ups as well and we get that question a lot! You are not alone, my friend.

 

PARTNERS:

To develop our connected LeeLuu concept we are partnering with CreatiFI.
Our partner in testing and certifications is Grant4com.

 

 

                    

 

 

LEGAL TALK : 

Web Sales Terms and Return Policy
The Indiegogo LeeLuus come with 14 return policy. You may cancel any time before you have received your order or until 14 days have passed from when you received your order.
If you cancel your order, you will have to pay for your shipping when returning the products.
LeeLuus are manufactured and sold by the Finnish limited liability company LeeLuu Labs Oy (Business ID 2661620-9), located at Betonimiehenkuja 5C, 02150 Espoo, Finland. You can contact us by visiting our website leeluu.fi or by e-mail crowdfunding@leeluu.fi.
In case you are not happy with our conduct, you may report us and your dispute to the Finnish Customer Dispute Board, http://www.kuluttajariita.fi/en/.
We deliver to countries covered by CE and FCC regulations. Namely countries of the  European Union , the United States of America.
Return form information:
Right to Cancel:
You have the right to cancel this order within 14 days of receiving the products (or at any time before receiving the products) without stating any reason.
To cancel your order, you have to notify us (LeeLuu Labs Oy, business ID ID 2661620-9), located at Betonimiehenkuja 5C, 02150 Espoo, Finland, leeluu.fi, +358(0)469535849 by e-mail within the cancellation period at crowdfunding@leeluu.fi with the subject “Order cancellation”. You may use the attached return form, but it is not necessary. You may also fill out our cancellation and return form at our website, leeluu.fi. If you choose this option, we will immediately notify you via e-mail of having received your cancellation order.
To stay within the cancellation period, it is enough that you notify us of your cancellation order within the cancellation period.
Effects of Canceling:
If you cancel your order, we will return everything you have paid to us, shipping costs included (excluding possible additional costs, if you have opted for a more expensive shipping type), without undue delay and in any case within 14 days of receiving your cancel order. We will return the sum paid using the same payment method you used in your original order, if you have not explicitly agreed upon other means and in any case using a method which will not cause costs to you.
We may keep your your money until we have received the items you returned.
For returns, please send the products back to us (LeeLuu Labs Oy,Betonimiehenkuja 5 C, 02150 Espoo, Finland, 00560 Helsinki, Finland) without undue delay and within 14 days of sending the cancellation order to us. To stay within the return period, it is enough that you send the products back to us within those 14 days.
You will have to pay for the shipping costs for the returns.
In case the value of the products have declined, you may be responsible for the part that does not result from the handling and use necessary to confirm the nature, features and functionality of the products.
Warranty:
The products are sold “as is” and LeeLuu Labs makes no express warranties concerning them. However, the customer will always have the rights set out in the Finnish Consumer Protection Act (38/1978) or the European Consumer Directive.
Pre-order Clause:
This Indiegogo campaign is for pre ordering LeeLuu. We will take our best efforts to finish the products so we can deliver in December 2016, but due to the nature of the project, we can give no guarantee on this.

 

CALL THE LEELUU PHONE

If you have any questions for us or just wanna say hi, call the LeeLuu phone!

+358 (0) 469 535 849

 

You can talk directly with the friendly LeeLuu team with our phone number. Buying a LeeLuu is easy, we will answer your questions in a really straight-forward and simple way.

We speak English, Finnish, Swedish, German and (not by any means perfect) French.

In Finnish: Mietityttääkö, kysymyksiä mielessä? Soita meille!
story_txt:
MEET YOUR NEW LEELUU FRIENDS: OWL, HEDGEHOG AND CAT!LeeLuu Nightlights are the cuddliest, most magical soft nightlights to help kids sleep! They can sense your touch and they give children a comforting light when they need it.Each animal is handcrafted and its cover is machine washable making Leeluu designed to last!    LeeLuu Prototypes tested at home.   READ WHAT OTHERS THINK ABOUT OUR CUTE LEELUUS:Read more here: Core77 (En)  |  FastCoDesign (En)   |  mental_floss (En)   |  rakunew (Jp) | Babyology (En) |In addition some great Mum Bloggers have written about LeeLuu:Puutalobaby (Fi) , Lily (Fi), LifeLoveWife (Ger)  A MAGICAL LIGHT EXPERIENCE Children travel through their imagination on their way to sleep. LeeLuu is a companion on that journey, a friend who spreads a comforting light. LeeLuus feel like magic because they are touch-controlled. This is also very practical, children instantly get the light they need, when they need it, without having to get out of bed.The LeeLuus work in the most simple and intuitive way. You can turn them on by squeezing or hugging them. To get the right brightness, gently pat them on the back.Squeeze or hug to switch your LeeLuu onPat its back to adjust brightness DESIGNED TO LASTLeeLuu is designed to stay with your child as they grow. That’s why the LeeLuus are both washable and easily rechargeable. You can remove the fabric cover with a childproof zipper and wash it. The batteries are charged with a standard Micro-USB cable (included in the package), the same as is used for many smart phones. 
TEXTILES THAT FEEL
LeeLuus are touch controlled. This is possible because of textile sensors that can "feel" human touch.This is enabled through conductive fabrics, fabrics that can be used to measure changes in electric field. Through measuring these changes, a multitude of inputs can be sensed, for example touch.Developing textile sensors and great applications for them is LeeLuu Labs core expertise. We have patent pending for our own unique textile sensor technology. Our goal is to develop even more products based on this new patented tech. IN THE DARK, YOUR IMAGINATION CAN TURN SCARY. Kids have active imaginations. That’s a wonderful thing, but it can also make night time a bit scary for them sometimes. Fear of darkness affects 8 out of 10 kids and many children don't get enough sleep because of it. Like many parents, our co-founder Emmi Pouta has had this challenge with her own children. Her experience helped us when we created LeeLuu Nightlights.  
WHO IS WORKING ON THIS?
LeeLuu Labs is a startup based in Helsinki, Finland. Our founders are from Finland, Sweden and Germany. We share a strong background in design. Developing products for the real needs of people is at the heart of what we do.

From left to right:
Hanna  Markgren
Is an industrial designer who leads all the work we do with users. She is also the maker of all our beautiful illustrations.
 
Lisa Gerkens
Is an industrial designer who has specialized in products with built-in electronics. She builds the coolest prototypes so we can test out all our products quickly with users.  
Heini Salovuori Is our business developer specialized in customer experience. She’s the one who makes sure all our creative ideas make proper business sense.

Emmi Pouta
Is a textile designer in charge of the textile technology that enables the LeeLuus to be touch-controlled. She has two children who are our very own in-house testers. 

 
 
CO- CREATED WITH 100 KIDS
 
We love building and product development! Our first LeeLuus were developed together with over 100 children in the Helsinki area and their families. The kids helped us design both how the LeeLuus look and feel, and how they work. Read more about how we work with kids on Core77.
The LeeLuus have also been tested at home with families. The biggest “problem” from those tests was that kids didn’t want to give the LeeLuus back. You can read a review from Krista at the Puutalobaby family blog (in Finnish). She tells us her kids immediately fell in love with the LeeLuus.
 
Textile design and Characters
 
 

 
Workshopping with kids
 
LeeLuu visiting testers at home
  
  
DESIGN FROM FINLAND
We are happy to have been awarded the Design from Finland mark, together with great brands such as Iittala and Marimekko.
 


 
EUROPEAN PRODUCTION & TESTING
 
In order to be part of every step of the production process, we’re producing the LeeLuus here in Europe.
Before shipping, the LeeLuus will be properly tested and certified. Our independent partner Grant4com will be in charge of the testing process. They will help us make sure all the LeeLuus fulfil all necessary certifications and safety regulations. 
 
 

 

 

PROJECT TIMELINE
 
We will be ready to start producing as soon as this campaign reaches its goal. We have selected our partners for production who are waiting for our go-ahead. In this campaign we sell the complete first batch of LeeLuus and are aiming to deliver before Christmas 2016!

 
USE OF FUNDS
Crowdfunding is a way for us to get enough funding to manufacture our first batch of LeeLuus. This is a visualisation of how we intend to use the campaign funds upon reaching our goal.
 

 
RISKS AND CHALLENGES:
 
We spend a great deal of time figuring out all challenges and potential problems that might arise. 
While the LeeLuus are ready to produce, please be aware that a lot can happen during the production. In order to make sure the best possible product comes to your house some minor changes might happen.We have chosen our estimated shipping date very conservatively and left some buffer for potential delays. We can’t give a guaranteed shipping date, but we will do our utmost to ship on time. 
FAQs:
 
 
First time to Indiegogo? No worries, Its super easy!

Have a good look at the campaign and watch our cute video!
Decide how many LeeLuus you would like to purchase for yourself and/or to give away. 
Select the right perk on the right side of the page.
Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.
Share our campaign and help make LeeLuu happen!
When the campaign is over we will contact you and ask what characters you want.
We will keep you updated about our manufacturing progress.
You will receive your LeeLuu!If you have any troubles at all send us a message to crowdfunding@leeluu.fi We are happy to help!



I don't have a PayPal account? What do I do?No worries, you don't need one you can also pay with all common credit and debit cards! For further questions just send us an email to crowdfunding@leeluu.fi or call us at +358(0)469535849

What’s a LeeLuu?LeeLuus are soft nightlights. They glow from within and are controlled by touch.
 
How many characters are there?There are three characters. Hedgehog, Owl and Cat. As soon as the campaign is over we’ll contact you and ask you which one you want.
 
Are the skins changeable and washable?Yes they are! You can remove them very easily without having to fiddle with any cables.They can be replaced with a new skin or then washed.
 
Can I buy extra-skins?Not right now, but soon you will be able! Just follow our journey and we will keep you updated.
 
Are LeeLuus Safe?They certainly are! LeeLuus meet all necessary safety regulations and standards of the EU and the USA.
 
Where are you producing?We are producing in Europe. It’s important for us to be able to be part of the process and make sure everything goes according to plan.
 
How do I charge my LeeLuu?Just open the childproof zipper to access the Micro-USB charging socket, then take the cable (yes it’s included comes with your order) and plug it in!
 
How long do the batteries last?The batteries last up to 20 hours on full strength. Average use is 30 mins to 2 hours per day.
 
What is the lightsource in LeeLuu?LeeLuu has 6 electrically efficient LED lights. LEDs don’t produce heat and are cool to the touch.I don't live in the EU or USA can I still get a LeeLuu?We can make that work! Please send a request at crowdfunding@leeluu.fi  Make sure to put "Other country Order" in the subject and we will get back to you!
 
Why does Hedgehog have purple ears?It's just mad cute and goes well with his spikes.
 
How do I choose the character?Once all orders all in and the campaign successfully finished, we will contact you to confirm your buy and choose your character (Hedgehog, Owl or Cat)!
 
How does this crowdfunding thing work?Crowdfunding is there for people to make projects happen together. When many people buy a LeeLuu in advance we can afford a production run and you will get your LeeLuu! This is a great way to make cool project come alive!
 
What is inside LeeLuu? How does LeeLuu keep its shape?LeeLuus’ essentially have 4 parts: a plastic enclosure that holds electronics and batteries, a foam piece that gives shape, a textile sensor, the cute cover that holds it all together.
 
For what age-group of children is LeeLuu suitable for?LeeLuu is primarily designed for kids between 3-12 years old. We have learned that it is the key age in which children travel through their imagination on their way to sleep. LeeLuu is a companion on that journey, a friend who spreads a comforting light.
Who did your lovely video and awesome photography?That was George. You can find him here (he lives in the internet) http://www.georgeatanassov.com/ 
 
Can adults buy LeeLuus?Yes you can, they are totally good for grown-ups as well and we get that question a lot! You are not alone, my friend.
 
PARTNERS:
To develop our connected LeeLuu concept we are partnering with CreatiFI.Our partner in testing and certifications is Grant4com.
 
 
                    
 
 


LEGAL TALK : 
Web Sales Terms and Return PolicyThe Indiegogo LeeLuus come with 14 return policy. You may cancel any time before you have received your order or until 14 days have passed from when you received your order.If you cancel your order, you will have to pay for your shipping when returning the products.LeeLuus are manufactured and sold by the Finnish limited liability company LeeLuu Labs Oy (Business ID 2661620-9), located at Betonimiehenkuja 5C, 02150 Espoo, Finland. You can contact us by visiting our website leeluu.fi or by e-mail crowdfunding@leeluu.fi.In case you are not happy with our conduct, you may report us and your dispute to the Finnish Customer Dispute Board, http://www.kuluttajariita.fi/en/.We deliver to countries covered by CE and FCC regulations. Namely countries of the  European Union , the United States of America.Return form information:Right to Cancel:You have the right to cancel this order within 14 days of receiving the products (or at any time before receiving the products) without stating any reason.To cancel your order, you have to notify us (LeeLuu Labs Oy, business ID ID 2661620-9), located at Betonimiehenkuja 5C, 02150 Espoo, Finland, leeluu.fi, +358(0)469535849 by e-mail within the cancellation period at crowdfunding@leeluu.fi with the subject “Order cancellation”. You may use the attached return form, but it is not necessary. You may also fill out our cancellation and return form at our website, leeluu.fi. If you choose this option, we will immediately notify you via e-mail of having received your cancellation order.To stay within the cancellation period, it is enough that you notify us of your cancellation order within the cancellation period.Effects of Canceling:If you cancel your order, we will return everything you have paid to us, shipping costs included (excluding possible additional costs, if you have opted for a more expensive shipping type), without undue delay and in any case within 14 days of receiving your cancel order.
