story:
Buy on our new Site!

The Pro-Brewers Siphon is now the BrewSSSiphon™ and can be purchased directly through our site linked on the logo above.

 

ABOUT THIS PROJECT

The “Pro Brewers Siphon” is the ultimate hassle free, completely sanitizable "ONE TOOL TO RACK THEM ALL" home brewing siphon starter designed to cater to a wide range of fermentation practices, equipment, and styles.

 

As devoted brewers who love what we do, we designed the FIRST and only de-constructible, durable and completely sanitizable Home Brew siphon starter that makes the “Perfect Rack” easy every time.

It’s a reliable transferring tool that is easily sanitized, virtually unbreakable and offers flexibility to do more experimentation without having to use multiple siphons in order to do it.

Not only does it perform 10 times better than what we’ve been use to, but it also saves time and money. It’s also possible to rack from anything; Bucket, Kettle, Carboy, Barrel -- all with just this one tool.

10 Good Reasons Why You Should Own & Use Our Pro Brewers Siphon

For starters, it works like a champ. Whether you’re a professional, amateur or beginner, the versatility of application is so simple to use that we’re confident the Pro Brewers Siphon will quickly become the #1 choice of all Home Brewers regardless of experience. 

Made entirely out of stainless steel and silicone, our “Pro Brewers Siphon” eliminates all of the transfer problems that you run into as a brewer, such as bacteria contamination or oxygen leaks that cause oxidation in your batches.

1. Designed for Durability & Longevity

Strong enough to last a lifetime, our strong, impact resistant, 100% reusable and 100% recyclable, Pro Brewers Siphon is the best-performing and most practical choice for long-life transferring tools.

Unlike conventional petroleum-based plastic products that can crack or degrade with repeated use, we’ve eliminated potential leaks, cracks and corrosion that can lead to bacterial contamination. We’ve combined food-grade #304 stainless steel and silicone to keep deterioration from happening. It has a superior strength-to-weight ratio compared to other grades of conventional plastics, or compostable PLA plastic.

2. A Triple Contact Plunger Seal  

 

Up until now, you had to use a food grade adhesive to bond the plunger cane seal to the cane. But not anymore. Our "plunger cane seal" is "over molded" and

has three levels of contact with the "outer siphon tube" guaranteeing that all your thoroughness and attention to detail up until siphoning won’t be lost to oxidization. You can count on preserving flavors and increasing shelf life.

3. A Simple, Functional Removable Check Valve

 

A key feature of our siphon is its removable ‘check valve assembly’ that can be quickly cleaned, sanitized, and re-attached in the event of clogging. Making your transfers simple and quick every time.

4. Easy To Clean and Maintain + Completely Sanitizable

You want to be 100% germ and bacteria free when crafting your batching. So we’ve made it super simple to achieve optimal cleanliness without having to use harmful chemicals to do it. Our Stainless Steel and High Temperature Silicone makes our Pro Brewers Siphon a breeze to clean and resistant to stains, rust, and corrosion. All you need is 1 hour inside of an oven at 212 degrees to completely sanitize your tool.

5. It’s Non-toxic and Eco-friendly

We care about the planet and follow a zero waste policy. That’s why we designed our siphon to be an environmentally better choice. Any reusable material is better than a disposable one. Stainless steel is one of the world’s most recycled materials and widely used in the food and beverage industry — and even in the most sterile surgical environments. Silicone is not a hazardous waste nor toxic to aquatic or soil organisms. So while it is not biodegradable, it can be recycled after a lifetime of use.

6. One Tool to Rack Them All -- No Problem

 

Up until now, brewers needed 2+ different sets of siphons when crafting sour batches versus non sour types of brews. We designed our Pro Brewers Siphon to cater to your unique needs without having to purchase any extra equipment. Because it’s de-constructable, manually cleanable and totally sanitizeable, you now have the freedom to use this one tool to experiment with bacteria, wild yeasts and pull from other experimental sources like wild crafted herbs, spices, or fruits to make your special signature batch at no extra cost.

7. Safest Material For Food and Drinks

Your safety and health is our top priority. Made from FDA approved materials, our Pro Brewers Siphon does not leach chemicals or require a synthetic lining or interior coating. Non-toxic and completely free of BPA, phthalates, lead, zinc and other nasty elements linked to cancer, endocrine disruption, and other health and safety concerns -- we use stainless steel for its antibacterial and hygienic properties and silicone because it’s non-reactive with acidic materials or high temperatures up to 500 degrees. We guarantee a clean, neutral taste that won’t affect flavor or smell like other materials.

8. Sturdy Clip & Carboy Sleeve

 

Efficiency is everything. We’ve designed a proto-typed clip and sleeve that gives you ultimate control over depth adjustment while siphoning. Not only do we ensure that you don’t suck up sediment/debris from the bottom of your bucket or carboy you can now be hands free to perform other tasks during the transfer. It’s just that simple!

9. Reusable, Recyclable & Better For The Planet

8 million metric tons of plastic is dumped into our oceans every year estimating about $13 billion in damages to marine ecosystems each year. Our landfills are also being overloaded with plastic products that can take hundreds of years or more to biodegrade.

The lifespan of these popular plastic products are as follows:

  • Plastic Water Bottle - 450 years
  • Disposable Diapers - 500 years
  • Plastic 6-Pack Collar - 450 years
  • Extruded Polystyrene Foam - over 5,000 years

This is insane. We try to do our best to try and diminish this number by not adding to it and reducing the amount of material we throw away. Our Pro Brewers Siphon is designed to be reused for many years, passed onto new generations and fully recycled without degradation at the end of its useful life. This means resources are saved and the same material is continuously cycled through the production chain in a sustainable closed-loop system.

10. A Wise Investment In Our Future

Stainless steel is the safest, most durable, reusable, recyclable, and worry-free material available used to make our Pro Brewers Siphon. Choosing our Pro Brewers Siphon for your next transferring tool purchase is an affordable and long-lasting investment that reflects a real commitment to health and environmental sustainability. We stand by our product and hope that it becomes one of your favorite tools and a vessel for some of your favorite memories.

PRO BREWERS SIPHON SPECS

 

Who We Are & How We Got Here

 

Hi we’re Justin Coyle and Anthony Schoensee. We are both dads who grew up in the foothills of a charming low-key gold rush town called Grass Valley. Community is key for us being from a small town. So when Nevada County’s long standing Home Brew supply shop Sierra Moonshine went up for sale, we purchased the shop and created a community hub for our tribe.

The truth is we’re happiest when we are making something good or teaching others something useful. We specialize in supplying ingredients, equipment, rentals and education for passionate Do It Yourselfers, Homesteaders, and Makers to learn the craft, science and art of Home Fermentation and lead a wide range of different fermenting classes on beer, wine, mead, lacto-fermented sodas, kraut, kombucha and cheese making. We're proud to have become the leading Home Brew Store in the Sierra Foothills and greater Northern California area.

We’ve been featured at:

 

The Sierra BrewFest hosted by Music in The Mountains a nonprofit seeking to inspire and engage community members of all ages by providing access to extraordinary classical music through performances and youth education programs; Happy Hour for the Wild and Scenic Film Festival "Where activism gets inspired!"; the Miner's Foundry Cultural Center “Supporting our community by Celebrating the Present, Planning for the Future, and Honoring the Past 365 days a year!; Nevada City’s First Friday Art Walk; the Celtic Festival at the Nevada County Fairgrounds presented by KVMR Community Radio; and Oktoberfest in Pioneer Park.

Our Promise to You

We strive to deliver the best, most useful and high quality products and hands on education to improve your brewing experience. That’s why when our customers, friends and fellow Brew Club Members came to us with inquiry about how to get rid of the constant problems, frustrations and disappointments they were having with the cheap plastic tools used for performing elemental tasks -- we addressed it immediately. We made it our business to design a high quality “Pro Brewers Siphon” that was durable enough to last a lifetime. We’re always looking for ways to provide more value to our customers and community. Our “Pro Brewers Siphon” is just the first installment in our series of new and improved Home Brewing Essentials.

Risks and challenges

Producing a highly crafted siphon at scale requires tight specifications and detailed systems. We've refined, vetted and tested our Pro Brewers Siphon numerous times to get the project to this point.

We are thrilled about the potential of this game changing tool for the brewing community. With the expert guidance from our Engineer Scott Raitt @ Connekt LLC we have chosen to avoid possible conflicts that can arise from contracting with multiple suppliers to produce one product and have awarded the complete job from beginning to end to a 5 Star rated manufacturing firm in order to guarantee perfect production and assembly of our Pro Brewers Siphon. As with all projects, manufacturing the product can run into risks with timing. So we did our very best and have accounted for that with conservative estimates. In the event something slightly changes, we promise to disclose full transparency on any unforeseen issues.
story_txt:
Buy on our new Site!The Pro-Brewers Siphon is now the BrewSSSiphon™ and can be purchased directly through our site linked on the logo above. ABOUT THIS PROJECTThe “Pro Brewers Siphon” is the ultimate hassle free, completely sanitizable "ONE TOOL TO RACK THEM ALL" home brewing siphon starter designed to cater to a wide range of fermentation practices, equipment, and styles. As devoted brewers who love what we do, we designed the FIRST and only de-constructible, durable and completely sanitizable Home Brew siphon starter that makes the “Perfect Rack” easy every time.It’s a reliable transferring tool that is easily sanitized, virtually unbreakable and offers flexibility to do more experimentation without having to use multiple siphons in order to do it.Not only does it perform 10 times better than what we’ve been use to, but it also saves time and money. It’s also possible to rack from anything; Bucket, Kettle, Carboy, Barrel -- all with just this one tool.10 Good Reasons Why You Should Own & Use Our Pro Brewers SiphonFor starters, it works like a champ. Whether you’re a professional, amateur or beginner, the versatility of application is so simple to use that we’re confident the Pro Brewers Siphon will quickly become the #1 choice of all Home Brewers regardless of experience. Made entirely out of stainless steel and silicone, our “Pro Brewers Siphon” eliminates all of the transfer problems that you run into as a brewer, such as bacteria contamination or oxygen leaks that cause oxidation in your batches.1. Designed for Durability & Longevity Strong enough to last a lifetime, our strong, impact resistant, 100% reusable and 100% recyclable, Pro Brewers Siphon is the best-performing and most practical choice for long-life transferring tools.Unlike conventional petroleum-based plastic products that can crack or degrade with repeated use, we’ve eliminated potential leaks, cracks and corrosion that can lead to bacterial contamination. We’ve combined food-grade #304 stainless steel and silicone to keep deterioration from happening. It has a superior strength-to-weight ratio compared to other grades of conventional plastics, or compostable PLA plastic.2. A Triple Contact Plunger Seal   
 

Up until now, you had to use a food grade adhesive to bond the plunger cane seal to the cane. But not anymore. Our "plunger cane seal" is "over molded" and
has three levels of contact with the "outer siphon tube" guaranteeing that all your thoroughness and attention to detail up until siphoning won’t be lost to oxidization. You can count on preserving flavors and increasing shelf life.
3. A Simple, Functional Removable Check Valve 
 

A key feature of our siphon is its removable ‘check valve assembly’ that can be quickly cleaned, sanitized, and re-attached in the event of clogging. Making your transfers simple and quick every time.

4. Easy To Clean and Maintain + Completely Sanitizable
You want to be 100% germ and bacteria free when crafting your batching. So we’ve made it super simple to achieve optimal cleanliness without having to use harmful chemicals to do it. Our Stainless Steel and High Temperature Silicone makes our Pro Brewers Siphon a breeze to clean and resistant to stains, rust, and corrosion. All you need is 1 hour inside of an oven at 212 degrees to completely sanitize your tool.
5. It’s Non-toxic and Eco-friendly 
We care about the planet and follow a zero waste policy. That’s why we designed our siphon to be an environmentally better choice. Any reusable material is better than a disposable one. Stainless steel is one of the world’s most recycled materials and widely used in the food and beverage industry — and even in the most sterile surgical environments. Silicone is not a hazardous waste nor toxic to aquatic or soil organisms. So while it is not biodegradable, it can be recycled after a lifetime of use.
6. One Tool to Rack Them All -- No Problem 
 
Up until now, brewers needed 2+ different sets of siphons when crafting sour batches versus non sour types of brews. We designed our Pro Brewers Siphon to cater to your unique needs without having to purchase any extra equipment. Because it’s de-constructable, manually cleanable and totally sanitizeable, you now have the freedom to use this one tool to experiment with bacteria, wild yeasts and pull from other experimental sources like wild crafted herbs, spices, or fruits to make your special signature batch at no extra cost.
7. Safest Material For Food and Drinks 
Your safety and health is our top priority. Made from FDA approved materials, our Pro Brewers Siphon does not leach chemicals or require a synthetic lining or interior coating. Non-toxic and completely free of BPA, phthalates, lead, zinc and other nasty elements linked to cancer, endocrine disruption, and other health and safety concerns -- we use stainless steel for its antibacterial and hygienic properties and silicone because it’s non-reactive with acidic materials or high temperatures up to 500 degrees. We guarantee a clean, neutral taste that won’t affect flavor or smell like other materials.
8. Sturdy Clip & Carboy Sleeve 
 
Efficiency is everything. We’ve designed a proto-typed clip and sleeve that gives you ultimate control over depth adjustment while siphoning. Not only do we ensure that you don’t suck up sediment/debris from the bottom of your bucket or carboy you can now be hands free to perform other tasks during the transfer. It’s just that simple!
9. Reusable, Recyclable & Better For The Planet
8 million metric tons of plastic is dumped into our oceans every year estimating about $13 billion in damages to marine ecosystems each year. Our landfills are also being overloaded with plastic products that can take hundreds of years or more to biodegrade.
The lifespan of these popular plastic products are as follows:

Plastic Water Bottle - 450 years
Disposable Diapers - 500 years
Plastic 6-Pack Collar - 450 years
Extruded Polystyrene Foam - over 5,000 years

This is insane. We try to do our best to try and diminish this number by not adding to it and reducing the amount of material we throw away. Our Pro Brewers Siphon is designed to be reused for many years, passed onto new generations and fully recycled without degradation at the end of its useful life. This means resources are saved and the same material is continuously cycled through the production chain in a sustainable closed-loop system.
10. A Wise Investment In Our Future
Stainless steel is the safest, most durable, reusable, recyclable, and worry-free material available used to make our Pro Brewers Siphon. Choosing our Pro Brewers Siphon for your next transferring tool purchase is an affordable and long-lasting investment that reflects a real commitment to health and environmental sustainability. We stand by our product and hope that it becomes one of your favorite tools and a vessel for some of your favorite memories.
PRO BREWERS SIPHON SPECS
 


Who We Are & How We Got Here
 
Hi we’re Justin Coyle and Anthony Schoensee. We are both dads who grew up in the foothills of a charming low-key gold rush town called Grass Valley. Community is key for us being from a small town. So when Nevada County’s long standing Home Brew supply shop Sierra Moonshine went up for sale, we purchased the shop and created a community hub for our tribe.The truth is we’re happiest when we are making something good or teaching others something useful. We specialize in supplying ingredients, equipment, rentals and education for passionate Do It Yourselfers, Homesteaders, and Makers to learn the craft, science and art of Home Fermentation and lead a wide range of different fermenting classes on beer, wine, mead, lacto-fermented sodas, kraut, kombucha and cheese making. We're proud to have become the leading Home Brew Store in the Sierra Foothills and greater Northern California area.
We’ve been featured at:
 
The Sierra BrewFest hosted by Music in The Mountains a nonprofit seeking to inspire and engage community members of all ages by providing access to extraordinary classical music through performances and youth education programs; Happy Hour for the Wild and Scenic Film Festival "Where activism gets inspired!"; the Miner's Foundry Cultural Center “Supporting our community by Celebrating the Present, Planning for the Future, and Honoring the Past 365 days a year!; Nevada City’s First Friday Art Walk; the Celtic Festival at the Nevada County Fairgrounds presented by KVMR Community Radio; and Oktoberfest in Pioneer Park.
Our Promise to You
We strive to deliver the best, most useful and high quality products and hands on education to improve your brewing experience. That’s why when our customers, friends and fellow Brew Club Members came to us with inquiry about how to get rid of the constant problems, frustrations and disappointments they were having with the cheap plastic tools used for performing elemental tasks -- we addressed it immediately. We made it our business to design a high quality “Pro Brewers Siphon” that was durable enough to last a lifetime. We’re always looking for ways to provide more value to our customers and community. Our “Pro Brewers Siphon” is just the first installment in our series of new and improved Home Brewing Essentials.
Risks and challenges
Producing a highly crafted siphon at scale requires tight specifications and detailed systems. We've refined, vetted and tested our Pro Brewers Siphon numerous times to get the project to this point.
We are thrilled about the potential of this game changing tool for the brewing community. With the expert guidance from our Engineer Scott Raitt @ Connekt LLC we have chosen to avoid possible conflicts that can arise from contracting with multiple suppliers to produce one product and have awarded the complete job from beginning to end to a 5 Star rated manufacturing firm in order to guarantee perfect production and assembly of our Pro Brewers Siphon. As with all projects, manufacturing the product can run into risks with timing. So we did our very best and have accounted for that with conservative estimates. In the event something slightly changes, we promise to disclose full transparency on any unforeseen issues.

story:
Introducing Formovie Dice— the brightest 1080P FHD portable projector at the most cost-effective price on the market, with up to 3 hours running time allows you to enjoy immersive theater experience anywhere anytime. 

As an important member of the Xiaomi Ecosystem, we are very confident and guarantee the Formovie Dice will be delivered on schedule with industry-leading quality at the best possible price. 

  • 1080P FHD portable projector with 550 ANSI lumens
  • Official Android TV system and supports up to 4000+ Android Apps
  • Chromecast built-in
  • Built-in battery for up to 3 hours running time
  • Projection size up to 200 inches
  • Instant autofocus
  • Google Assistant AI voice control via Bluetooth
  • Theater quality sound powered by Dolby Audio and DTS HD
  • ±45°keystone correction allows you to place Formovie Dice at any angle
     

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ALWAYS REQUIRES COMPLIMENTARY DEVICES

The traditional projectors do not perform well on their own which always need to work with a complimentary device and therefore limit access to entertainment resources and portability.

TOO MUCH HASSLE TO SET UP

You need to connect the traditional projectors to a power outlet and complimentary devices. It requires proper setup with all sorts of cables. After all this hard work, you will have to find the most central position to place the projector and adjust the focus manually.

FALSE MARKETING

Tech specs provided by the manufacturer are the only information source to consider when making the buying decision. However, different unit standards and false data are making the buying decision more difficult. It is very frustrating when the product you bought does not live up to what they say they can deliver. 

With Formovie Dice, none of the above will be an issue anymore.

 

 

Equipped with a physical resolution of 1920x1080 pixels and 550ANSI lumen power, Formovie Dice delivers the highest brightness and sharpest pictures among other portable size projectors with a similar price range available on the market. Moreover, Formovie Dice supports video format up to 4K UHD, ensures you the best viewing experience you could ever get with a portable projector.

 

 

Some of our peers from the same industry lists slightly higher tech specs than their products actually are and deliver products that do not meet customers’ expectations. Formovie Dice promises to deliver a high-quality projector with TRUE product specifications and information.

 

 

 

Android TV delivers a world of content and easy access to all kinds of entertainment resources including TV shows, movies, games, music, sports, and TONS MORE! Android TV system is seamless and easy to update to keep the latest content at all times.

 

 

With the Google Play Store for Android TV, whatever you are looking for—from Showtime to YouTube to tons of games—you can always find your favorite. 

 

 

 

Android TV with the Google Assistant provides a smarter viewing experience. Easily search and watch blockbuster movies, stream apps and enjoy multiplayer games. Ask questions and see answers from Google on the big screen. Dim the lights and control other smart home devices. Or even manage tasks by using your voice. Press the mic button on the remote to talk to Google Assistant. 

Voice search and personalized recommendations mean you spend more time being entertained and less time hunting for something good.

 

 

 

With Chromecast built-in, you can easily cast movies, shows, and photos from your Android or iOS device to your Formovie Dice. Simply tap the Cast button from apps you already know and love to stream entertainment from your phone, tablet or laptop to a bigger display.  With Chromecast built-in, your phone becomes your personalized remote control to Formovie Dice that you can use to search, browse, queue and control what’s playing from anywhere in the home.

 

 

Formovie Dice is connectable through Bluetooth, HDMI, USB, and headphone jack for more entertainment possibilities. You no longer have to rely on WIFI accessibility. 

 

 

 

Formovie Dice gives you the amazing big-screen viewing experience with projection size from 40 up to 200 inches. It is recommended to keep the screen size between 60-120 for the best viewing experience. Simply adjust the distance of Formovie Dice from the screen to increase the projection size.

 

 

 

 

Equipped with a built-in battery of 16,000mAh that lasts up to 3 hours and 16 GB internal memory, all you need for a perfect movie night is Formovie Dice. No need for internet and power outlets.

 

 

 

Formovie Dice is equipped with incredible Dolby and DTS audio effects.  You can also use Formovie Dice as an external Bluetooth speaker by connecting via Bluetooth.

 

 

 

Formovie Dice comes with a 45-degree keystone correction both vertically and horizontally. You can place the projector at any angle but be able to detect and correct distortion both horizontally and vertically up to 45 degrees.

 

 

 

Formovie Dice automatically measures the distance between the projector and the projection surface and adjusts the focus of the projected images within seconds. Ensure the projected image is as clear as possible without you having to focus the lens yourself.

 

 

 

Formovie Dice is designed with a fully sealed optical system, it can effectively prevent dust from entering the optical machine. Therefore, Formovie Dice delivers better colors, higher brightness and extends its LED lifespan up to 30,000 hours, which means you could spend up to 8 hours a day with your Formovie Dice for the next 10 years.

 

 

 

Equipped with high-performance Amlogic T962X-H TV grade chip, which is superior to the ordinary projector chip in terms of system performance and image processing. 

 

 

Designed with an integrated metal sell plus a leather handle strap on top and only 155x125x160mm in size, making it compact and easy to carry around. The four-sided mesh design not only ensures the function of heat dissipation but also reveals the aesthetic rhythm. 

 

 

Instead of exposing to the direct light of traditional TVs and smartphones, Formovie Dice adopts diffuse reflection imaging and projects to a larger screen that can protect your eyes from vision loss. Keeping your eyes comfortable while enjoying theater-quality movies.

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

①Formovie Dice   ②Power Adapter  ③Power Cable   ④Remote   ⑤User Manual    ⑥Warranty

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have partnered with Kickbooster. For every backer you refer to the Formovie Dice, you will receive 10% of their pledge amount in return. And for our backers, you will receive an additional tripod or a storage bag as a thank-you gift from us if you helped to share our campaign through Kickbooster.

Step 1: Sign up on Kickbooster. You'll get your personal link and share it through social media, email, or any other platform you like.

Step 2: Once you’ve done that, go to our “COMMENTS” page and let us know you shared our campaign. Simply let us know your Booster Name and choice of gift. That’s it! This will only take a few minutes and in return, you will get a thoughtful gift from us.

 

 

 

 

Since the launch of Formovie's portable projector in China, numerous positive feedbacks were received and we’d love to bring this superior projector - Formovie Dice to the global market. Formovie Dice is the premium version for the overseas market. We have extensive experience in R&D and manufacturing for projection equipment but our brand is not familiar with the overseas market. Therefore, we strive to develop our brand globally with the help of Indiegogo and take our first step to success in the global market. Unlike other crowdfunding projects, you will have no risk of contributing to a scam campaign. We guarantee to ship out all orders before May 2020 or a full refund will be issued (Formovie shall not be held liable for any failure to perform that is due to any cause or circumstance beyond the reasonable control of itself).

Moreover, we value you all as the first batch of supporters to our new product. We guarantee you will get the Formovie Dice directly from the factory without extraneous costs and third-party layers of distribution and retail, and make sure that you will be able to enjoy the best quality mini projector at the best price ever.

 

 

 

Founded in 2016, Formovie is a Xiaomi ecosystem company jointly founded by laser display industry leader - Appotronics and Xiaomi. As part of the Xiaomi ecosystem, we focus on continuous innovation, quality, and efficiency. We are committed to building amazing home theater projectors combining ultra HD resolution, fantastic color accuracy and high brightness with honest prices to let everyone in the world enjoy a better life through innovative technology. And we aim to add value to your home and create a truly remarkable media room or home theater without exceeding your budget.

Our first product the “Mijia Laser Projection 150” TV successfully raised USD 2,924,000 within 24 hours on Xiaomi’s crowdfunding platform, which broke the record of the most funded Xiaomi crowdfunding campaign and achieved premium award-winning campaign honors. We pursue enhanced product quality and guaranteed defect-free products through continuous quality management processes. Ensuring customer satisfaction and trust.

story:
Managing all the various remotes can be a real pain, especially when the ones you want are missing, broken or mixed up. It could be dangerous too, given the prevalence of the current pandemic and the fact that remote is reportedly to be the germiest thing in your room — more disease-causing germs than the bathroom door handle.

Introducing SmartEgg Pro, the ultimate smart control that rules all the infrared home appliances and makes your life easier, healthier and better.

 

 

 

SmartEgg Pro can learn or copy from any IR remote for you to control everything using just its App: TV, cable box, projector, DVD player, Blu-ray, Apple TV, Fire TV, audio system, game player, air conditioners, heaters and lights, more than 200,000 (with more added daily) different kinds of household devices. 

The SmartEgg Pro App is user-friendly, extremely versatile and powerful.

 

 

It also protects you and your loved ones from touching the remotes crawling with bacteria, viruses and other nasty organisms capable of transmitting colds, infections and diseases.

reate a series of most used commands and activate it all with one touch on your smartphone. 

For instance, you could set up a “leaving home” event that turns off lights and heatings as you are leaving for the day to save energy or a “football night” event that turns on TV, stereo and cable box, set to a certain channel and volume and dims the lights for you.

Connect with SmartEgg Pro over WiFi network to control devices at home from your mobile device when you are away on a trip or beyond its Bluetooth range. 

 

 

You could have your home robotic vacuum cleaner crawl around the floors sweeping the dust anytime you want when you are far off on a trip.

Trigger automated tasks according to your location ranges from 0.1m~50m (with the Bluetooth turned on and the App running on the background on your phone)to the SmartEgg Pro.

 

 

Imagine this, as you walk in, your bedroom lights, A/C, TV, cable box, stereo will automatically turn on for you without you touching any remote or smartphone.

SmartEgg Pro works with Echo,  Google Home, so you can speak to these voice assistants to control SmartEgg Pro to send 360° full coverage IR commands to smart home products.

 

 

SmartEgg Pro surpasses other remotes with its advanced Bluetooth 5.1 mesh networking, that is many-to-many SmartEgg Pro communications optimized for creating large-scale networks to cover every corner of your house.

This is ideal for secure and reliable automations even without internet connection of a large number of devices in different rooms in your house. Devoid of internet access, you can still perform off-line controls through SmartEgg Pro to all the devices on the Bluetooth mesh. The internet is only necessary when downloading a new remote to SmartEgg Pro or to using it with a third device which requires an internet connection.

 

 

 

You can schedule time-related commands using SmartEgg Pro, such as turning on or off the lights and closing or opening motorized blinds at specific times on specific days needless for you to say or touch a thing.

 

The built-in thermometer in the SmartEgg Pro monitors realtime room temperature, records it in the App (12 months max.) and uses the set thresholds to govern the heating/cooling system to keep the room temperature pleasant and the energy usage low.

 

 

 

SmartEgg Pro supports IFTTT to create chains of customary conditional actions with all your applications and appliances. For example, if a food delivery app informs SmartEgg Pro that the food is at your door, then SmartEgg Pro will send commands to turn on the outdoor lights and unlock the front door for the food delivery person automatically.

 

 

SmartEgg Pro will immediately auto mute any device with volume control (speakers, stereos, TV, media players, etc.) when an incoming or outgoing call is detected for a clear and uninterrupted phone call. It will resume the volume when the phone call ends.

 

 

 

Unlike other universal remotes that require constant power plugging or frequent battery replacement, SmartEgg Pro has a long battery life of 3~6 months and is cordless that can be freely placed anywhere in the house or wherever you go. Simply sit it on the removable base in contact with the magnetic PINs for a quick recharge.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

AICO Technologies was founded in 2014. AICO committed to providing the one-stop solution for Home Automation and to making every home smarter, self-sustainable and energy-saving.  With teams specialized in software development, hardware integration and aesthetically pleasing design, we apply only the highest quality standards to AICO products. During the last two years, we managed to satisfy more than 2,000 customers in 65 different countries with our state-of-art IoT and cloud computing technologies.

SmartEgg Pro is the new generation of SmartEgg, a previous campaign we launched on Kickstarter in 2015 and won support from over 2,000 backers worldwide. After five years of relentless research and development, we proudly introduce to you the SmartEgg Pro, a universal smart home remote control.

 

As a young passionate company, we want to enable everybody to participate in the advantages of smart home automation and IoT.

 

Each person has a fully automated home which saves energy and time to let people care about the really important things in their lives.

 

 

 

This project is constructed and presented to you by OTO1Tech, the marketing expert who've helped make 250+ campaigns successful, risk-free.

Managing all the various remotes can be a real pain, especially when the ones you want are missing, broken or mixed up. It could be dangerous too, given the prevalence of the current pandemic and the fact that remote is reportedly to be the germiest thing in your room — more disease-causing germs than the bathroom door handle.
Introducing SmartEgg Pro, the ultimate smart control that rules all the infrared home appliances and makes your life easier, healthier and better.

 
 


 
SmartEgg Pro can learn or copy from any IR remote for you to control everything using just its App: TV, cable box, projector, DVD player, Blu-ray, Apple TV, Fire TV, audio system, game player, air conditioners, heaters and lights, more than 200,000 (with more added daily) different kinds of household devices. 
The SmartEgg Pro App is user-friendly, extremely versatile and powerful.
 
 
It also protects you and your loved ones from touching the remotes crawling with bacteria, viruses and other nasty organisms capable of transmitting colds, infections and diseases.

reate a series of most used commands and activate it all with one touch on your smartphone. 

For instance, you could set up a “leaving home” event that turns off lights and heatings as you are leaving for the day to save energy or a “football night” event that turns on TV, stereo and cable box, set to a certain channel and volume and dims the lights for you.

Connect with SmartEgg Pro over WiFi network to control devices at home from your mobile device when you are away on a trip or beyond its Bluetooth range. 
   
You could have your home robotic vacuum cleaner crawl around the floors sweeping the dust anytime you want when you are far off on a trip.

Trigger automated tasks according to your location ranges from 0.1m~50m (with the Bluetooth turned on and the App running on the background on your phone)to the SmartEgg Pro.
   
Imagine this, as you walk in, your bedroom lights, A/C, TV, cable box, stereo will automatically turn on for you without you touching any remote or smartphone.

SmartEgg Pro works with Echo,  Google Home, so you can speak to these voice assistants to control SmartEgg Pro to send 360° full coverage IR commands to smart home products.

 
 

SmartEgg Pro surpasses other remotes with its advanced Bluetooth 5.1 mesh networking, that is many-to-many SmartEgg Pro communications optimized for creating large-scale networks to cover every corner of your house.

This is ideal for secure and reliable automations even without internet connection of a large number of devices in different rooms in your house. Devoid of internet access, you can still perform off-line controls through SmartEgg Pro to all the devices on the Bluetooth mesh. The internet is only necessary when downloading a new remote to SmartEgg Pro or to using it with a third device which requires an internet connection.
 
 

 
You can schedule time-related commands using SmartEgg Pro, such as turning on or off the lights and closing or opening motorized blinds at specific times on specific days needless for you to say or touch a thing.

 

The built-in thermometer in the SmartEgg Pro monitors realtime room temperature, records it in the App (12 months max.) and uses the set thresholds to govern the heating/cooling system to keep the room temperature pleasant and the energy usage low.
   

 
SmartEgg Pro supports IFTTT to create chains of customary conditional actions with all your applications and appliances. For example, if a food delivery app informs SmartEgg Pro that the food is at your door, then SmartEgg Pro will send commands to turn on the outdoor lights and unlock the front door for the food delivery person automatically.

 

 
SmartEgg Pro will immediately auto mute any device with volume control (speakers, stereos, TV, media players, etc.) when an incoming or outgoing call is detected for a clear and uninterrupted phone call. It will resume the volume when the phone call ends.
   

 
Unlike other universal remotes that require constant power plugging or frequent battery replacement, SmartEgg Pro has a long battery life of 3~6 months and is cordless that can be freely placed anywhere in the house or wherever you go. Simply sit it on the removable base in contact with the magnetic PINs for a quick recharge.
   
 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 
AICO Technologies was founded in 2014. AICO committed to providing the one-stop solution for Home Automation and to making every home smarter, self-sustainable and energy-saving.  With teams specialized in software development, hardware integration and aesthetically pleasing design, we apply only the highest quality standards to AICO products. During the last two years, we managed to satisfy more than 2,000 customers in 65 different countries with our state-of-art IoT and cloud computing technologies.
SmartEgg Pro is the new generation of SmartEgg, a previous campaign we launched on Kickstarter in 2015 and won support from over 2,000 backers worldwide. After five years of relentless research and development, we proudly introduce to you the SmartEgg Pro, a universal smart home remote control.

 
As a young passionate company, we want to enable everybody to participate in the advantages of smart home automation and IoT.

 
Each person has a fully automated home which saves energy and time to let people care about the really important things in their lives.

 

 
 

This project is constructed and presented to you by OTO1Tech, the marketing expert who've helped make 250+ campaigns successful, risk-free.

story:
RagLite gives you the ability to “Light Anywhere”

Throw it on the floor, hang it from above, mount it to the walls, place it over objects, hold it in your hand, secure it to your body or attach it to our proprietary velcro framing and stand system. Wherever you need light, “Grab a RagLite"


Light It. Roll It. Store It.

The Raglite is the first-ever FLEXIBLE LED LIGHTING SYSTEM.

The RagLite team set out to make a light that is versatile, durable, portable and practical ...not to mention extremely bright. RagLite is flexibe, lightweight, portable, and low-heat emitting. They are made with high quality LEDs ranging from 80-95 CRI. Raglite's are long-lasting, energy efficient and environmentally friendly. Available with proprietary module mounting system and accessories.

A compact and powerful handheld nook light. Our professional grade light is perfect for shooting on the go, in the studio or any shot that needs a little boost. High Color Rendering Index (95 CRI). Available in: 3200 Kelvin Color Temperature (Tungsten), 5600 Kelvin Color Temperature (Daylite), 3000-6000 Kelvin Color Temperature (Hybrid). *Mini is only available in Tungsten and Daylite.

GREAT FOR: Tight lighting situations (small rooms/tight spaces), kick light, accent light, handheld/selfies, eye light, on camera light, car shots, close ups, hair/make-up light.

An extremely thin profile (0.25") 1 x 1 high output source for lighting anywhere. Combine multiple CINE 1x's to create any size and configuration you need.

GREAT FOR: Fill light, increasing room ambience, lighting medium sized areas. The CINE 1x is the “go to” RagLite!

Double the punch of the CINE 1x with a wide (16 - 24" Strips) source  and extremely thin profile (0.25") Combine multiple RAGLITE CINE's to create any size and configuration you need.

GREAT FOR: Space light, increasing room ambience, lighting large areas.The CINE 2x packs the punch you need in studio or on location!

CHECK OUT THE RAGLITE CINE IN ACTION!


Engineered to produce light at 4400 Kelvin Color Temperature "White Light" and a Color Rendering Index (CRI) of 80, our Prosumer water-resistant Fusion line is perfect for everyday use. 

This powerful little light fits perfectly in one hand. It may be small but it packs quite a punch!

GREAT FOR: - Home use (flashlight/desklight), walking, running, biking, safety light (power outages), decorative (accent lighting), make-up, selfie’s, roadside emergencies, tight spaces and more!

Our rough and tough medium sized light. You need “tough stuff”? ...we got you covered!  

GREAT FOR: - Hiking, camping, cycling, construction, mechanical, plumbing, medical, military, police, fire and rescue, home, office, glovebox, toolbox and so much more.

 A bright light ideal for any large area that needs to be illuminated.

GREAT FOR: - Indoor/Outdoor lighting, security lights, sporting events, and even hazards or emergencies.

CHECK OUT THE RAGLITE FUSION IN ACTION!


Technical Specifications

RagLites are made with the highest grade, most cost efficient materials available. We developed the RagLite out of a need of our own. Components are sourced from various vendors around the world and currently shipped to Raglite Technologies LLC for final assembly in Chicago, IL - United States of America. 

All components used in construction of the Raglites are certified, the RagLite in whole however is not yet certified, (hence our crowdfunding efforts).

Are the RagLite's energy efficient?

Fusion Mini: Cost per year = $3.37*

Fusion Rugged: Cost per year = $7.60*

Fusion Original: Coster per year = $13.46*

*Based on running continuously for 365 days at full output using $0.10 per kilowatt hour in US. 

***ALL RAGLITE'S ARE SHIPPED ON "FIRST CONTRIBUTE, FIRST RECEIVE" BASIS (Want one sooner???  Be an Early Illuminator!!!...and we will do our best to expedite.  Quantity is limited so CONTRIBUTE NOW!)

Headquartered in Chicago, RagLite was founded in 2014 by Chad Soderholm and Lori Allen. On a mission to transform the way people think about lighting, RagLite pioneered the first fabric-mounted, flexible LED light source. "We developed RagLite out of a need of our own. As film production veterans my co-founders and I found traditional large, heavy lighting equipment to be painfully cumbersome, so we set out to make the most versatile, portable and practical light the world has ever seen," Chad Soderholm, Co-founder in charge of Innovation.  

Risks & Challenges

Through the process of development, we have overcome several obstacles and learned many lessons along the way. After many iterations, we have developed fully working RagLites and accessories. Our lights have been field tested and are currently being used by every-day professionals. We’ve documented our journey and invite you to watch the process of developing and testing the RagLite over the past 18 months through our video posting and other digital assets. There you will witness the many challenges we've faced in optimizing our product. Along the way, we've forged great relationships with vendor partners and contract manufacturers to make the best product possible.

FOLLOW OUR JOURNEY

FAQ

CAN I ORDER A CUSTOM SIZE? You sure can! But our RagLites are designed to be joined together to make any size light you want.  If you need something specific we can make any size unit to fix your exact needs.  Please send an inquire about custom sized units! Contact Us With Your Specifications →

CAN I ORDER MORE THAN ONE? Not on Indiegogo BUT if you are interested in volume orders let us know and we will be happy to discuss it further! Contact Us With Your Specifications →

I HAVE CONTACTS, CAN I HELP? You sure can! We can use all the help we can get. If you know someone in an industry, a strategic partner or investor that you think would love the Raglite then please contact us and we can workout details. Contact Us With Your Thoughts →

Other Ways You Can Help

There are over 1.3 billion people in the world without electricity. That's why we would like to establish the Love & Lite Foundation - a non-profit endeavor to help serve our mission to Lite the World. RagLite is asking for direct donations through our Perks to help setup the Love & Lite Foundation. Also, RagLite will be donating up to 6% from the proceeds of our crowdfunding raise to this cause.  www.loveandlite.org

Some of you may be excited about the RagLite, but right now you just can't contribute? That's fine but that doesn't mean you can't help...SHARE our campaign with others. Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it!

story:
The intelligent car design highlights:

1) built in USB to serial port circuit, can be directly through a USB cable to download the program, and can USB power supply. In most experiments can dowithout the battery case.

2) the Bluetooth module level design, the appearance is very cool, the reservedinterface directly plugged, more convenient for users to use. Can realize thewireless remote control and real-time data wirelessly to a computer.

3) using infrared sensors, the design of the new, faster.

4) the ranging integration probe ultrasonic probe.

5) the plug-in package type 1T microcontroller STC12C5A60S2 single chipdesign, faster and more easy to operate, can be free to replace the MCU core.

6) 40 pin single-chip fully connected with the circuit board, 34 IO ports are open,can use pin external.

7) through the core plate can be intelligent vehicle from the STC12C5A60S2 coreSTC89C52 replacement for the 89C52 chip core to continue learning, visibleintelligent vehicle practicality we are strong.

8) the DIP packaging motor drive chip, free installation of radiator, appearance.

9) with power interlock switch.

10) special customized anti EMC motor, to prevent the interference of electromagnetic radiation of main control chip, more stable. All the lengthening shaft motor design, to facilitate future upgrades encoder.

11) supporting 14500 lithium batteries, light weight capacity, can be recharged(batteries sold separately).

12) car full screw structure, appearance is cool.


TP smart car can do what?

1) LED light water experiment (51 chip set sail from here.)

2) 8 -3 encoder test (multi button save method. IO port)

3) key detection experiment (focus on the application of anti shake procedure.)

4) interrupt (interrupt experiment introduces the generation and execution ofprocess, easy to understand. By drawing method)

5) timer experiment (timing of application, using mapping method to explain thetimer is easy to understand.)

6) counter experiments (through 99 experimental in-depth understanding of how to realize counter counter.)

(7) the serial communication between SCM and computer and SCM and SCMinformation interactive.)

LCD1602 liquid crystal display (8) experiment SCM will learn, to the header fileform of explanation.)

9) chip built independent baud rate generator experiment (model 51 singleadvantage, make SCM can do more things, note that 89C52 is not.)

10) PT2272 wireless remote control. The radio remote control means is we oftencan see, generally used in automobile, motorcycle, household anti-theft deviceetc.. We are now used as a remote control device of intelligent vehicle, learningto use it.

11) chip with built-in watchdog experiment (to prevent the program running fly,crash the important parts, essential for industrial applications.)

12) chip with built-in EEPROM experiment (instead of 24C02 single chip, do not know this is very hard, external 24C02 chip not only increases the system power consumption, volume, application is very inconvenient.)

13) chip with built-in AD conversion experiments (average 51 development boardis through the external ADC0832 chip AD conversion experiments and only 8 bits,we directly use the smart car chip AD conversion module to achieve 10 accuracy of 8 channel AD converter. AD conversion chip microcomputer is also expensivethan sell, if the microcomputer can realize AD conversion for the entire projectthat will save a lot of money, the boss likes. The 8 bit and 10 bit precisiondifference in where? For example, is the same voltage detection 5V, 8 bit can only be accurate to 0.019V, and the 10 bit can be accurate to 0.0048V, one can imagine the difference. Do not know the use of new 51 MCU AD conversion visible is to eat a big deficit.)

External pressure test (14) when the system power is low even save important data in industrial applications, this also has an important position. Note that 89C52 is not the function.)

Photosensitive resistance experiment (15) brightness detection. An interesting experiment: when the car into the table to table shadow detection automatic backing out.)

16) chip with built-in PWM experiment (common 89C52 MCU can only through the timer virtual PWM signal output, but it has low accuracy, the consumption of CPU occupancy rate, occupancy program memory space is large, single chip microcomputer to do more is impossible, so I want to realize more functions willneed 2 89C52 to achieve. We use the built-in PWM module car chip generates a PWM signal, can not occupy the timer, it reduces the CPU occupancy rate, makeSCM can do more things, and it is PWM signal output and high precision. This isthe general 89C52 is not available.)

17) experimental software reset (STC single-chip implementation of dump freedownload.)

18) H bridge experiment (positive DC motor control and velocity.)

19) the smart car to find the black line experiment (using the light reflectance ofdifferent colors of the different implementation of this principle, some factories even used to deliver the goods!)

20) intelligent vehicle obstacle avoidance experiment (using infrared sensors to detect the surrounding environment to achieve obstacle avoidance function.)

21) distance measurement ultrasonic (experiment is a good method in daily life,ranging widely used.)

22) ultrasonic obstacle avoidance experiment.

23) wireless communication experiment between SCM and computer (Bluetooth serial wireless access, wireless data transmission, wireless smart car controltasks.)

24) computer wireless remote control of intelligent vehicle experiment.

25) Bluetooth wireless data transmission experiment (simple implementation method, in the wireless meter reading, to single-chip Bluetooth mobile phonedata communication between single chip computer, the data transmission between the PDA, GPS, have important applications.)

26) infrared decoder, the remote control of intelligent vehicle.

27) DS18B20 temperature sensor experiment.

28) mobile phone remote control. Can use mobile phone to control the smart car,and can real-time data on vehicle is returned to the mobile phone terminaldisplay. Mobile phone remote control software with 9 custom button, three models, respectively, keyboard mode, instruction mode and a normal mode of communication

29) mobile phone gravity sensing remote control. The gravity sensing functionmobile phone can realize the gravity sensing remote control, as long as themobile phone can tilt the smart car control forward and backward, turningmovement. For the non gravity sensing function of the mobile phone, thissoftware can realize the button remote control.

30) the infrared remote control decoding. From twentieth Century 80's first infrared remote controller was born to now, infrared remote control technology is still prosperous, why? Because of its low cost, little interference, simple method,can be said that in the future for a long time and it is hard to be replaced by otherremote control mode. So we need to learn. In this experiment, to teach you how to decode the infrared remote controller is used, for example, the TV remote control, DVD remote control, electric fan remote controller etc.. After masteringdecoding infrared remote control, can be home remote control, TV DVD remote control and so on, converted into a smart car remote control, or into infrared remote control switch controller, music etc..

Why we need your help

The TP smart car team is a small team and if we want to make the cost of the car go down, we must make many at a time. We need to fund enough money to make cars.

large, single chip microcomputer to do more is impossible, so I want to realize more functions willneed 2 89C52 to achieve. We use the built-in PWM module car chip generates a PWM signal, can not occupy the timer, it reduces the CPU occupancy rate, makeSCM can do more things, and it is PWM signal output and high precision. This isthe general 89C52 is not available.)17) experimental software reset (STC single-chip implementation of dump freedownload.)18) H bridge experiment (positive DC motor control and velocity.)19) the smart car to find the black line experiment (using the light reflectance ofdifferent colors of the different implementation of this principle, some factories even used to deliver the goods!)20) intelligent vehicle obstacle avoidance experiment (using infrared sensors to detect the surrounding environment to achieve obstacle avoidance function.)21) distance measurement ultrasonic (experiment is a good method in daily life,ranging widely used.)22) ultrasonic obstacle avoidance experiment.23) wireless communication experiment between SCM and computer (Bluetooth serial wireless access, wireless data transmission, wireless smart car controltasks.)24) computer wireless remote control of intelligent vehicle experiment.25) Bluetooth wireless data transmission experiment (simple implementation method, in the wireless meter reading, to single-chip Bluetooth mobile phonedata communication between single chip computer, the data transmission between the PDA, GPS, have important applications.)26) infrared decoder, the remote control of intelligent vehicle.27) DS18B20 temperature sensor experiment.28) mobile phone remote control. Can use mobile phone to control the smart car,and can real-time data on vehicle is returned to the mobile phone terminaldisplay. Mobile phone remote control software with 9 custom button, three models, respectively, keyboard mode, instruction mode and a normal mode of communication29) mobile phone gravity sensing remote control. The gravity sensing functionmobile phone can realize the gravity sensing remote control, as long as themobile phone can tilt the smart car control forward and backward, turningmovement. For the non gravity sensing function of the mobile phone, thissoftware can realize the button remote control.30) the infrared remote control decoding. From twentieth Century 80's first infrared remote controller was born to now, infrared remote control technology is still prosperous, why? Because of its low cost, little interference, simple method,can be said that in the future for a long time and it is hard to be replaced by otherremote control mode. So we need to learn. In this experiment, to teach you how to decode the infrared remote controller is used, for example, the TV remote control, DVD remote control, electric fan remote controller etc.. After masteringdecoding infrared remote control, can be home remote control, TV DVD remote control and so on, converted into a smart car remote control, or into infrared remote control switch controller, music etc..Why we need your helpThe TP smart car team is a small team and if we want to make the cost of the car go down, we must make many at a time. We need to fund enough money to make cars.

story:
Campaign has ended get your Recharge here:  https://shopviva.com/recharge

 

Finally, it’s here! The travel mug all tea and coffee lovers have been waiting for!

Regular travel mugs are designed to store water or beverage that are already made. And that means one more thing you need to clean.

Recharge by VIVA is a versatile solution that brews hot and iced tea. It also makes coffee. It solves the headache of over-steeping, leaking lids and maintaining the optimal temperature of our drink until the very last drop.

 

 

Recharge is the Swiss Army knife for Beverage. It’s a tumbler, teapot, tea infuser, iced tea maker, coffee press, thermos, and water bottle. This one does it all. It's everything you need for tea and coffee at a fraction of the cost.

On a budget? Recharge is an economic choice for a premium loose leaf tea experience.

Minimal living space? Recharge can help you declutter your cupboard.

Unlike other tea infusers, Recharge has a large capacity. It makes over 16 ounces (460ml) of delicious drink, keeping you satisfied and hydrated all day. And when you remove the infuser basket, Recharge holds 18 ounces (520ml) of liquid - enough to get your Grande fix.

 

The double-sealing mechanism in our no-leak lid passes the Shirshasana test. Guaranteed.

 

Say good-bye to bitter tea. Our one-of-a-kind brew stop innovation, the Smart Brew, allows you 100% control over the steeping time to achieve optimum flavour.

 

Get the most from your luxury loose leaf tea. Water flows across all the leaves to achieve the most robust tea experience available today.

 

 

What's your pleasure? The innovative Smart Brew system comes with a uniquely engineered micro-filter infuser designed to handle even the smallest tea particles like hibiscus and rooibos.

 

The ergonomic design from top to bottom will feel like an extension of your body.

 

Our quick-change interchangeable filter allows you to switch between tea and coffee (if you’re into that sort of thing).

 

No muss, no fuss. Completely and easily disassembles for quick cleaning.

 

Take it everywhere. Designed to fit most cup holders.

 

 

Long-lasting freshness guaranteed. Hot liquids stay warm for 6 hours. Cold liquids stay chilled for 12 hours. Brew your hot tea or iced tea at home or on the go, and it will keep its ideal temperature for as long as your beverage lasts.

 

Need a cold drink to hydrate after a workout or yoga class? No problem. Simply remove the Smart Brew basket and take your Recharge with you as a daily to-go travel mug. Not only will your drink stay hot or cold for hours, taking out the infuser basket adds another 2 ounces (60 mL) to the Recharge so you can fill it with your favourite Grande-sized beverage. And by choosing Recharge, you'll eliminate a disposable cup and help the environment by reducing waste.

Are you someone who shops for quality products that will last for years and years? Recharge is made of premium, German medical grade stainless steel. This is the most durable stainless available -- it will not break or rust. We're engraving our name directly on the powder coating so the natural stainless shines through as our guarantee to you that the Recharge won't rust.

 

Recharge is the Swiss Army knife of teaware. See how it stacks up against other products in your cupboard.

As part of this recognition effort, VIVA will donate $15 for every Gratitude Pack sold to the WHO COVID-19 Solidarity Response Fund.

With the support of our backer community, we have unlocked a special edition of Recharge to recognize the tireless work and dedication of our front line health care workers, first responders, correctional officers, and essential workers who are working hard to keep us safe in these difficult times.

The Gratitude Edition features a design by Toronto-based artist Quinn Rockcliff. 

 

By giving a Gratitude Edition Recharge, you’re giving more than a mug. It’s a way of sharing your appreciation for the work they’ve done.

 

The Gratitude Reward includes 5 Recharge mugs at our lowest possible price to share with the essential workers in your life. You will also be able to select from any of the available colours.

To take part, simply pledge at the Gratitude Pack Reward level.

 

Hot Tea

  1. Add a tablespoon of your preferred tea.
  2. Pour hot water to the upper waterline.
  3. Insert the Smart Brewer partway and let it steep 3 to 5 minutes.
  4. Push down the Smart Brewer to complete steeping, and you're ready to go!

 Iced tea

  1. Add Tea and pour hot water to the lower waterline.
  2. Let it steep 3 to 5 minutes, then insert the Smart Brewer all the way.
  3. Lock the Smart Brewer, add your preferred sweetener and top with ice. Give it a little shake, and it's ready to drink!

Coffee

  1. Add about 2 (18 grams) tablespoons of your preferred ground coffee
  2. Pour hot water to the upper waterline. Stir for 20 seconds and let the coffee brew for 3 minutes
  3. Switch the tea micro-filter for the Pro Filter and insert the Smart Brewer partway.
  4. Once your coffee is finished brewing, push down and lock the Smart Brewer. Add milk and sugar as you like, and your coffee is ready to drink!
     

Raise your tea IQ by learning more about the fantastic universe of tea! Our knowledgeable tea sommeliers are busy writing an essential guide to tea and tea accessories to share with all our backers.

 

These add-ons can be purchased with Recharge at the SINGLE EARLY BIRD RECHARGE pledge level and above. You will have the option to select the items to add to your shipment in the backer survey once the campaign ends.

PURE TEASPOON

No one achieves perfection easily. Lucky for you though, you can achieve it when you brew tea using the Pure Teaspoon, whenever you’re making a tea or coffee in the Recharge. The precise measurement will give you a perfect cup every time. One scoop per time. It really is that simple.

 

SMART BREW PRO FILTER

With an upgrade to the pro filter,  Recharge is the most versatile travel tumbler on the market. Simply switch the filter in the Smart Brew system and add ground beans to brew your coffee. The filter is designed to benefit the environment and reduce the billions of single-serve cups and coffee pods that end up in landfills.

For over 10 years, we at VIVA have been inspiring the world to relax and feel better with the perfect tea experience.

We believe tea is the social lubricant bringing people together is small and big ways, from intimate shared moments to celebration and ceremony. We're dedicated to creating products for those of you who share that same belief about the power of tea.

This involves innovation and world-class craftsmanship when it comes to beautifully designed tea accessories.

While this is our first Kickstarter campaign, we have been manufacturing beautiful, high-end quality products for more than a decade.

It all started 3 years ago with an idea: how to achieve the perfect loose leaf tea brewing experience in single device at home or on the go.

Our team of designers and engineers worked tirelessly, through trial and error, prototypes and tests -- and many cups of tea -- to find tune the product into something we are ready to show to the world.

Tooling has been completed, and the first 200 samples has been produced. As you read this message, our production team is busy producing the inaugural batch for the first shipment in June!

 

 

 

For media inquiries please contact us at- recharge@shopviva.com
Facebook  | Instagram | Press Kit | shopviva.com

story:
THANK YOU ALL for your support in helping us successfully launch the new DoggoRamp 2.0! The ramps are now for sale on our own website at DoggoRamps.com! So visit us there to purchase, still with a limited-time 15% discount!

 

After launching our first version of the DoggoRamp just over a year ago with an overwhelming response, we are back with our new and improved DoggoRamp 2.0 version that maintains all its original features that make the bed ramp so unique to begin with, but now with a some exciting new features that make it EVEN better!

BEAUTIFUL - FUNCTIONAL - SAFE - CONVENIENT - the DoggoRamp helps you live a better life with your pup at home.

What's New & Worth Waiting For on the DoggoRamp 2.0?

Well, Some Amazing New Features We'll Highlight More Below, and All the Same Original Features that Makes the DoggoRamp so Unique to Begin With!

  • (NEW) Made of Canadian furniture-grade Maple hardwood
  • (NEW) PAWGRIP anti-slip surface material
  • (NEW) Improved finish & 5 color options
  • (NEW) 2" wider platform (total 12" wide)
  • (NEW) For dogs up to 40lbs
  • Adjustable in height from 12" up to 37"
  • Completely collapsible, portable
  • Reversible railings (total 3 railings)
  • Anchor rope for extra safety
  • Professional-consulted training videos & steps

So How Does it Work?

If you own a dachshund or another long-bodied dog like corgis, or even other small breeds, you likely worry about them jumping off the bed and hurting themselves. 1 in 4 dachshunds, for instance, will have intervertebral disc disease (IVDD) in their lifetime, so preventing injury is KEY.

Our company and product was founded around Crusoe, the owner's dog, having had spinal surgery for a blown disc, costing thousands of dollars, month of rehabilitation, and caused likely by jumping off of high places.

But even if injury is not your worry, DoggoRamps lets your dog conveniently get on and off the bed with no hassle, meaning you get to enjoy more cuddle time, and save your own back in the process, too! The ramp holds up to 40lbs dogs.

Adjustable in Height & Collapsible

The DoggoRamp has a height range from 12" to 37", accommodating virtually every height of bed out there. When the ramp is not in use, it collapses down to a mere 3" to be stowed under a bed or upright in a closet. The railings are removable as well. This way, the ramp comes fully assembled and ready to use, and can be conveniently moved for cleaning or storage.

Anti-Slip PAWGRIP Surface

Our new PAWGRIP anti-slip surface is a WORLD of difference compared to a carpeted ramp. It is squishy and rubbery, and gives the paws superior grip over any other material, for any dog.

Even on the highest setting of 37" (essentially the highest bed someone would have), the dog can go up and down with ease; no slipping, no effort. You can even see Crusoe here stopping midway down without any sliding or effort!

Reversible Railings/Versatile Orientation!

The DoggoRamp features removable and reversible railings, allowing you to position the railings on whichever side you wish, which in turns meansthe ramp can be oriented in many different ways in the bedroom. This versatility is not only convenient, but for best use by a dog, the ramp should be pointed towards the doorway to the bedroom making it more convenient and intuitive for the dog to use.

The Anchor Rope System

Even though the DoggoRamp is quite sturdy to begin with, we always recommend you attach the anchor rope for extra safety. What is so nice about the DoggoRamp is that it can sit parallel to a bed to take up less space in a bedroom, unlike all other ramps. But in doing so, the anchor rope is recommended to keep it snug against the bed. The anchor rope is easy to install and SUPER effective. 

Colors to Match Your Home!

What Our Previous Customers Are Saying

 

Ready to Get Your DoggoRamp? Here's What to Do:

  1. Select one of the "PERKS" from the right-hand side. Each perk is essentially a "product" you are purchasing.
  2. First batch of 550 ramps are already in production and should be shipping out early August (we think late July but we rather beat expectations!). Your order should ship out within a few days of your purchase. Further orders beyond that will ship out a few weeks later.
  3. We say "thank you" to you for protecting your own pup and supporting this business, which will help put more ramps in the hands of more pet owners out there for the benefit of all pups.

Timeline:

First Batch is Already in Production!

Ways YOU Can Help

Reaching our goal is the best surefire way of ensuring we reach our minimum order and can push this through to production and then to your doorstep. 

  • Tell your friends and family who own small dogs and could use this.
  • Use the share buttons here to spread around on social media.

And that's all there is to it.

A Word About Intervertebral Disc Disease (IVDD)

IVDD (intervertebral disc disease) is a condition that affects about 25% of dachshunds as well as some other breeds, especially those with longer backs. Our bodies have little discs between our vertebrate – sort of like jelly-filled donuts - that act as cushions between the vertebrae. IVDD is when these discs become susceptible to bursting over time as the outer fibrous layer hardens and loses its elasticity.

Burst or bulging discs usually occur from hard impacts or injury, like from wrestling, jumping off or over things, doing stairs, etc. The offending disc can push on nerves or the spinal cord itself, causing severe pain and in some cases, paralysis.

This is why it is so important to ensure that a dog prone to IVDD avoids repetitive or hard landings from jumping off furniture or doing stairs.

 

It’s always best if you can prevent a disc from bulging/bursting in the first place, because recovery is long and hard, and if paralysis occurs, surgery is usually the recommended course of action, which is very costly and stressful.

Here are some good tips on how to prevent an injury:

  • Keep your dog strong! A strong back puts less stress on the discs themselves to absorb impacts.
  • Don’t let your dog do stairs! Here at Crusoe’s house, we have baby gates set up at the top and bottom of all staircases.
  • Use ramps for couches and beds. Like DoggoRamp! Hehe

Crusoe underwent spinal surgery for a blown disc in August 2016 after he had gone "wobbly" in the back legs. It was a long, hard recovery process that we never want to go through again. I know the DoggoRamp will not only add convenience to people's lives, but help prevent other dog families from going through what we did.

Risks & Challenges

This is our second crowdfunding campaign. We learned a LOT in that process, and in doing so, have tightened the process to avoid delays in production or shipping. Since our last launch in 2018, we moved our manufacturing closer to home, improved and refined the quality and design, and even changed our fulfillment center, now with inventory in both the US & Canada so ramps can ship locally to North America customers without import duties or taxes. And, to continue offering free shipping. Our production is faster now and can handle more scale, so we expect to improve our timelines from last year.
