IVDD is when these discs become susceptible to bursting over time as the outer fibrous layer hardens and loses its elasticity.Burst or bulging discs usually occur from hard impacts or injury, like from wrestling, jumping off or over things, doing stairs, etc. The offending disc can push on nerves or the spinal cord itself, causing severe pain and in some cases, paralysis.This is why it is so important to ensure that a dog prone to IVDD avoids repetitive or hard landings from jumping off furniture or doing stairs. It’s always best if you can prevent a disc from bulging/bursting in the first place, because recovery is long and hard, and if paralysis occurs, surgery is usually the recommended course of action, which is very costly and stressful.Here are some good tips on how to prevent an injury:
Keep your dog strong! A strong back puts less stress on the discs themselves to absorb impacts.
Don’t let your dog do stairs! Here at Crusoe’s house, we have baby gates set up at the top and bottom of all staircases.
Use ramps for couches and beds. Like DoggoRamp! Hehe
Crusoe underwent spinal surgery for a blown disc in August 2016 after he had gone "wobbly" in the back legs. It was a long, hard recovery process that we never want to go through again. I know the DoggoRamp will not only add convenience to people's lives, but help prevent other dog families from going through what we did.Risks & ChallengesThis is our second crowdfunding campaign. We learned a LOT in that process, and in doing so, have tightened the process to avoid delays in production or shipping. Since our last launch in 2018, we moved our manufacturing closer to home, improved and refined the quality and design, and even changed our fulfillment center, now with inventory in both the US & Canada so ramps can ship locally to North America customers without import duties or taxes. And, to continue offering free shipping. Our production is faster now and can handle more scale, so we expect to improve our timelines from last year.

story:
You guys asked for a demo video. 

 

Many of you wanted to see a clear demonstration of how a regular cleaning session would look like with Montanc. From attaching the tools to emptying the dust canister, we're showing you how it's done.

Montanc works wonders when paired with its additional nozzles. It leaves no dust in any corner, crack, or crevice!

 

Meet Montanc,

The only handheld vacuum that weighs in at only 1.2 lbs and has the insane suction power strong enough to effortlessly pick up an iPad. 

Light and powerful, our relentless engineering and attentive design are what makes cleaning with Montanc fun AND effortless. 

 

We can prove it. Just watch. 

Our rigorous market research showed us that there was a high demand for a handheld vacuum that combines power, versatility, and convenience all in one design! With that in mind, we rolled up our sleeves and got to work to design Montanc, a feather-light handheld vacuum with the power of an upright vacuum that rivals those of premium brands. And let's be honest.. it's also easy on the eyes! 

So stay calm and scroll on to learn more about the wonders of Montanc!

 

 

You spoke. We listened.

 

During the research stage of Montanc, we focused on the users' pain points. Here are some of the major takeaways from the surveys we conducted: 

?‍♂️ Upright vacuums are so friggin bulky! 

  • I just can't seem to get the dust that accumulates right on the corners.

?‍♀️ Handheld vacuums wear out so quickly! 

  • Used mine for a little less than a year and now it can't even pick up cookie crumbs or hair that my girlfriend leaves all over the floor every time she visits." 

 

WHAT DO PEOPLE THINK ABOUT MONTANC?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Two Power Modes  

Mode I: With the suction power of 6,000 Pa, picks up your typical-sized particles and debris in a blink of an eye. And mode I can used for 30 mins once you fully charge.

  • Endless amounts of hair left on the floor by your significant other or pet dog
  • Crumbs that have somehow navigated its way to the tiniest cracks and tight corners
  • Household debris stuck in tumble dryer filters

Mode II: Picks up microparticles that can't be seen by the naked eye as well as larger chunks of debris with the suction power of 15,000 Pa. Just press the button to switch from mode I to II. And mode II  can used for 9 mins once you fully charge.

  • Microdust, pollen, and other allergens
  • Larger cereal pieces on kitchen floors 
  • Dead insects on window sills
  • Tiny gravels and leaves from plant pots

 

Unprecedented Power-To-Weight Ratio. 

The chart below shows some of the best-selling handheld vacuums on Amazon, organized by suction power and weight. 

 Most vacuums' weights go hand in hand with the suction power. Powerful vacuums are heavy. Smaller vacuums are weak. But if you want the best of both worlds, Montanc is the way to go. 

 

The Experiments 

 

Handheld vacuums in the industry have an average suction power of 2-5k Pa. Our vacuum packs a whopping 15kPa. 

 

With Montanc, you don't have to compromise power ever again. 

 

 

 

 

Experiment #1

Here's one of the strongest handheld vacuums available on the market today. Placed side by side with Montanc, the difference is night and day. 

 

 

 

 

Experiment #2

 MONTANC is overwhelmingly more powerful compared to any other handheld vacuums on the market right now.

 

 

 

 

 

Experiment #3

We purchased a 45m (or 148 ft)-long garden hose to see if the suction power fades. 

 

 

 

 

The Technology Behind The Magic 

 

Our team is made up of ex-Samsung engineers (from the vacuum cleaner product engineering team at Samsung, to be exact) with years of industry-relevant experience in optimizing product structures.

Such power is only possible because of our Brushless Direct Current ++ motors (BLDC++ in short).  This 120w motor clocks in at 76,000rpm which allows Montanc to produce 15kPa while staying insanely compact. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Montanc is thoughtfully designed to blend right into the aesthetics of your beautiful home. 

Instead of hiding it in a closet where you keep all your cleaning supplies, place Montanc in a visible location. That makes it even easier to access! 

The charging station (that also comes in the box) adds to the design. 

 

Another place Montanc will shine in is your car. 

Vacuuming your car can be a pain in the ass. We get that, but don't just let all that dirt sit there. Have Montanc sweep up those crumbs before they even hit the floor. 

*We are in the process of designing a car charger for Montanc. We will give you guys an update as soon as we can!

 

 Your office is ideally a place where business gets done. We wouldn't want your coworkers or clients to stumble across your untidy or dirty workspace. With Montanc, all you need is 1-3 minutes of your workday to make your office sparkling clean again! Time to start adulting properly.

 

 

 

 * Montanc contains of double safety that twist the gadget as you press the button.
                It designates for preventing unexpected disassemble of dirt from the sack.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Charging Station: Simply place Montanc on the dock to begin charging. 

 

 

 

Although it is not necessary to wash the filters, you absolutely can rinse them out with clean, filtered water for your peace of mind. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We care about environmental sustainability.

Keep scrolling to see how you can combine different extensions for various situations. We promise you won't be disappointed.     Weighs less than a 20oz Powerade bottle Montanc is thoughtfully designed to blend right into the aesthetics of your beautiful home. Instead of hiding it in a closet where you keep all your cleaning supplies, place Montanc in a visible location. We get that, but don't just let all that dirt sit there. Have Montanc sweep up those crumbs before they even hit the floor. *We are in the process of designing a car charger for Montanc. story:
TRAVEL SPACE without leaving the Earth.

AstroReality's first AR-enabled Space Mug is available now EXCLUSIVELY on Indiegogo!

 

Imagine you are enjoying the best moment of your morning, take a sip and let your mind wander.

Scanning the space mug using our AstroReality Explorer app (available at the Apple Store and Google Play), you can experience the view of an astronaut suspended in the spaceship cabin.

Looking at the blue planet from an astronaut's view - the AmazonRainforest, the Vatnajokull National Park in Iceland, the Himalayas, the Grand Canyon in the United States...

Flying over Van Diemen Gulf, Australia

Flying over Grand Canyon, USA

Flying over the Himalayas

Flying over the Amazon Forest

All the stunning natural scenery, more than 200 countries and regions, and the fascinating beauty of more than 10,000 cities will slowly pass in front of your eyes.

The moment you gaze through the AstroReality Space Mug and gaze upon the miraculous complexity, and dynamic beauty of our planet, your day, your sense of inspiration and your determination will awaken like never before.

 

We created a physical artifact that allows you to get in touch with Space in your daily life.

 

We love a starry night because we realize human beings are as small as a grain of dust compared to the huge universe. When you look at the stars, you feel that the difficulties of the world melt away. there is a special attraction to feeling distant and unknown, and humans have never given up the pursuit and exploration of space.

As of June 17, 2018, there have been only 561 brave humans who have seen the world through space. Even though it is expected that the first private lunar trip could be launched by 2023, it still requires years of technical preparation and a fortune to go. The journey seems out of reach for most of us.

This is the Earth photographed by the International Space Station. The spectacular and beautiful sights seen by astronauts may be the perspective that we could never have in our lifetime.

With the same dreams and curiosity as “Creating the Moon”, our Space Mug with AR-enabled technology, makes it possible for you to experience space travel without leaving the Earth. No matter where you are, you can travel around the Earth with the mug in your hand and enjoy the best view in the world.

The first stop of the spaceship, let’s visit our most familiar home together - the Earth.

 

We believe that future spaceships may represent the possibility itself. It is mysterious and there is no single ready-made element to define. Our Space Mug was designed to be as abstract as possible to allow you to use your imagination.

In order to design the ideal AstroReality Space Mug, we have made several attempts.

  • Inspired by the different aircraft in reality and science fiction, we added new elements to explore, imaging the different shapes of the mug;

  • With reference to modern industrial design and parametric design, we tested different cup types to abstractly show the future spaceship;

  • All shapes can be abstracted with facets, so we decided to use the facets and hexagons to outline the shape of the mug;

  • Hand-made models, polish and adjust the cup details;

  • Finally, introducing the AstroReality Space Mug.

The mug is 70mm wide and 120mm tall; 

Soft simple hexagonal lines, presenting the contours of the future spaceship; ​

The slim, streamlined cup shape and tightened waist are created for a comfortable grip.

In order to find the best light transmission, we constantly adjusted the thickness of the wall, which reflects the layering of light under the illumination.

The material is finally chosen to be ceramic. Pure white represents infinite possibilities.

This future spaceship mug will also be an elegant piece of art on the table.

Inspired by the snow white color, the sleek lines and the bird’s eye view of Earth, we have named this product Cygnus, after the constellation of the swan. The AstroReality Space Mug (A.S.M.) Cygnus can now be yours.

This is not the final look of the package. See the reference from the future updates.

Let's use the A.S.M. Cygnus Spaceship to leave the surface of the earth, and look at the blue planet from a bird's eye view.


 

Sometimes a little light can make everything different. In order to realize "watching space with mugs", we try to enable the AR interactive experience, so that we could cross the physical distance and look at the views from the height.

The interior of the cup is transformed into the cabin of a future spacecraft, and the cabin structure inside the mug is presented by AR technology;

We have prepared a landscape of 500 million square kilometers of Earth. The data comes from NASA and USGS high-definition satellite photos, covering the entire surface of the Earth.

Are you ready to start you “space travel around the earth”?

Scan the AstroReality Space Mug with AstroReality Explorer app (available at Apple Store and Google Play). Enjoy the AR experience of looking at the Earth from the simulated spaceship.

 

The view of the Earth from the AstroReality Space Mug Cygnus is the real satellite world map from space. We utilize the data from NASA satellites in our augmented reality app.

When people look up at the stars, you are looking at the blue planet and seeing the scenery of 510,000,000 square kilometers.

AstroReality Space Mug at CES 2019 in Action

AstroReality is the winner of the CES 2019 Innovation awards in Augmented Reality. 

 

The Wandering Earth "Secret perk" 

Sneak peek AstroReality Space Mug in action at CES.  

We have also designed a series of small accessories for the mug. We hope it can be a decoration for the space scenery, and also adding a little joy to the spaceship mug.

Accessories development process

Astronaut Stirrer 

 A stirrer made of silicone is placed on the edge of the cup wall, like a small astronaut climbing along the rope. He is exploring the interior of the spaceship for us.

Earth Aerial View Coaster

The round coaster is printed with photos of the Earth photographed by the Apollo, creating a sense of visiting the Earth from an upper view by the spaceship mug.

 

 

 

We create each of AstroReality product with heart. All the fundraising will be invested in the full production of this model from prototype to finished product, including:

  • Procurement of raw materials;
  • Factory model and mold production;
  • AR interaction tailored for Space Mug.

To say thanks to the first batch of AstroReality space travelers, we prepared crowdfunding perks with the best deal prices and unlocking rewards for our backers.

EARTH 30mm AR-enabled Model

Full-color high precision 3D printing, restoring planetary textures based on NASA data, AR-enabled.

LUNAR 30mm AR-enabled Model

Discover the Moon in miniature. Explore the Moon with the world's smallest smart lunar model. 

Greeting from outer space!  We are a team of astronomy enthusiasts, designers, and tech geeks, who are committed to innovation and use technology and creativity to shape the way people interact with science.  AstroReality is our global consumer brand with an interactive experience in space exploration.

Due to the enthusiasm to the moon, after three years of upgrading through six versions, we made one of the most precise moon models AstroReality LUNAR in April 2017. Our Indiegogo LUNAR campaign successfully raided $213,437 USD total funds, 516% funded on September 9, 2017, by a total of 1034 contributors. We are honored to receive the Innovative Product of 2018 award from Indiegogo. After the launch of LUNAR model, we have been reported by domestic and foreign media such as WIRED Magazine, GIZMODO, MASHABLE, SPACE.COM, and a collected by NASA LPI (NASA Lunar and Planetary Institute). 

All of this is great encouragement and affirmation for us, driving us to continuously create and innovate with a heart that loves the universe and respects craftsmanship. It is also supporting us to use technology and creativity to inspire people, making it possible to experience the astronomical geography and nature closely.

story:
The Homy Player is more than a media box. It bridges the fragmented islands of your smart home and channels your video streams. We experienced the frustration of smart home products that promise to make your life easier but refuse to work together.

The Homy Player leverages Z-Wave® technology to link thousands of home automation, home security, and Internet of Things (IoT) products into an interface that works the way you think.

The Homy Player also runs Android TV which lets you stream high definition - even 4K - video from Netflix®, YouTube®, and more into your home entertainment system. Add on to that thousands of apps and games optimized for the TV experience.

 

Connecting the Disconnected Home

The smart home is supposed to make our lives easier. Connected light bulbs, smart thermostats, security webcams, and all of the other Internet of Things devices out there come with that built-in promise. But they fail.

Each vendor tries to create a walled garden around their products. As long as you buy all of your IoT stuff from that vendor, they work great. Try to get products from different vendors to work together? That’s another story altogether.

All of us on the SmartHomy team have been bashing our heads against that wall for years. At one point we filled two screens on a smartphone with “connected” apps. That was the only way to make our homes smart.

We think tech is fun and we love digging into a problem to make things work. But we’re developers and designers and engineers. That’s the way we think. Our friends and our families, though, they don’t think like us.

We designed the Homy Player to solve the problem we all face and bring the separate pieces of the smart home together in one elegant box.

 

 

The Homy Player uses Z-Wave multifrequency, the world’s leading wireless control technology. More than 450 vendors have designed over 1,250 products to comply with the Z-Wave protocol.

The number of Z-Wave certified products in use today has already passed 50 million. That means your Homy Player will probably control every smart device in your house right now.

 

 

The Homy App is the key to that control. We make setting things up easier by avoiding the procedural approach many vendors impose. Why should you program each and every step for every device? Tech may work that way, but we don’t think like that.

Just set your devices for a scene in your life - watch Netflix, leave for work, waking up - and the Homy App’s Scene Recording System remembers it. From now on just use the the Homy App to activate the scene and your home responds.

The Homy Player also reacts. Your Internet of Things devices can trigger the LED’s on the front of the Homy Player. Flashing red lights for a security alert. Pulsing blue lights for the kitchen timer. The RGB LEDs can be turned off or set any color you want, making it easy to tell which system is sending what kind of alert.

And...

 

 

Video was a lot easier back in the day. Watch a handful of TV networks, go to the movies, make a run for the video store. Now content is spread across many streaming services each one with its own subscription and its own app. A wide range of boxes lets you send those streams to your home entertainment system, but the Homy Player goes a lot further.

 

The Homy Player lets you watch more video streams thanks to the Android TV operating system. Rent movies through the Play store or access your favorite streaming services. YouTube, Netflix, Hulu, Twitch and more are right there in all their widescreen glory.

The Homy Player is even ready for your 4K HDR Ultra HD television. An Amlogic octa-core ARM processor supports hardware decoding of HDR content at 60 frames per second.

Unlike many streaming boxes the Homy Player also supports traditional TV. We will ship your Homy Player with a built-in tuner specific to your country. We support the DVB-S2, DVB-C/T/T2, ATSC, and ISDB-T formats you need to get free local content no matter where you live.

 

 

3D High Definition Gaming

Even if you have a PlayStation or an Xbox (or both), having more choices is always better -especially when friends or family want to play. Whatever game – 3D, arcade, puzzle - fits your mood, the Home Player can get it for you through the Game store.

These aren’t smartphone games stretched to fit a big screen. These games are optimized for the TV and deliver high definition surround sound entertainment. And thanks to the Homy Player’s quad-core processor, 3GB DDR III memory and 32GB of storage you have all of the performance and capacity to handle the most demanding 3D high definition games.

Even though the Homy Remote is not a full-featured game controller, we added small touches that make the Homy Player ready for games out of the box. Use up to four Homy Remotes with your multi-player games to turn every night into game night.

Soft textured, backlit buttons make the Homy Remote a nice little gamepad. A built-in gyroscope turns your gestures into commands whether your game takes you racing through the streets or flying through space.

 

 

 

The Homy Player

When we started this project, we went out and bought as many streaming boxes, game boxes, and IoT hubs as we could. We lined them up on a table and saw they had one thing in common: they were all ordinary black boxes.

 

We took a more elegant approach with the Homy Player. Premium materials like the soft touch surfaces and a copper-anodized, brushed aluminum base take industrial design to the next level.

Yes, it looks nice, but we are engineers. Form still follows function. The aluminum base is a heat sink that rapidly cools the high-performance hardware inside.

 

Amlogic’s award-winning S912 processor is based on the ARM octa-core 64-bit Cortex-A53 design as well as ARM’s multi-core Mali-820MP3 graphics processor. Dynamic adjustments of active cores and voltage levels ensures the Homy Player gets performance on demand without excessive power consumption.

Integrate your Homy Player into your smart home with high speed wired and wireless connections including gigabit Ethernet, supercharged 802.11ac Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth 4.0LE.

The integrated Z-Wave radio will relay commands and notifications throughout your home – no dongles needed!

Connect your Homy Player into your home entertainment system. The HDMI 2.0a port supports 60 frames per second high definition and 4K HDR Ultra HD content as well as 10-bit surround sound audio enhanced by Dolby Digital Plus or DTS.

Our standards-based design, and third-party DRM licensing, ensures that you get compatibility with the widest range of apps and hardware. Netflix, Google Widevine and Microsoft PlayReady cover the entire range of DRM possibilities to ensure you can run any video stream.

Z-Wave and Android TV’s control options ship with the Homy Player, but you can count on us to deliver new ways to control your smart home. Our developers are working hard to get Alexa and the Google Assistant added as an update.

 

The Homy Remote

Bluetooth Remote controls have been around for a long time so why do so many companies get them wrong? We paid as much attention to the Homy Remote as we did to the Homy Player. After all, it’s the device you’ll be using all the time.

The Homy Remote’s industrial design uses the same premium materials as the Homy Player. Soft, textured buttons give you quick access to controls. A built-in microphone will take your voice commands to search for content.

The integrated backlit and gyroscope not only enhances your gaming experience it turns the Homy Remote into an air mouse to quickly navigate the Homy Player interface.

 

The Homy App

 

Controlling your smart home systems becomes so much easier when you replace dozens of vendor-specific apps with the Homy App.

Home Automation tailored for your Android TV

The home automation controls are available directly from your large screen TV and are accessible without interrupting your favorite shows or films. 

 

The scene is a basic function of a smart home

Our unique, patent-pending Scene Recording System works the way people think. Why go through the hassle of telling an app “Turn off light one then turn off light two then activate security system”?

Set your Z-Wave-compatible lighting and home security systems the way you want them, then use the Homy App to record the “Away from home” scene.

Unlike many home automation apps, the Homy App does not force you into a proprietary cloud-based system. It stores all of your scenes locally so there is no delay between your command and your smart home’s response.

 

 

The SmartHomy team loves the future that the Internet of Things promises. Sure, we are into the tech. But it’s more than that. When technology is done right it transforms our lives. It makes our lives easier, richer, and more secure. The more than thirty employees at SmartHomy have gathered from around the world to make that smarter future real.

Our designers, engineers, and developers hail from Russia, Germany, India, Chile, Korea, Romania and the United States. That global perspective is a strength. Yes, we can design a product that works for early adopters in the USA and EU but we also understand the needs of the rest of the world.

Of course there is one question that unites everyone on Indiegogo: will they ship on time?

We waited until the end of the development process to launch our campaign and ensure the answer to that question is “yes”.

We built the first prototype nearly a year and a half ago and spent all of 2016 developing the firmware and software. Working with our manufacturing partner, we have ironed out the kinks in the design.

Even as this campaign is underway, our team is finishing the software and hardware testing and getting the Homy Player and Homy Remote tooling ready to go.

 

We just need your backing to shift into gear at campaign end. We have designed the Homy Player to meet all of the requirements for Z-Wave Pro 500 certification. That will make the Homy Player compatible with the widest range of smart home and Internet of Things devices.

All we need to do is submit pre-production hardware for Z-Wave to evaluate. Another set of pre-production hardware will go to national regulators in the US, Canada, and the European Union. Their rigorous testing of radio frequency emissions from the Homy Player and Homy Remote will let us ship our products worldwide.

With certification complete we can start mass production and start shipping to you in July 2017.

 

 

Shipping a great product isn’t enough for us. The world keeps changing and so will your Homy Player. We have a full development pipeline of operating system and software upgrades as well as peripherals that will expand what your Homy Player can do.

Our platform-based approach means that you will get rapid updates as Google enhances Android TV and the Z-Wave compatibility list expands. Our developers are already working on the Nougat version of Android TV for you to download as soon as possible. That will give you full access to the Google Assistant and other exciting features. But that’s not all. Look for integration with Amazon’s Alexa as well.

Our hardware roadmap includes Gamepads and In-Wall touch screens and Z-Wave devices for the Homy Player to take your gaming and comfort to the next level. We will also develop other Internet of Things devices that will fill gaps we see in the smart home market.

But first things first. Our number one priority is to ship the Homy Player.
story_txt: The Homy Player is more than a media box. It bridges the fragmented islands of your smart home and channels your video streams. We experienced the frustration of smart home products that promise to make your life easier but refuse to work together.The Homy Player leverages Z-Wave® technology to link thousands of home automation, home security, and Internet of Things (IoT) products into an interface that works the way you think.The Homy Player also runs Android TV which lets you stream high definition - even 4K - video from Netflix®, YouTube®, and more into your home entertainment system. Add on to that thousands of apps and games optimized for the TV experience. Connecting the Disconnected HomeThe smart home is supposed to make our lives easier. Connected light bulbs, smart thermostats, security webcams, and all of the other Internet of Things devices out there come with that built-in promise. But they fail.Each vendor tries to create a walled garden around their products. As long as you buy all of your IoT stuff from that vendor, they work great. Try to get products from different vendors to work together? That’s another story altogether.All of us on the SmartHomy team have been bashing our heads against that wall for years. At one point we filled two screens on a smartphone with “connected” apps. That was the only way to make our homes smart.We think tech is fun and we love digging into a problem to make things work. But we’re developers and designers and engineers. That’s the way we think. Our friends and our families, though, they don’t think like us.We designed the Homy Player to solve the problem we all face and bring the separate pieces of the smart home together in one elegant box.  The Homy Player uses Z-Wave multifrequency, the world’s leading wireless control technology. More than 450 vendors have designed over 1,250 products to comply with the Z-Wave protocol.The number of Z-Wave certified products in use today has already passed 50 million. That means your Homy Player will probably control every smart device in your house right now.  The Homy App is the key to that control. We make setting things up easier by avoiding the procedural approach many vendors impose. Why should you program each and every step for every device? Tech may work that way, but we don’t think like that.Just set your devices for a scene in your life - watch Netflix, leave for work, waking up - and the Homy App’s Scene Recording System remembers it. From now on just use the the Homy App to activate the scene and your home responds.The Homy Player also reacts. Your Internet of Things devices can trigger the LED’s on the front of the Homy Player. Flashing red lights for a security alert. Pulsing blue lights for the kitchen timer. The RGB LEDs can be turned off or set any color you want, making it easy to tell which system is sending what kind of alert.And...  Video was a lot easier back in the day. Watch a handful of TV networks, go to the movies, make a run for the video store. story:
Meet Alkemista. And say hello to custom-crafted spirits.

Alkemista is all-in-one spirits infusion vessel that enables anyone to craft and serve fresh, custom infused cocktails at home or in a bar — using fresh fruit, spices, herbs and botanicals.

We began with a quest to craft a better cocktail and discovered that fresh spirits infusions were the key to creating remarkable cocktails and bitters. So we set out to design a bar tool that would simplify the process of spirits infusions. By marrying the timeless design of the classic spirits bottle with the beautiful simplicity of Japanese teapots, Alkemista makes the art of infusion easy.

TIMELESS DESIGN. LAB-GRADE QUALITY. REMARKABLE INFUSED SPIRITS.

The Alkemista infusion vessel combines the timeless design of a classic spirits bottle with the simple technology of fine Japanese teapots - making it easy to create custom spirits at home or in a bar. 

Alkemista's lab-grade borosilicate glass bottle was designed to look and feel like a traditional spirits bottle and is large enough to hold a full 750ml of spirits, plus plenty of infusion ingredients. The elegant design is highly-durable and feels as good in the hand as it looks on the counter or back bar.

The removable ultra-fine infusion filter allows you to seamlessly infuse, pour, serve and store your custom creation without the need for separate filters, funnels or bottles. It was cleverly designed to introduce the delicate flavors and aromas of fresh fruits, spices, and botanicals into your spirit while preventing the unwanted particles and bitter elements from escaping into the liquid. The result: remarkable infused spirits.

SIMPLE USER EXPERIENCE

STEP 1. Place ingredients like fruits, spices, roots or botanicals into Alkemista’s stainless steel infusion filter, and then add a base alcohol like whiskey, gin, vodka or tequila.

STEP 2. Allow flavors and aromas to mingle with the alcohol (for a few hours, days or weeks, depending on your preference).

STEP 3. Pour and serve the infused spirit directly from the Alkemista, or mix with other elements to create fresh, premium cocktails.

Alkemista at a glance.

ELEGANT AND EASY. No need for separate (and clumsy) infusion jars, funnels or filters. Alkemista’s simple “all-in-one” design features an integrated, infusion filter that gently steeps your spirits like fine tea—and once removed, transforms the bottle into an elegant serving vessel.

ENDURING CRAFTSMANSHIP. The Alkemista infusion vessel is made of high-quality borosilicate glass and features a leak-proof stainless steel bottom lid and food-grade silicone stopper. The infusion filter is forged from stainless steel and is large enough to hold full pieces of fruit and up to 200ml of infusion ingredients.

FRESH INGREDIENTS. NO ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS. Virtually all flavored whiskeys and vodkas are made with added sugar and fake flavors concocted in a lab—not grown in a garden. Alkemista lets you craft superior-tasting spirits with fresh ingredients that are free of artificial ingredients, unwanted dyes, chemicals or added sugar.

Just add fresh fruits, spices, herbs or botanicals to Alkemista’s ultra-fine infusion filter, allow the flavors and aromas to mingle into your favorite spirit, then serve directly from the bottle.

Modern mixology made simple.

Alkemista is designed to simplify the spirits infusion process for professional and amateur drink-makers everywhere. The result is a perfectly balanced craft spirit that is ready to sip or mix into your cocktail creations.

ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES. With Alkemista, anyone can become a DIY mixologist – creating infused spirits, cocktails, tinctures, and bitters with ingredients like fresh fruits, spices, roots and exotic botanicals.

Be inspired by a farmer's market, the spice aisle at your local store, or even you own garden, and create unique combinations like Bacon-Sage Infused Whiskey, Lavender & Cucumber Gin, Cacao & Clove Bitters. The possibilities are as endless as your imagination!

For Home Bar or Back Bar

BE A SHOW OFF. Alkemista will be the center of attention of your next cocktail party…or the star behind your cocktail bar.

FORM + FUNCTION. We eliminated all the clunky aspects of infusing spirits, resulting in an elegant form that functions perfectly.

INFUSE + SERVE. Go from infusion to serving in one simple step! 

Recipe Book Included!

We've received several requests for a recipe book to help you recreate the infusions and cocktails we've shared on Instagram. So, as a special THANK YOU for getting us this far, we are happy to announce that every Alkemista will automatically include a FREE infusion recipe book.

The Ethan+Ashe Alkemista Team

Ethan+Ashe was forged out of a passion for great spirits, fine cigars, perfect coffee, artisanal food and a lust for life shared with good friends. Founded by Jason Carignan and based in Southern California, Ethan+Ashe is a passionate team of designers, creators, independent thinkers and foodies dedicated to bringing new home and bar tools to life.

Craft and serve custom infused spirits at home or in a bar. 

If our Kickstarter Campaign is funded, the Alkemista will go to production. Upon delivery, the art of transforming the ordinary into the extraordinary will be in your hands.

We invite you to get inspired to create, excited to indulge, and be a part of bringing this product and amazing craft cocktails to your bar or home.

Help back Alkemista today.

story:
We created a smart home system to help our friends and family in our everyday lives. With your help, let's make Kasia the best and most easy to use one yet!

Featured on:




Kasia is the first affordable smart home system. It’s about time your home was as smart as your phone.


Control and monitor all your electronic devices in your home.



  • Lights come on automatically as I come home in the dark.
  • My coffee pot is hot and ready for me in the morning.
  • I am reminded when I accidentally leave my refrigerator door open.
  • My laundry tells me when it's done.
  • I save money by knowing which devices use the most electricity so I can make sure to turn them off when not in use.
  • I don't need to search my house to make sure I've turned off all the lights. A simple press of a button and it's done.  


Have your lights turn on automatically as you come home with Kasia Presence.



Simply put, Kasia beats competitors on both price and features.





Kasia is made up of individual devices that work together to help you take control of your home. Product installation is as simple as plugging it into an outlet. Walkthrough instructions are available right in the app for every device, making even a wall switch installation approachable. With the Kasia app on your smartphone, you can monitor and control your system from anywhere at the touch of a button.


Every Kasia device is interconnected with other Kasia devices around it to create a better connection. 













Gain peace of mind knowing that your lights and appliances are turned off when you are not at home. You will never again spend the day wondering if you left that space heater on.



No more wrinkled clothes or spoiled food or worrying about burning down your house!



Have your lights turn on and off while you are away on vacation giving people the illusion you are home. The Kasia app even knows when sunrise and sunset is so your lights can turn on exactly when they need to.





This is Kasia Presence in action. Lights automatically turn on as Eric walks into his room. The hallway lights automatically turn off soon after.






Select among all unlocked devices. Selecting Kasia Presence includes 2 presence sensors.



 1. Install Kasia devices using built in walkthroughs available in the Kasia app  

 2. In the app, initiate the pairing process

 3. Press the button on device for 5 seconds to begin pairing

 4. After pairing is complete, simply name your new device and add it to your home page





Over the last three years, we at Kasia have been working to create a home automation system that’s simple, affordable, reliable, and in general, more accessible to our friends and family. We’ve built the network infrastructure from the ground up, reducing costs and assuring reliable connectivity across the home. Each item in the Kasia product line comes with advanced features right out of the box with no monthly fees, making it affordable to expand your Kasia system to cover your whole house. Or office. Or wherever.


We’ve gone through numerous iterations on all aspects of Kasia, from hardware design, PCB design, APP design and firmware design to make sure Kasia works.



We’ve gone through multiple iterations for every device. All products are in their final design phases and we’ve already submitted them for official safety certifications. We have also already commenced the tooling of parts necessary for mass manufacturing. Unlike other Kickstarter projects, these steps alleviate much of the risk that a Kickstarter backer might face in a product concept.  Kasia is product ready to be manufactured as soon as our Kickstarter is complete.

I save money by knowing which devices use the most electricity so I can make sure to turn them off when not in use.
I don't need to search my house to make sure I've turned off all the lights. A simple press of a button and it's done.  
Have your lights turn on automatically as you come home with Kasia Presence.Simply put, Kasia beats competitors on both price and features.Kasia is made up of individual devices that work together to help you take control of your home. Product installation is as simple as plugging it into an outlet. Walkthrough instructions are available right in the app for every device, making even a wall switch installation approachable. With the Kasia app on your smartphone, you can monitor and control your system from anywhere at the touch of a button.Every Kasia device is interconnected with other Kasia devices around it to create a better connection. Gain peace of mind knowing that your lights and appliances are turned off when you are not at home. You will never again spend the day wondering if you left that space heater on.No more wrinkled clothes or spoiled food or worrying about burning down your house!Have your lights turn on and off while you are away on vacation giving people the illusion you are home. The Kasia app even knows when sunrise and sunset is so your lights can turn on exactly when they need to.This is Kasia Presence in action. Lights automatically turn on as Eric walks into his room. The hallway lights automatically turn off soon after.Select among all unlocked devices. Selecting Kasia Presence includes 2 presence sensors. 1. Install Kasia devices using built in walkthroughs available in the Kasia app   2. In the app, initiate the pairing process 3. Press the button on device for 5 seconds to begin pairing 4. After pairing is complete, simply name your new device and add it to your home pageOver the last three years, we at Kasia have been working to create a home automation system that’s simple, affordable, reliable, and in general, more accessible to our friends and family. We’ve built the network infrastructure from the ground up, reducing costs and assuring reliable connectivity across the home. Each item in the Kasia product line comes with advanced features right out of the box with no monthly fees, making it affordable to expand your Kasia system to cover your whole house. Or office. Or wherever.We’ve gone through numerous iterations on all aspects of Kasia, from hardware design, PCB design, APP design and firmware design to make sure Kasia works.We’ve gone through multiple iterations for every device. All products are in their final design phases and we’ve already submitted them for official safety certifications. We have also already commenced the tooling of parts necessary for mass manufacturing. Unlike other Kickstarter projects, these steps alleviate much of the risk that a Kickstarter backer might face in a product concept.  Kasia is product ready to be manufactured as soon as our Kickstarter is complete.Initial tooling completed and now waiting for revisionsWe have vetted multiple manufactures and have selected primaries and backups to produce Kasia. A list of parts suppliers have been finalized as well.We are a team of professional product developers, designers, and engineers with over 50 years of experience designing, building, and manufacturing products. The core team has been building both software and wireless products for over 10 years with manufacturing expertise to get the product to market quickly and efficiently. We have engineered our products with procurement and ease of manufacturing in mind.We have already invested a tremendous amount of our own money and money from friends and family into creating the system and designs of Kasia. We need your help to raise funds for the last stretch to get Kasia on the market. To deliver Kasia, we still need to complete the product tooling, procure the necessary components, and get the wireless and safety certifications for our devices.Risks and challenges
We have built a complex control system with many integrated components: firmware, software, hardware, and cloud components. In our commitment to our backers, we have minimized the risks typically associated with new projects by waiting until we have fully functioning systems prior to launching our campaign. In addition, the initial version 1 tooling creation has been completed and is now in the process of modification and fine tuning to create a polished product. Our team has already been working with a top safety certification company to assure that our products will be able to pass safety certifications in the shortest time possible. We will continue to improve with future software updates to enhance the performance of Kasia and add more features with input from our users.
There is always the possibility that there will be problems with tooling/manufactures and certifications of our devices. If that’s the case there may be a delay in the shipment of your product. However, we have taken all steps necessary to mitigate any of this and will continue to take the necessary steps to insure we send you a quality product on time.

story:
Shepherd Lock is the only lock on the market that can convert your existing door hardware into a unique touch sensor (No fingerprints, just the touch). This means that you can now unlock your door with a simple touch, all thanks to automotive grade touch™ technology. Don't worry — your existing door hardware will be maintained and AND your existing keys still work even with the Shepherd Lock installed.

The door will only unlock if you have a key-fob or smartphone key within the Intelligent Authentication Zone™. Plus, you don’t even have to take it out of your pocket or purse to unlock your door. 

The Thumb-turn Free™  design allows you to lock or unlock your door from the inside with a simple touch. 

There is also a mechanical back-up just in case. You can access the back-up by removing Shepherd’s magnetic cover.   

 

Shepherd is the first and only smart lock that can detect and thwart lock-picking attempts and truly protect your home against burglaries. 

Shepherd transforms your existing lock hardware into a sensor. Our Artificial Intelligence technology identifies threats, notifies you, disables the deadbolt, and helps you keep the bad guys out of your home. 

Intelligent Door Status™ gives you the ability to check whether your door is opened, closed, or anywhere in between from the app while you’re not at home.  

[Insert IDS GIF]

This patent-pending technology makes Shepherd Lock the first and only product that can detect when a door opens and closes without needing to install additional external hardware, like a door sensor or a magnet.

Using the mobile app, you can manage access to your home by sharing temporary or permanent encrypted keys, schedule single or multiple access time windows, view access history, receive alerts and much more. You’ll know who has access to your home and when. 

The electronic key-sharing feature allows you to give family and friends temporary or permanent encrypted keys. You can now give the nanny, maid, and others access to your home without handing out physical keys.

Similar to keyless entry in cars, a touch will only unlock the door if you have an authorized smartphone or key-fob within our Intelligent Authentication Zone™.

The Wi-Fi bridge enables you to control and monitor your lock remotely from anywhere around the world. 

To connect your lock to the internet, simply plug the bridge into a wall outlet and pair it with the lock using the mobile app. 

 

 

Our core team comes from the automotive industry. Shepherd was conceived at one of the world's largest automotive Tier 1 companies. Our core team spun off last year as PassiveBolt Inc, the makers of Shepherd Lock. We are leveraging 30 years of expertise in automotive keyless entry systems. We are transferring highly mature and robust automotive technologies into residential keyless entry. We are a team of engineers and designers determined to extend the convenience of automotive keyless entry to your home. We have also transformed the door lock into a monitoring device by inventing the first and only technology that can detect and thwart lock picking and tampering. Our design is complete, our team of experts is in place, our supply chain partners are ready to go. All we need is your support to bring the Shepherd to market.

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Shepherd Lock a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a Shepherd Lock, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! 

 

Risks and challenges

There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfillment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring Shepherd Lock to your home, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.

story:
Want energy your way?

CaffeinAll™ is the first non-bitter caffeine you can sprinkle on any food to turn it into an instant energy food.

“CaffeinAll™ Powder Caffeine Shaker- the future is here and it's very, very awake. Oh, and what is it that we've so craved and can finally have? Why, caffeinated french fries, of course!” — ThinkGeek

What If You Could Make Your Own Energy Food?


It would be liberating, fun, and save you a ton of money. Imagine the freedom from not needing to stay in line at Starbucks for that 16 oz. Cafe Latte or run to the convenience store to be Red Bullied. Imagine, instead, that you are the creator of your own energy food. Better yet — don’t just imagine. Make it happen.

Not only will you have more time, but also more energy too for that gym workout or dancing away the night the way you always wanted.

 


The Sad State of Caffeinated Products

Choose your caffeine pet peeve:

•       Price?    
•       Taste?
•       Inconvenience?
•       Too much liquid?   
•       Too many calories?   
•       Unneeded or questionable ingredients?



Now, having a long list like this is a real downer in itself, isn’t it?

Not only that —  you also need to buy them at least once a day or multiple times a week, keep them hot or cold, and hope that you’re not one of the 20+% of the people suffering from any aftereffect, such as nausea, headache, feeling overdosed then crashing.

We knew the solution was to give YOU the control. And that’s what we are delivering.


Make Your Own Energy Foods with CaffeinAll™


CaffeinAll™ is the world’s first non-bitter caffeine in a handy shaker bottle. It can be added to any food, is fun to use, and is much more affordable than other products. Also, it only contains three all-natural, proven ingredients.

As a free-flowing powder, you can sprinkle on any food: Burgers, Pizza, Fries, Salads, Ice cream, Coffee, or Hot chocolate. Anything you cook or eat at home, at a restaurant, or in your car/truck. You get the picture.

The patented sifter and bottle cap enables you to deliver an average 100 mg caffeine in a sprinkle shot, to give you the energy of a strong cup of coffee. Talking about coffee - no more — but without worrying about carrying it, spilling it, or burning yourself, among other things.


What is the science behind CaffeinAll™?


Caffeine is one of the few substances that can pass through the blood-brain barrier, thanks to being a very small molecule that is both water- and oil-soluble. Plus, due to its specific molecular structure, it is capable of alternately being polar and non-polar – so it is able to penetrate brain cell membranes as soon as it passes through the blood brain barrier. There it temporarily replaces adenosine, one of the the brain’s slow-down chemicals, thus increasing alertness and concentration.

Caffeine also increases the level of circulating fatty acids and the oxidation rate of these fuels, producing energy for the muscles. For this reason it’s particularly effective in endurance sports, like long-distance running, swimming, and skiing.

The encapsulating compounds we use make CaffeinAll™ both free of bitterness and easy to digest. Additionally, they enable it to flow freely and control dosage size.  

Our secret formula enables caffeine to be digested quickly and remain concentrated enough to quickly produce significant energy. As a result, CaffeinAll™ is not just a viable, but literally an eye-opening product.



You Are in Control of Your Health


As a healthy adult, your body can safely handle between 400 and 600 mg caffeine a day. We recommend that you use no more than 3 sprinkle shots, containing (about 300 mg caffeine) a day.

The reason is that you most likely have caffeine from other sources too, like soft drinks, coffee, tea, even chocolate. As long as you are mindful of them and don’t exceed this safe amount, you won’t have to be concerned about your health.

For additional protection, we explicitly warn minors, persons with heart condition or caffeine sensitivity, and pregnant women that CaffeinAll™, and caffeine in general, is not safe for them to use.


Easy to Carry. Convenient to Use.


Each small, unbreakable bottle contains 200 doses of our product (200 cups of strong coffee’s worth). It easily fits in your pocket, briefcase, purse, glove compartment, and the cup holder in your car, so you can bring it along wherever you go.

Then energize your food in seconds and enjoy the boost while getting back to taking care of the important things in your life.


How Do I Use It?


Any way you want it on any of your foods. You are the creator of your own energy foods.

At home.On the road.In a restaurant.At work.In the gym.At the game.

Anywhere, anytime you need to stay alert or need a quick pick-me-up.

 Here are some of our favorite ways to sprinkle:

•       Keep a bottle in your office for a quick pre-meeting pick-me-up.

•       Stick a bottle in your car so you can use a few sprays on that long drive home.

•       Stow a bottle in your carry-on bag so that you can catch a few sprays before powering through that presentation (or Sudoku puzzle) on your next flight.

•       Carry a bottle in your gym bag so you can get energized while running or lifting without feeling weighed down.

•       Carry a bottle in your bag or pocket for that big Friday night out. It will fit in at any nightclub and will keep you out-partying the 22 year olds (or 62 year olds if your grandparents rock like that).


An Awesome Value


Because you can take your CaffeinAll™ anywhere, you will avoid spending a king’s ransom every time you need energy. Instead of buying an energy drink upwards of $12 dollars in the night club, or a $6-dollar, fast food–quality latte at an airport, you pay just nine cents per serving for the equivalent of a cup of coffee.

It takes 200 cans of energy drinks or cup of coffee, costing in the neighborhood of $400, to equal one $17.99 bottle of CaffeinAll™. That adds up to savings of $380. Do you drink three a day? Spend your $2,000+ annual savings on your next vacation.


The Media Speaks

“This tub of caffeine powder can be sprinkled on top of any food — or stirred into any drink — to transform it into an energy quick-fix.”

“For people who can’t find the time to drink enough coffee to wake them up or for those who just don’t like the taste of coffee, this creative fix solves the problem.”

“This odorless, tasteless powder comes in containers that dispense a pre-measured 'shake' that contains about 100 mg of caffeine. The powder is quite cheap, with one "shake" costing about 9 cents.”


Our Early Users Speak

“I tried all the energy drinks and find them to just make me sick and most are full of sugar. A friend of mine and his coworkers who work nights use this product. They told me that it works better than anything else and they use it on their food before and during work and are able to feel energized all night.” –Ben

“I never thought of being able to shake caffeine on my food and get more energy this way.” –Rachel

"I love all forms of energy drinks, the problem is the extra liquid has me hitting the bathroom frequently... I'm on the road a lot so this has been an issue. Coffee, tea or any of that stuff is just more liquid. Anyway, I found this product and it has proven to be what I was looking for. Plus those energy drinks and shots have sugar and are loaded with who knows what! This stuff is quick, simple and it works."  –Tom

“This is very effective. Just remember to stop taking it about 6 hours before bedtime. Cheaper than energy drinks loaded with sugar. Easier on my tummy than coffee and it doesn't stain my teeth like colas." –Amy

“After trying this product and seeing its versatility it has me hooked for life.” –Raymond

The Team

Andy, June, and Steve have known and worked together on new food products and ventures for years. They started to develop CaffeinAll™ in 2011. After thorough product and market testing, they are now eager to share it with the world.

Steve Kingsley – Co-founder

 A food scientist with three patents to his credit and a fourth on the way, Steve is not only an accomplished new product developer, but also a serial entrepreneur. He founded Cuisine Crafts, Inc., to commercialize his first invention, to make pickles in a rapid, environmentally safe way. Once it was licensed, he developed and patented Flavor Aging™, an environmentally-friendly coffee flavoring and packaging method. He licensed it to Caffe Espress Corp., where he became a partner in charge of R&D and production until the company was sold. Subsequently, he developed and commercialized the CaffeMallows™ line of gourmet caffeinated marshmallows — that were written up in the Wall Street Journal and Bloomberg Business Week — and, finally, formulated CaffeinAll™.

June Marshall - Co-founder

Since starting her career in retail sales at the age of thirteen in her father’s Safari Shop, June hasn’t stopped creating, marketing, and selling. After earning a MA in English, she became the owner of  B. Flower and Sun Honey Company, where she made and distributed her products in the New York Metro area. Having sold the business, she is now the driving force behind our marketing. Sweet!  

Andy Debreceni - Cofounder

A production engineer and manager by vocation, with a degree in economics from Columbia University, Andy left a mind-numbing corporate job at Coach Bags to manage the production of Flavor Aged coffees at Caffe Espress. There, in addition to ingesting lots of caffeine, he also got infected by the entrepreneurial bug. So much so that he now is ready and stomping like a wild bull (Red Bull beware!) to do the same for CaffeinAll™.


About This Campaign

Here’s where you come in.

We have perfected and tested our product, arranged for the use of a FDA GMP and Kosher approved production facility, and are ready to gear up production on a moment’s notice.

We're raising $25,000 here to enable us to produce CaffeinAll™ at a scale that will make it affordable to everyone.

In return for your early support, you'll be one the first ones to get CaffeinAll™ 100 — plus some pretty great perks — and to support a company trying to make it fun, easy, and inexpensive for people to get their energy.


Not ready for this much energy and fun? 

We understand (sort of). Still, we'd really, really appreciate it if you could:

1) Personally spread the word to friends and family that you think would benefit from our product.

2) Share the project with your friends on Facebook and Twitter.

If you’ve read this far, we’re truly grateful for your interest. Thank you for your support to make this possible!


Frequently Asked Questions

We reckon that you may have a few questions, so we’ve prepared answers to the most frequent ones here. Take a look, and if you still have anything you’d like to know about our product or campaign, feel free to email us at: contact@gastroplex.com.

Does it work?

Absolutely. Our shaker enables you to control the caffeine you add to your food – giving you just the right amount of energy.

Is CaffeinAll™ patented?

The process to produce the non-bitter caffeine is patented.

How do I use CaffeinAll™?

Sprinkle it on your food or drink. We recommend you start with one sprinkle shot in the morning and one or two shots early or late afternoon — but do not use more than three shots a day. It is also a good idea to avoid it (and any other product that contains caffeine) before sleep.

How often can I sprinkle?

Sprinkle one shot up to three times during twenty-four hours.  

Does CaffeinAll™ have a smell or color?

Our product is an odorless white powder. It won’t stain your teeth or interfere with other flavors in your food.  

How does CaffeinAll™ work with other caffeinated products?

CaffeinAll™ is friendly and plays just great with other products. Just make sure you don’t exceed 400 to 600 mg caffeine a day from all sources.

Is CaffeinAll™ safe?

Our product has no known side effects. The amount of caffeine per serving contained in CaffeinAll™ is the same found in a cup of coffee and some energy drinks so it’s great for those who think energy drinks are overkill. However, if you are allergic or sensitive to caffeine, or have a heart condition, you should not use our product.

Is it safe for pregnant women?

While current research is inconclusive on the effect of caffeine on pregnancy, most doctors recommend limiting caffeine intake to less than 200 milligrams a day during pregnancy. We always play it safe and do not market our product to anyone who is pregnant.

How about kids?

We don't recommend or market our product to children and teenagers under the age of 18.

Can I use CaffeinAll™ with coffee or energy drinks?

Using our product with multiple high-caffeine energy drinks isn’t recommended, but having soft drinks, coffee or tea in moderation with our product isn’t dangerous. However, for the sake of safety, we do not recommend using multiple sources of caffeine intake at one time. This will only result in moving you away from your desired state of being awake and focused towards jitteriness and becoming over-stimulated.

Where is CaffeinAll™ manufactured?

CaffeinAll™ is manufactured and bottled right here in the USA in a FDA GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices) facility that’s also Kosher certified.

When do you ship my reward?

We expect to fulfill our crowdfunding orders by September 15, 2014. Delays are not likely, but possible. We promise to keep our backers informed of any issue that might impact our production and fulfillment schedule.


For Our International Supporters

If you're not from the United States, please just add $15 to any reward up to $200, and we'll get it shipped to you just the same. For any reward over $200, please add $30.

Also, you will be responsible to pay the customs fees, as we have no way of knowing what they are in your country.

Thank you!


Risks 

Since CaffeinAll™ is a fully developed and market-tested product, that conforms to all current and proposed FDA regulations, we do not expect it be affected by possible regulatory or market changes now or in the future.

As with any legally available substance, there is a statistically determined safe usage range. We specifically warn our customers not to use more than 300 mg a day, otherwise they assume all responsibility for their action. We believe that with all the precautions we have taken in designing and labeling CaffeinAll™, it has the highest level of safety and protection.

Fulfilling pre-orders, rewards, and subsequent orders:  Our FDA GMP and kosher certified production facility is ready to start production after the campaign ends. We do not foresee any reason for delays, but should one develop, we'll do our utmost to make sure it doesn't impact you. 


Thank You for Your Time to Read Our Story

Inspired? Energize your life while saving money and the environment!
