story:
Product Concept

 

Do you have a hard time choosing a toy for your young children? Do you worry about the effect of electronics on their health and addiction to television and phone games? Are they easily tired of toys? Relax, and learn how Aoland Magic Jungle solves all these problems!

 

What is Magic Jungle?

 

Magic Jungle is a set of toys that aims to bring children closer to animals and create a joyful experience shared with friends. The set, comprised of a magic wand and five animal characters, features multiple playing modes. Gently touch the heads of the animals with the magic wand and watch them light up. Switch on the sound mode to hear the animals sing, imitate real animal sounds, or play the music of a electronic piano and drum, creating the atmosphere of a carnival in a forest.

 

No need to connect to a phone.

No software to download.

No toxic or harmful substances included.

 

 

Collaborated Media

 

 

Story

 

Luo – Founder of Aoland, came up with the idea of connecting kids to the mother nature through this toy. He loves to travel and explore and was deeply moved by the wildlife in the rain forest when he visited the Amazon in 2016.

“I was amazed by everything I saw in the jungle, unfortunately, I couldn’t take my daughter with me because she’s too young. Kids today have been living in the city for so long and barely have a chance to learn about wild animals. As a father and leader of a toy company, I really want to create a toy that can let kids get to know wildlife,” said Luo.

Therefore, Luo started to work on the concept. He wanted to create a set of toys that can presents a jungle-like atmosphere.

The first thing he thought about was sound. As a major sense of understanding the world, hearing can help children to feel the environment, animal sounds will help them to distinguish different animals in the jungle. For this reason, Luo decided to add the element of simulated animal sounds into the toy.

Next, we brainstormed the other elements, from appearance and playing methods to the materials used. We carefully designed the toy to be child friendly and worked diligently to perfect the factors of sound, light, and form.

"I really hope my daughter can stay close to nature, even if she is living in a modern city. Making friends with animals makes her kind and willing to protect the nature and animals. This is a common responsibility." said Luo.

After two-year hard work, the final sample is completed! We are so excited to launch our project on Indiegogo. We believe that your children will have a great time with these animal friends. All we need now is just a little support from you to make the magic happened.

 

Elephant, Puppy, Piggy, Tiger, Chicken

 

The animal theme motivates children’s kindness and curiosity. Under your child's command, with the help of the magic wand, these five animals can sing, imitate real animals sounds, and make sounds of electrical piano or drum, just like a carnival in a forest. They will become the perfect companion for your little one.

 

To play with the toys, simply switch the sound modes by pressing the buttons on the magic wand: use the end to gently tap the animals on their heads to explore the jungle and the music!

 

With the help of child-education specialists and designers, we finally choose these five animals: elephant, puppy, piggy, tiger, and chicken.​

 

Each animal represents a different attribute:

 

  • Elephant – Happiness

 

  • Puppy – Thankfulness 

 

  • Piggy – Excitement

 

  • Tiger – Bravery

 

  • Chicken – Encouragement

 

These five animals can be lit at the same time, and of course, you can choose any of them to form a new combination.

 

No need to fear darkness, darling! Light your bedtime story with the glowing Magic Jungle cuties and let the journey begin.

 

Magic Wand

 

Single playing mode – press the button to get different light effects. Oh, wow! It looks like you are given the magic power!

Light effects: 7 Basic Colors + 3 Iridescence + 2 Lollipop Colors

 

Playing with animals – Simply switch sound modes by pressing the buttons on the magic wand and use the end to gently tap the animals on their heads to explore the jungle and the music!

Two colors option

 

How to Play?

 

Two Playing Modes

 

Single playing mode: each animal has its own unique light up.

 

Multiple playing mode: all the animals light up together.

 

Four Sound Modes

 

Animal sound mode: Imitate the real animal’s sounds to feel as if you’re really in the jungle.

Electric piano sound mode: Create melodies with your five animal friends.

Drum mode: Play the drums with five different beats.

Concert mode: Relax and just listen to the songs.

 

Animal Night Light

An individual animal toy can serve as a night light to accompany your children to sleep.

They can also be good bedtime story helpers that make your story more vivid.

 

Kids & Eco Friendly

 

  • The 3.5-inch full-band Rubidium Iron Boron (RbFeB) speaker ensures a clear and pure sound, effectively protecting one’s hearing.
  • The products are made from RoHS material (ABS and Vinyl).
  • The ABS thick shell is wear-resistant and strong.
  • Sensor module technology is adopted into the product.
  • Children’s strength and palm size have been factored into the precise specifications of the product design to ensure the toys are suited for a child’s grip.

 

 

 

Our Team

 

Aoland was established in 2013. Adhering to the brand concept of "The Discoverer of Happiness", we have been focusing on the development and production of innovative digital products for children.

We wish to use advanced technology, extraordinary imagination, as well as beautiful and friendly designs to bring the best, most intelligent toy products to children. They will become the greatest companion for children and create the happiest childhood memories.

 

Core pursuit:

Simple – simplified technological application

Fun – the essence of toys

Imaginative – stimulate human’s highest cognitive ability

Smart – better understand children’s expression

Safe – harmless and safe companion

 

FAQs

 

Q: Is Magic Jungle suitable for 10-year-old kids?

A: Yes. Actually, Magic Jungle is suitable for kids from 3 to 12 years old. The older kids prefer to use the animal toys as their nightlights. 

Q: Is Magic Jungle safe?

A: Yes, they are totally safe. All the materials are made from antibacterial plastic which is a high-tech plastic that can inhibit and kill bacteria and even viruses.

Q: How long does it last for one charge?

A: For the magic wand, the battery capacity is 1200mAh. It needs to be charged for 3hrs and the battery endurance is 8hrs. For each animal toy, the battery capacity is 240mAh. It needs to be charged for 2hrs and the battery endurance is 6 hrs.

Q: Is it water proof?

A: You can damp the towel to wipe the surface of the toys. But we do not recommend you to give them a shower. 

Q: How long to receive the toys?

A: Magic Jungle will be shipped immediately as soon as we receive the funds.  Once your packages are sent, you will receive them in approximate 15 days.

Q: If I receive the defective packages, what can I do?

A: Usually they will be shipped to your hand safely. But if you lose your package or receive the defective package, please email us immediately.

story:
WHAT IS MUGGINO®?

We don’t think anyone in 2017 will want peas porridge nine days old, but if they pour it in a Muggino®, it will still be hot…or cold.

Muggino® is a self-powered smart vessel that keeps both hot and cold drinks (from beer to coffee and from ice cream to pumpkin soup) to in your favorite temperature zones for much longer than you have ever been able to before. Patented technology allows Muggino® to do this while conserving energy from waste heat.

Muggino® keeps your drink just right, period. No fuss, no programming, hot remains hot, cold remains cold, and heat outside the range of optimum drinking is stored in the form of energy for later use.

However, just as humans are different, so are their tastes. The MuggiApp™ has been exclusively designed for Muggino® in order to allow users to tune their preferences at will.

 

HOW MUGGINO® WORKS?

After you fill your mug with a hot tea or coffee, you can't immediately sip on it given the extreme temperature. As you wait for drinkable temperature, almost 1/3rd of energy deployed to heat your drink simply goes to waste. But Muggino® changes the game for better by smart harvest of this energy and uses it to charge up its battery. When the liquid reaches the user’s optimal temperature, Muggino® keeps it there using its agile thermoelectric heating system.

And a similar process applies to cold beverages.

The heart of Muggino® is thermoelectrics, a semiconductor material which converts temperature differences into electricity and vice versa. On a small scale, it's still a relatively nascent technology, but you'll find it in picnic coolers that plug into your car or seat coolers in luxury vehicles.

                  (Schematic of a typical thermoelectric module - Credit: Amir Faraji)

                  For more technical information visit www.muggino.com/technology

 

KEY FEATURES

Advance cooling and heating system

As one pours his beer into Muggino, the mug sensors would immediately gauge the temperature, with its control unit comparing it to his set temperature limit on the MuggiApp. If the drink’s temperature seems higher to the user’s favorite temperature, Muggino's advance cooling system starts working to cool down the beer and as it reaches to the needed temperature, Muggino keeps it there for long time.

For hot beverages, if too hot, Muggino harvests what in any other mug is waste heat and converts it to electricity, and stores it in its battery. When the liquid reaches the user’s optimal temperature, Muggino keeps it there using its agile and efficient heating system.

Advance waste heat recovery system

After filling a mug with a nice hot beverage the average person usually lets it sit. Some take a quick, painful, noisy slurp, burn their lips and tongue, then wait like the rest. They wait until their scalding hot beverage bleeds off the heat and reaches a drinkable temperature (typically 140 °F/ 60 °C). During that time about one-third of the energy expended to heat up the drink in the first place goes to waste … something around 150 thermal watts. This is where Muggino smartly harvests this energy and charges its battery - and saves our Planet :)

360° drinking experience

 

 

GALLERY

 

HOW WE GOT HERE?

Step 1: Brainstorming and concept design

 

Step 2: Product design, Mechanical & Electronic design

 

Step 3: Prototyping and resourcing

In 2013 we applied for Provisional Patent with USPTO (United State Patent and Trademark Office) and a year later we filed an application for Non-Provisional Utility Patent. At the moment Muggino® is patent pending and its trademark is registered with IP Australia.

 

MEASUREMENTS 

 

 

PERKS

 

TIMELINE

 

WHO WE ARE?

Creating an amazing, competitive hardware product in 2016 and beyond is a complex combination of creativity, dedication, experience, technology, engineering, precision, design, and business sense. We know from personal experience, education, and thorough research that those teams which forget to maintain motivation and balance lose sight of the end-goal. We are committed to agile methods that combine creativity and professionalism so that quality is maintained at a maximum without undue delays.

 

  • Apple, Lightning and iOS are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
  • Android is a trademark of Google Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
  • Bluetooth is a trademark of Bluetooth SIG Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Design for Manufacturability: 
We have tested initial prototypes of Muggino in every stage to ensure it works perfectly. However, Muggino for mass production will need added care in design to meet manufacturing requirements. Our industrial designers may need to refine some parts to fit better. Such challenges while generally anticipated are impossible to predict in advance with a high degree of accuracy. For our valuable supporters this means that while we will work to avoid any delays, some are possible and as such we must acknowledge the possibility in advance.

Fabrication process: 
Volume fabrication is complex and involves significant manpower and machinery. Components have to work together for the job to be finished on time. In project management on this scope, it must be understood that a delay in one part can lead to bottlenecks along the production line, resulting in greater delays to the process as a whole. We follow modern techniques that minimize such potential bottlenecks, but we also believe in being ready at all times for the unexpected. When anything unplanned arises, we are and will stay poised to keep its effect on the next milestone to a minimum, and we will keep our supporters updated throughout the project.

Certifications and licences: 
We designed Muggino knowing that any material coming in contact with beverages must meet food-grade standards. However different countries maintain different definitions of such standards. One of our challenges is to obtain full certification for the international sale and distribution of Muggino. We believe the most cost effective strategy will be to interview and select a company specializing in such international certification, and engage its services in planning for and obtaining necessary certificates (food and electricity) for Muggino.
story_txt:
WHAT IS MUGGINO®?We don’t think anyone in 2017 will want peas porridge nine days old, but if they pour it in a Muggino®, it will still be hot…or cold.Muggino® is a self-powered smart vessel that keeps both hot and cold drinks (from beer to coffee and from ice cream to pumpkin soup) to in your favorite temperature zones for much longer than you have ever been able to before. Patented technology allows Muggino® to do this while conserving energy from waste heat.Muggino® keeps your drink just right, period. No fuss, no programming, hot remains hot, cold remains cold, and heat outside the range of optimum drinking is stored in the form of energy for later use.However, just as humans are different, so are their tastes. The MuggiApp™ has been exclusively designed for Muggino® in order to allow users to tune their preferences at will. HOW MUGGINO® WORKS?After you fill your mug with a hot tea or coffee, you can't immediately sip on it given the extreme temperature. As you wait for drinkable temperature, almost 1/3rd of energy deployed to heat your drink simply goes to waste. But Muggino® changes the game for better by smart harvest of this energy and uses it to charge up its battery. When the liquid reaches the user’s optimal temperature, Muggino® keeps it there using its agile thermoelectric heating system.And a similar process applies to cold beverages. The heart of Muggino® is thermoelectrics, a semiconductor material which converts temperature differences into electricity and vice versa. On a small scale, it's still a relatively nascent technology, but you'll find it in picnic coolers that plug into your car or seat coolers in luxury vehicles.                  (Schematic of a typical thermoelectric module - Credit: Amir Faraji)                  For more technical information visit www.muggino.com/technology KEY FEATURESAdvance cooling and heating systemAs one pours his beer into Muggino, the mug sensors would immediately gauge the temperature, with its control unit comparing it to his set temperature limit on the MuggiApp. If the drink’s temperature seems higher to the user’s favorite temperature, Muggino's advance cooling system starts working to cool down the beer and as it reaches to the needed temperature, Muggino keeps it there for long time.For hot beverages, if too hot, Muggino harvests what in any other mug is waste heat and converts it to electricity, and stores it in its battery. When the liquid reaches the user’s optimal temperature, Muggino keeps it there using its agile and efficient heating system.Advance waste heat recovery systemAfter filling a mug with a nice hot beverage the average person usually lets it sit. Some take a quick, painful, noisy slurp, burn their lips and tongue, then wait like the rest. They wait until their scalding hot beverage bleeds off the heat and reaches a drinkable temperature (typically 140 °F/ 60 °C). During that time about one-third of the energy expended to heat up the drink in the first place goes to waste … something around 150 thermal watts. This is where Muggino smartly harvests this energy and charges its battery - and saves our Planet :)360° drinking experience  GALLERY HOW WE GOT HERE?Step 1: Brainstorming and concept design Step 2: Product design, Mechanical & Electronic design Step 3: Prototyping and resourcingIn 2013 we applied for Provisional Patent with USPTO (United State Patent and Trademark Office) and a year later we filed an application for Non-Provisional Utility Patent. At the moment Muggino® is patent pending and its trademark is registered with IP Australia. MEASUREMENTS   PERKS TIMELINE WHO WE ARE?Creating an amazing, competitive hardware product in 2016 and beyond is a complex combination of creativity, dedication, experience, technology, engineering, precision, design, and business sense. We know from personal experience, education, and thorough research that those teams which forget to maintain motivation and balance lose sight of the end-goal. We are committed to agile methods that combine creativity and professionalism so that quality is maintained at a maximum without undue delays. 
Apple, Lightning and iOS are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
Android is a trademark of Google Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
Bluetooth is a trademark of Bluetooth SIG Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
 RISKS AND CHALLENGESDesign for Manufacturability: We have tested initial prototypes of Muggino in every stage to ensure it works perfectly. However, Muggino for mass production will need added care in design to meet manufacturing requirements. Our industrial designers may need to refine some parts to fit better. Such challenges while generally anticipated are impossible to predict in advance with a high degree of accuracy. For our valuable supporters this means that while we will work to avoid any delays, some are possible and as such we must acknowledge the possibility in advance.Fabrication process: Volume fabrication is complex and involves significant manpower and machinery. Components have to work together for the job to be finished on time. In project management on this scope, it must be understood that a delay in one part can lead to bottlenecks along the production line, resulting in greater delays to the process as a whole. We follow modern techniques that minimize such potential bottlenecks, but we also believe in being ready at all times for the unexpected. When anything unplanned arises, we are and will stay poised to keep its effect on the next milestone to a minimum, and we will keep our supporters updated throughout the project.Certifications and licences: We designed Muggino knowing that any material coming in contact with beverages must meet food-grade standards. However different countries maintain different definitions of such standards. One of our challenges is to obtain full certification for the international sale and distribution of Muggino. We believe the most cost effective strategy will be to interview and select a company specializing in such international certification, and engage its services in planning for and obtaining necessary certificates (food and electricity) for Muggino.

story:
The Qrio Smart Lock was developed in Japan as a convenient way to operate a door lock with a smartphone. 

It was planned by Qrio, a joint venture between WiL, LLP. and Sony Corporation , and designed and produced by Sony. 

Unlike other smart locks on the market, the Qrio Smart Lock can be easily installed without removing the existing door lock.

We are offering the product with attachments for door locks most commonly used in the US.

This simple installation process opens the door to freedom, flexibility and security!

 

 

The Qrio Smart Lock automatically locks the door when you go out.

By using the “Keyless Unlock” feature, your door will automatically unlock when you approach it. No more fishing around for your phone or keys!

 

Installation takes as little as five minutes. It’s super easy! 

The package includes multiple attachments for numerous types of thumb turn locks. Even when the Smart Lock doesn’t fit perfectly to your lock, the included bolt turner attachment can usually fill the gap. 

 

Your door lock is your first line of defense in home security. It’s important that a smart lock be sturdy, reliable and, most of all, safe!

The Qrio Smart Lock was built using the very best encryption technology Sony has to offer. 

This cutting edge technology ensures that the Qrio Smart Lock can only be operated by you and those you trust the most.  

 

 

Sony’s information technology provides unprecedented security in addition to convenience.

The Qrio Smart Lock is backed by Sony’s sophisticated encryption and two-factor authentication technology. 

And, you can keep track of every time the Smart Lock operates through an action log delivered to your phone - even if your door is manually unlocked with a physical key. 

 

 

With the Qrio Hub, you can monitor your door from anywhere in the world.

The Remote Unlock feature also allows you to lock and unlock your door from anywhere – great for letting friends and family check in on your pets while you’re away, or for emergency situations.

 

 

Qrio has already sold 10,000 Smart Lock units in Japan.

We always pledge timely delivery and we have the track record to prove it!

 

Project Timeline

 

Media list

Qrio Smart Lock + Qrio Hub

17% off from the $338 retail price

  • Qrio Smart Lock, plus remote operation device, the Qrio Hub
  • Includes: Qrio Smart Lock, Qrio Hub, additional attachments (x3)
  • Free shipping
  • International customs fees may apply for backers outside of Japan

 

 

 

Type of thumb turn

  • The Qrio Smart Lock’s thumb turn cover cannot accommodate locks with a base diameter of 1.81 inches (46mm) or larger. The length of the thumb turn knob must also be 1.73 inches (44mm) or shorter for the thumb turn cover to fit properly.
  • Even if the thumb turn cover does not fit properly, the Qrio Smart Lock will still operate as intended for many of these locks. However, depending on the exact size and dimensions of your lock, there are instances in which the Qrio Smart Lock cannot be affixed.

 

  • The vertical length of your thumb turn lock’s base must be .59 inches (15mm) or shorter.

 

Positioning on the Door

  • The Qrio Smart Lock must be placed on a flat surface
  • The Smart Lock device can be affixed vertically or horizontally

  • The device requires 1.57 inches (40mm) of clearance between the lock and door frame

 

Supported Smartphone Operating Systems

Please ensure that your OS is supported before ordering:

  OS enabled device
iPhone iOS 9 and above iPhone4S and above
Android

Android4.4 and above.

Devices must support Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) – Please check your system settings

 

 

Other systems and services

  • has Auto lock system (10-60 seconds)
  • is suitable for various kinds of locks using thumb turn holders and height adjustment plates
  • can share key with friends and family.
  • can make time limited keys.
  • can show record of usage.
  • can register with a number of devices.
  • works fine with smart watches.

Qrio Smart Lock

Dimensions: Approx. 57 mm × 155.5 mm × 84.5 mm (2.24 in × 6.12 in × 3.33 in) (w/h/d)

Mass:  Approx. 383g (13.51 oz) (With 2 of CR123A lithium batteries)

Bluetooth: Bluetooth 4.0 (Bluetooth Low Energy)

Accessories: Main unit, Battery(CR123A ×2), Double Sided Tape ×2, Adjusting Plate A ×2, Adjusting Plate B, Thumbturn Holder ×4, etc.

※ Final product accessories may vary 

 

Qrio Hub

Dimensions: Approx. 71 mm × 91.2 mm × 26 mm (2.8 in × 3.59 in × 1.02 in) (w/h/d)

Mass: Approx. 105 g (3.70 oz)

Wi-Fi: 802.11b/g/n

BluetoothR: BluetoothR4.1

※ Final product accessories may vary 

 

　What smartphones are supported by the Qrio Smart Lock?

For iOS devices, the Qrio Smart Lock is compatible with iPhone4S devices and newer. The device is compatible with Android4.4 operating systems and above. The Smart Lock also functions with any device with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) compatibility. 

 

　Is the Qrio Smart Lock compatible with smart watches and other wearables?

The Smart Lock is compatible with the Apple Watch and Sony’s SmartWatch3.

※ Your smartwatch must be compatible with your smartphone. Additionally, smartwatch functionality is limited to areas in which the Qrio Smart Lock can connect with both your smartwatch and smartphone.  

 

　Is my personal data safe when using the Qrio Smart Lock?

Qrio uses Public-key Cryptography – a next generation information security system. There is extremely little risk of personal information being stolen from your smartphone’s communication with the Qrio Smart Lock device. 

 

　How do I install the Qrio Smart Lock to my door?

The Qrio Smart Lock is applied to your door using double-sided adhesive tape (included). This tape is extremely secure and durable, and is unlikely to leave marks or residue when removed. Additionally, there is no need for piercing or drilling, and the device is easily installed on your existing lock. 

 

　Is there an auto-lock function?

Yes. The auto-lock can be set to lock/unlock anywhere between 10 to 60 seconds of you approaching your door. You can turn the auto-lock function on and off, and set the delay timer on your Qrio Smart Lock app. For your safety, we advise that you take care when using this function.

 

　Can the Qrio Smart Lock be operated from long distances?

Yes. You can operate your Qrio Smart Lock from anywhere using the Qrio Hub device. 

 

　How long does the Qrio Smart Lock’s battery last?

The Qrio Smart Lock’s two CR123A high capacity lithium batteries will last approximately 300 days. This can be extended to about 600 days by using four batteries. (*)

If the batteries located in either battery compartment are low, the Qrio Smart Lock will automatically warn you. When using four batteries, the Smart Lock will access one compartment at a time, so that users can keep the device in constant operation by switching used batteries one compartment at a time.

※ Battery life estimates assume the Qrio Smart Lock is operated up to ten times per day. Battery life may change depending on the frequency of individual users’ operation of the device. 

 

　Will I be able to use my lock manually?

You will be able to open your door lock as usual with your existing physical key after installing the Qrio Smart Lock. We recommend you keep your key with you as a backup.

 

　What if I have two locks on my door?

It is possible to apply a Qrio Smart Lock to each of your door locks. The Qrio Smart Lock app will sync both devices. 

※The Qrio Smart Lock is not compatible with chain locks

 

　Is there a monthly fee?

No, Qrio does not charge a monthly usage fee.

 

　Is Qrio only delivering Smart Lock devices to the United States?

At this time, we are only offering delivery to the U.S. We are very sorry for the inconvenience. 

 

　When can I receive my Qrio Smart Lock?

We plan to begin shipping units to U.S. customers beginning Feb. 2017, in the order that requests are received. 

Qrio is a manufacturer of smart home appliances launched in December 2014 as a joint venture between WiL and Sony.

In Japan, we released Qrio Smart Lock in August 2015 and Qrio Smart Tag in October 2016. Both products gained top-class support from crowdfunding in Japan.

story:
Taking measurements always seems to be a two men job. Tangled tape measure, approximations, inadequacies. We've all been there. P1s is here to change the game.  It's the ultimate measuring tool designed to make life easier for those who need to accurately and quickly measure items daily.

P1s is a highly accurate, fast and easy-to-use laser measurement tool. Forget the bulky, complicated laser distance meters and discover a beginners-friendly, high-specs tool, which measures up to all life’s challenges. 

Don't just take our word for it!

Enjoy a two-fingers-on grip and get your measurements with a click of an ergonomic side button. Awesome!  

Switch between modes and get the readings you need in a fast and precise manner.

Hands up if you love going through manuals? So we thought. Save yourself a measurement-headache and easily switch between different modes with a click of a button.

 Let the numbers speak for themselves.

We wouldn't say P1s is different. It's unique. So what exactly makes it stand out? 

Our special smart switch add-on gives you the extra edge for a more precise alignment, which can make all the difference. Made from a sensor and magnetic base it can be conveniently attached or detached with ease.

 Use P1s as a remote control to take measurements in hard to reach spots and difficult conditions, and say goodbye to tangled tape measures. Simply double click to go into auto fetch mode, place it on the starting point, and walk to endpoint. In just 10 seconds your measurement data will be available.

 Do you work as an interior design consultant, architect, or garden planner? 

Measure your clients expectations in an elegant and timely manner.

Quantity surveying, construction area, or engineer ...everywhere where numbers come first.

Planning a major house redecoration? 

Don’t second guess your furniture choices, P1s fits into your pocket or purse letting you measure both at home and in store. Have that built-in wardrobe fitted to perfection.

Measure up to life’s challenges. 

Presentation pointer, your child’s growth guard or something you and your cat can bond over. Make it yours.

Stable Performance: More reliable thanks to its ergonomic design. Say goodbye to tangled tape measures, and rows of confusing buttons.

Precision Lens: Proving that user-friendly doesn’t have to mean compromising on functionalities.

Sensitive Electronic Level: Measuring with a laser requires either the use of a level or some sort of level surface to work off and it's surprising how far off your measurements can be if you don't use the level properly. 

 The electronic level on this tool is more accurate (0.1°), more intuitive, and more environmentally friendly than the bubble.

Brilliant Display: Our OLED display offers easy and convenient readings even in dark or extremely bright environments, and the SmartScreen lets you easily see the readings from each and every angle.

Portable: Don't you think?

insert gif pictures. 

Accessorize with our range of add-ons. 

Smart Switch (Optional)

Most of us would still rather use a traditional measure type over a laser device when measuring for small surfaces - our smart switch add-on gives you the extra edge for a more precise alignment. 

Wrist Strap (Optional)

Tripod Interface (Optional)

 A 1/4" - 20 tripod interface, although not necessary for smooth use, will offer extra stability, for best results when measuring long distances, keep your dot steady with a tripod, which is particularly handy with indirect measurements. 

 

  About Us

Since 2016, our team has been engaged in developing laser distance module and solutions for laser measure. Within two years, our laser distance modules have been already widely used in many fields.

Our R&D team with more than 20 years experience in laser measure area, we aim to make high-accuracy, easy-to-use laser distance meter that everyone can have access to whether you’re an expert or just a beginner. 

With two years of hard work, we’re now presenting you our P1s.

 

 FAQ 

1. Do you offer more colors for P1s? 

Right now we're trying to offer more colors. We currently have no timeline on when the negotiations end, but we're trying our best.

2. Do i have to pay VAT and duty?

 We'll try our best to avoid duty and VAT. However, we cannot reassure that you won't pay VAT and duty. 

3. Can i buy more P1s as an add-on? 

For any custom add-ons, please message us directly.

4. What is your return policy? 

P1s is 100% committed to providing our customers with the world's most badass P1s. However, if you are at all unsatisfied, we will accept all returns with a full refund.

5. The P1s looks very different from other LDM, why is that?

 We've poured our heart and soul in the design of the P1s, this is what makes P1s unique.

6．Can the laser red point damage people’s skin or eyes? 

 P1s is Class II diode lasers with a power output of less than 1 mill watt, the most of measuring instruments made by Leica, Bosch are class 2;

P1s come with lower power, make it safe, it’s harmless to the skin, but If the user's improper operation the lasers can injure the eyes, please do not stare directly to the beams, children should never play with lasers without adult supervision, please keep it away from kids or pet.

7. P1s’s crowdfunding improve VS P1

✅P1s is produced with new mold to make it look more elegant; 

✅ Added 6-axis gyroscopes to achieve horizontal alignment electronically and calculation of space;

✅ Adopting OLED display for a better reading experience; 

✅Adding one button to operate more useful functions; 

✅ Adding a tripod interface for more precision as static measuring;

✅ Adding inch unit for American’s buyer;

✅ Change delivery channels, so that the product be reached more quickly; 

✅ Improved laser system, laser spots are brighter.

Made from a sensor and magnetic base it can be conveniently attached or detached with ease. Use P1s as a remote control to take measurements in hard to reach spots and difficult conditions, and say goodbye to tangled tape measures. Simply double click to go into auto fetch mode, place it on the starting point, and walk to endpoint. In just 10 seconds your measurement data will be available. Do you work as an interior design consultant, architect, or garden planner? Measure your clients expectations in an elegant and timely manner.Quantity surveying, construction area, or engineer ...everywhere where numbers come first.Planning a major house redecoration? Don’t second guess your furniture choices, P1s fits into your pocket or purse letting you measure both at home and in store. Have that built-in wardrobe fitted to perfection.Measure up to life’s challenges. Presentation pointer, your child’s growth guard or something you and your cat can bond over. Make it yours.Stable Performance: More reliable thanks to its ergonomic design. Say goodbye to tangled tape measures, and rows of confusing buttons.Precision Lens: Proving that user-friendly doesn’t have to mean compromising on functionalities.Sensitive Electronic Level: Measuring with a laser requires either the use of a level or some sort of level surface to work off and it's surprising how far off your measurements can be if you don't use the level properly.  The electronic level on this tool is more accurate (0.1°), more intuitive, and more environmentally friendly than the bubble.Brilliant Display: Our OLED display offers easy and convenient readings even in dark or extremely bright environments, and the SmartScreen lets you easily see the readings from each and every angle.Portable: Don't you think? insert gif pictures. Accessorize with our range of add-ons. Smart Switch (Optional)Most of us would still rather use a traditional measure type over a laser device when measuring for small surfaces - our smart switch add-on gives you the extra edge for a more precise alignment. Wrist Strap (Optional)Tripod Interface (Optional) A 1/4" - 20 tripod interface, although not necessary for smooth use, will offer extra stability, for best results when measuring long distances, keep your dot steady with a tripod, which is particularly handy with indirect measurements.    About UsSince 2016, our team has been engaged in developing laser distance module and solutions for laser measure. Within two years, our laser distance modules have been already widely used in many fields.Our R&D team with more than 20 years experience in laser measure area, we aim to make high-accuracy, easy-to-use laser distance meter that everyone can have access to whether you’re an expert or just a beginner. With two years of hard work, we’re now presenting you our P1s.  FAQ 1. Do you offer more colors for P1s? Right now we're trying to offer more colors. We currently have no timeline on when the negotiations end, but we're trying our best.2. Do i have to pay VAT and duty? We'll try our best to avoid duty and VAT. However, we cannot reassure that you won't pay VAT and duty. 3. Can i buy more P1s as an add-on? For any custom add-ons, please message us directly.4. What is your return policy? P1s is 100% committed to providing our customers with the world's most badass P1s. However, if you are at all unsatisfied, we will accept all returns with a full refund.5. The P1s looks very different from other LDM, why is that? We've poured our heart and soul in the design of the P1s, this is what makes P1s unique.6．Can the laser red point damage people’s skin or eyes?  P1s is Class II diode lasers with a power output of less than 1 mill watt, the most of measuring instruments made by Leica, Bosch are class 2;P1s come with lower power, make it safe, it’s harmless to the skin, but If the user's improper operation the lasers can injure the eyes, please do not stare directly to the beams, children should never play with lasers without adult supervision, please keep it away from kids or pet.7. P1s’s crowdfunding improve VS P1✅P1s is produced with new mold to make it look more elegant; ✅ Added 6-axis gyroscopes to achieve horizontal alignment electronically and calculation of space;✅ Adopting OLED display for a better reading experience; ✅Adding one button to operate more useful functions; ✅ Adding a tripod interface for more precision as static measuring;✅ Adding inch unit for American’s buyer;✅ Change delivery channels, so that the product be reached more quickly; ✅ Improved laser system, laser spots are brighter.

story:
Garden Thorn, the revolutionary irrigation system. 


Can this piece of technology help solve the world’s water problems?

With ongoing concerns about water shortage, and water usage, how can a water guzzling garden change it’s course?  This is WHY the Garden Thorn was invented.

Evaporation is essentially nothing with Garden Thorn's direct watering system, which eliminates water wastage. By watering directly to the roots, you will completely avoid the problem.

Water Runoff is completely eliminated by using the in-ground method that Garden Thorn has engineered. The Garden Thorn directly deals with this problem by injecting the water instead of traditional drip watering, 

Water Placement is precise with the Garden Thorn.  Brown tubing and soaker hoses expel water everywhere. This causes two problems, water saturation and water placement between plants in areas where water is not needed, causing you to waste valuable resources.

Assembly is simple with the Garden Thorn.  Traditional systems come with ongoing steps to set up their irrigation system. Garden Thorn has 2 steps, which cuts time drastically and saves you frustration.

Time Spent watering is cut drastically using the Garden Thorn.  Drip irrigation was designed to slowly release water and allow it to sink into soil to the roots of your plants.This often can take 30-60 minutes. By injecting the water, we estimate 2-3 minutes of watering time... What will this save on your water bill?

     How to install... in no time at all.


     What parts we offer in our Perks:
3 inch Garden Thorns: For shallow root plants
6 inch Garden Thorns: For deep root plants
Hammer Cap: Used to hammer in the Thorns & make installation a breeze
25 & 50 foot single membrane long lasting hose
Remote system: An extension for your potted plants or hard to reach areas
Timer: Time your watering perfectly and relax


        What Hose do I need to Use?
You have 2 options on the hose to use. Keep in mind that once installed it is designed to remain in place and not be removed. You can either buy any thin walled 5/8th hose from any hardware store. These hoses are extremely common and very inexpensive. OR you can purchase a perk which includes our specially designed single membrane hose (USA purchasers only), it's extremely easy to use and long lasting.


                                    Manufacturing Capabilities

When the Garden Thorn is funded, we will use the funds to produce a unique automated tube sectionalizer machine that will allow consistency and efficiency to mass produce the thorns. We already have our first mold and can produce thorns for our first backers. Manufacturing will be done by Handy Camel, a Kansas City based company.

We are also developing a  5/8th hose specifically for Garden Thorn with a highly respectable US hose manufacturer. A single membrane non leak hose, it is custom made to optimize the Garden Thorn's performance and still look attractive... Even though you cannot see it under mulch. Garden Thorn is offering a warranty for 24 months, only if it is used with the recommended hose.

Early backers will have perks delivered at the beginning of August with the remaining to be delivered in October.


Garden Thorn – Quality of Construction

WHY is the thorn black? Because 100% recycled plastic is a massive component to the construction of Garden Thorn's main outer frame. We believe that in addition to water conservation, recycled plastic was the way to go with Garden Thorn.  If we can all work together to reduce water usage with Garden Thorn, we can certainly be environmentally friendly with the rest of the components.

Some production stages are hand made - for others, machinery is necessary to build the Garden Thorn with great quality, using the finest parts and components.


Take Advantage of Our Launch Specials

We are launching this product on Indiegogo to make sure that this is a product that you want to see in full production and in stores.

We are offering special packages of the Garden Thorn with price ranges from entry level $29-$149 for complete sets. This is a limited time opportunity to buy the Garden Thorn at this price before we roll it out to the market. 

Help us bring this product to full production and join Garden Thorn with the revolutionary irrigation system.

                About the Inventors

The Garden Thorn is the brain child of 6 inventors named "The Steel Table Group". Stan our inventor, got to talking to his father about his travels to Israel and noticed how well their agricultural industry was flourishing in the middle of the desert. A country that is a major exporter of exotic flowers and tropical fruits "can’t happen by accident" in the desert. As the group went back and forth, Dale mentioned that it would be necessary that the product attach to a hose with little or no tools involved, and Stan introduced the needle. The team then spent months upon months prototyping and testing numerous version until the Garden Thorn design and performance was perfected.

(Steel Table Group: Brian, Bob, Curt, Rich, Dale and Stan)

For every perk purchased we are donating a tree to the National Forest Foundation.

story:
We have realized from this campaign that this product is not a product you purchase because you see it in an advertisement.  You purchase it when you are going directly to the store to buy a lock because you need one.  We must get this product on the shelves next to the old defective version.  It serves a great purpose and solves a common problem.    That is our mission and we will stop at nothing to make this happen.  We appreciate the support of our family and friends who came aboard without hesitation.  We will be refunding your money.  We would remove this campaign but Indiegogo has a rule that a campaign must run its course. Once again thank you and we will be coming to a hardware store near you soon. 

Ajustco Team

 

Ajust Lock

Ajustco is a creative, product development company founded by Jason Stile (VP of Liu Electric), and Arman Rousta (CEO of Blueliner).  Arman has a degree from Columbia University and has successfully created and sold a popular invention in the past.  Blueliner is a cutting edge digital marketing firm also having a stake in Ajustco.  Other products are in the oven but we are currently putting all of our energy into Ajust Lock. 

Our flagship product "Ajust Lock" is a practical solution to the common problem of lock misalignment.  This is caused by humidity, cold, or the settling of the structure.  Sometimes it is also the installation placing the lock offset right off the bat.  

The Ajust Lock is Flexible and has a tolerance which the current version of this lock does not.  If you install a barrel bolt just a few millimeters off, it often will not lock.  I am sure you have seen this time and again in a restaurant bathroom, shed, gate, bedroom door, stall door, and many other locations.  You often see holes everywhere where they have relocated the lock numerous times or you are holding the door with your foot to have some privacy.  I know, it's not fun. 

We are ready to manufacture in China and this $15,000 will help us to get through the initial process and first batch.

We just had some samples made but we won't give the green light until we have a quality product.

We are passionate about this product.  Jason who literally saw this solution in a dream had replaced one of these locks over and over having to patch and paint the old holes.  His frustration must have forced the dream and we have been making it a reality ever since.  

Check out the website at www.ajustco.com

We appreciate your support and look forward to mailing your Ajust Lock(s) once we have the first batch in our hands!

story:
Short Summary

In our daily activities at home from work, we usually lie down in my bed while browsing through the internet or doing work related activities. So does most of us as it is comfortable and relaxing. Imagine watching movies while laying sideways with your elbow as a support or even while your half a sleep. Yes, that surely is painful. So I sum up ideas and the thought of a back-up or support. If you don't have much option of space, this will provide you the best solution as well.

                                   

A short background, I am currently working overseas and brings me the need to fullfill this solution and build this new product, So this is what i have come up getting  mostly recycled materials to prove the design concept. I have done the workable 1st prototype taken from the idea successfully. 

The campaign is also for a good cause to give back where portion if the funds generated from selected perks and rewards will be used for a cause.

At this stage, I am currently using the prototype and okay with it's functionality and its application. Although there needs to fine tune on using the correct prototype processes and materials to further get into the product assembly I was hoping for. Through your contributions and support, I can take and obtain the correct processes and materials such as the aluminum support frames, replacing handmade wood bushing to machined nylon bushings, changing bike clamps to aluminum customized clamp design and bottom bed support design with rollers to obtain the design intent I have. 

FUNCTIONAL PROTOTYPE

Posture Problem                                     Sitting function (Improved Ergonomic feature) 

                    

 

Bedside function (Improved Back-support and comfort)

Frame adaptable on top of bed.
Frame design under the bed  function is also a feature.


What We will Need.

What we would be needing to progress the development further of clamp, the base wheels and aluminum prototypes. We would be needing your support. Outsourced Prototype cost gets you to have design limitations so below are the details. 

Prototype Clamps

                                      

Slider & Bushings        

                                    


Thru the funding target of $3,700. It will mainly be used to get the ideal intent of the design and be fully realized where basic functions such as customized sized clamps exact fit to pipe shafts would be the objectives and the bed of the base attachments.

ERGONOMIC FEATURES AND POSTURE ENHANCEMENT:

-  HIGHER LOAD DESK CAPACITY (SUITABLE FOR 8 KG LAPTOP + SPEAKERS AND ACCESSORIES).

-  RIGID FRAME AND DESK SUPPORT.

-  ERGONOMIC FOR ARMREST AS ITS MORE SUITS TO THE PERSONS POSITION.

-  SWING AWAY DESK.

-  SLIDE AWAY BASE (WITH FIXED LOCK FEATURE).

-  FOLD AWAY IN BOTTOM COMPARTMENT OF BED (SPACE SAVER).

-  CAN BE A STAND ALONE DESK USING YOUR OFFICE CHAIR.

-  CAN BE A BED TABLE AT YOUR MOST COMFORTABLE POSITION.

WHERE THE FUNDS WILL GO?

OBJECTIVES:

-  TO REDESIGN THE ROLLER MECHANISM FOR MUCH BETTER ADAPTABILITY.

-  TO REDUCE OVERALL WEIGHT, USE OF ALUMINUM AND DESIGN OPTIMIZATION.

-  TO DESIGN CUSTOMIZED HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE CLAMP.

-  TO APPLY FOR DESIGN PATENT IF FUNDS REACH THE DESIGN MARK.

-  FURTHER TESTING OF THE MECHANISM AND ITS FUNCTIONS FOR PRODUCTION.

DESIGN FOR A CAUSE:

A PERCENTAGE OF THE FUNDINGS WILL BE USED FOR EDUCATION MATERIAL SUPPORT ON LESS FORTUNATE CHILDREN TO AID IN EDUCATION MATERIALS AND NEEDS, TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENT IS PROMOTED AS PLAN OF THE CAUSE AND SKILL ENHANCEMENT. WHERE EVERY CONTRIBUTOR AND BACKER HAVE AN OPPORTUNITY TO BE A PARTICIPANT AND CAN SUPPORT THROUGH THIS CAMPAIGN. THE OUTCOME OF THE ACTIVITY WILL BE SHARED TO YOU THROUGH PICTURES AND VIDEOS. 

CERTAIN PROVINCES HAVE ACTIVE KIDS WHEREBY THE SCHOOL FEES IS WHAT KEEPS THEM ON GOING ON SCHOOL WHICH AMOUNT IS MINIMAL BUT IT CAN BE A GREAT IMPACT ON THEM AS EDUCATION CAN CHANGE THEIR PERSPECTIVE AS STUDENTS. AS PLANS OF THE CAUSE ARE ALSO FEEDING PROGRAM.

The time frame of activity will be advised after the campaign period.


What you will get.

Surpassing the target goal can provide us further development on bed restrictions and further optimization of the product. Additional accessories such as easy lock on the main bed can be realized as sampling of the rotary axial locking mechanism are sourced out.

Further Surpassing the stretch goal would be added on to preparation for production, manufacturing tools, first cost and further development and finalization.

REWARDS:

Through your help and success of this campaign, we are able to improvised one step further to how desks are being able to aid you in improving human body actions.

Final development can be completed and opened after finalization of the design. Furthermore, customized color shirts can be selected starting on  different level of supporters.

Below T-shirt with logo and campaign message to show your support through the realization of the design with a good cause to start off.

         

                                         

Quality Printed Tees with colors to choose below.

Note: (T-shirt Print design may be revised with-in the time period of the project.


Navy Blue, Maroon, Grey, Black and light blue.

Note: Shipping terms are shown on every perks.


TIMELINE:

October - December 2014: Project Campaign Period Ends.

January 2015:  Production of T-SHIRT REWARDS and Sending out.

January 2015: Continue Prototyping and Finalization of design and assembly.

January - July 2015: Design for a cause activity.                         

March 2015: Final Design and assembly.

April 2015: Receive Components for assembly and Packaging.

May 2015: Sending out of goods. (Shipping is 5-10 weeks depending on                                               location). 

July 2015: Sending out of goods (Customized). (Shipping is 5-10 weeks depending                           on location.

The Impact

The campaign is intended to enhance and improve ergonomic features throughout whether at home and adding safety by proper usage of electronic devices on a sturdy desk on a bed. Let this project be a starter on continued development and innovation of ergonomic bed-table design.

As  a validation of the idea, the concept design is a bronze award winner for Idea category on A' design award. You can view from websites of the links thru this page.

         

Published at:

http://www.adesignaward.com/design.php?ID=27944


    Risks & Challenges

    Certain risk may involve is the re-production of the idea, whereby it would involve other 3rd party to source out the design. So this would be a challenge to further complete the design as intended. Mechanical design functions are fully shown as an intent to appreciate the overall mechanical design. This would also be a statement for of intellectual property ownership as the 1st publisher. Product trademark can be negotiated and discussed if others are interested.


      Other Ways You Can Help

      Help us spread the word for the people who might be interested on the design and those who you think would like to support us. Thank you.

Furthermore, customized color shirts can be selected starting on  different level of supporters.Below T-shirt with logo and campaign message to show your support through the realization of the design with a good cause to start off.                                                   Quality Printed Tees with colors to choose below.Note: (T-shirt Print design may be revised with-in the time period of the project.Navy Blue, Maroon, Grey, Black and light blue.Note: Shipping terms are shown on every perks.TIMELINE:October - December 2014: Project Campaign Period Ends.January 2015:  Production of T-SHIRT REWARDS and Sending out.January 2015: Continue Prototyping and Finalization of design and assembly.January - July 2015: Design for a cause activity.                         March 2015: Final Design and assembly.April 2015: Receive Components for assembly and Packaging.May 2015: Sending out of goods. (Shipping is 5-10 weeks depending on                                               location). July 2015: Sending out of goods (Customized). (Shipping is 5-10 weeks depending                           on location.The Impact
The campaign is intended to enhance and improve ergonomic features throughout whether at home and adding safety by proper usage of electronic devices on a sturdy desk on a bed. Let this project be a starter on continued development and innovation of ergonomic bed-table design.
As  a validation of the idea, the concept design is a bronze award winner for Idea category on A' design award. You can view from websites of the links thru this page.


         

Published at:
http://www.adesignaward.com/design.php?ID=27944

  Risks & Challenges Certain risk may involve is the re-production of the idea, whereby it would involve other 3rd party to source out the design. So this would be a challenge to further complete the design as intended. Mechanical design functions are fully shown as an intent to appreciate the overall mechanical design. This would also be a statement for of intellectual property ownership as the 1st publisher. Product trademark can be negotiated and discussed if others are interested.  Other Ways You Can Help Help us spread the word for the people who might be interested on the design and those who you think would like to support us. Thank you.

story:
We are finally FULFILLING!
FOR 2-3 DAYS DELIVERY

Click BELOW

https://joyresolve.com/

 

 

The Barisieur is an automatic coffee or tea brewer that eases you into the day with the sound of bubbling water and the smell of freshly brewed coffee or loose leaf tea.

It encourages a ritual in order to establish a routine before going to sleep, signaling to the body and mind that it is time to unwind and relax.

                                           Living life slow even when times are fast.

The fresh coffee or tea is used as a natural aromatic relaxant throughout the night then stimulates the user in the morning once brewed.

  • The boiling vessel on the left is sealed with a bung, which is essential for transporting the water. 
  •  The Water boils due to the induction hob, heating up the stainless steel base. Steam pressure is produced, forcing the water out of the vessel and into the stainless steel filter, brewing the user a perfect beverage. 
  • There is a milk vessel which lifts out from the tray, Is cooled overnight/ throughout the day with the bespoke peltier cooler. 
  • Sealed drawer for Tea & Coffee and other necessities. 
 

 

 

CONVENIENCE | Wake up to Coffee or Tea on your bed side.

SENSORY | It stimulates all 5 senses

  • Hear  - The sounds of the coffee bubbling away
  • Sight - See the water get transported into the filter.
  • Smell - The coffee brewing
  • Taste - The Coffee and wake up.
  • Touch - The tangible buttons and form of the product.

EASY TO USE | Intuitive without any complicated settings. Easy to set up and you can quickly learn how to use it.

VERSATILITY | Works just as well with Tea as it does Coffee. Display it on your bedside, kitchen or even at your desk at work.

EFFICIENCY | Using induction heating means an efficient boiling time.

 PRACTICALITY | The Barisieur is easy to clean since. Glassware and stainless steel parts are all dishwashers safe.

SAFETY | The barisieur design is safe since the heating surface stays cool due to induction. CE certified.

DESIGN | The Barisieur is functional yet aesthetically pleasing. It is an example of contemporary timeless design, which will hopefully accompany you for many years to come.

 

"Forget about it just being a bed-side product... 

I think it's the best one-cup brewer on the market!"

 

\

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

CERTIFICATION: Fortunately for the consumer, appliances that are integrating into the home come with strict safety regulations. We don't try to pretend to be experts in this area. That's why we are partnering with an expert who can handle all the necessary steps required to get The Barisieur approved and certified for you and the consumer market.

DESIGN FOR MANUFACTURING: During pre-production, our prototypes are rigorously tested by our engineering and manufacturing experts in order to create an optimal final product. However, we are aware that The Barisieur may face additional changes to meet manufacturing and certification requirements. In addition to keeping our backers up to date, we will make sure any changes during manufacturing uphold our original design intentions and meet your interests.

PRODUCTION: Manufacturing a product is complex and involves many people, parts and tools all dependent on each other to keep things running smoothly. If one thing doesn't go as planned, it can lead to any number of disruptions along the production line and result in delays. If anything does come up along the way, we promise to handle professionally and will keep our supporters informed of any changes.

WE BELIEVE WE CAN MAKE THIS HAPPEN! We have built up a strong network of experts in hardware engineering, tooling, manufacturing, distribution and certification. We are ready for any challenges that may pop up along the way. However, we realise creating a product with complicated hardware is a complicated process. We promise our complete devotion to bringing The Barisieur into production and into our backers homes!

PURCHASING & IMPORTING THE BARISIEUR- You will have to pay import and sales TAX related to your specific location.  

We promise complete transparency and we will communicate on a regular basis with our backers.

story:
ONELID

ONELID was originally spawned by the ambition to make a lid that would minimize the risk of over boiling - but along the way we learned there were so many more annoying things related to the regular lids we use, like finding a lid that fits, burning hands and difficulties draining. 
 

Meet ONELID 

The only lid that is :

Universal - will fit most of your pots (up to 22 cm/8.75" diameter).

Reduces over boiling -  intelligent groove system will let out just the right amount of excess steam.

Has an integrated strainer – draining a pot has never been easier or safer, just grab your pot or pan and pour.

Does not transfer heat - even when boiling for extended amount of time the ONELID handle stays cool to the touch.  

Makes no sound - soft on the outside - yet sturdy on the inside makes for safe handling and silent operation.

Danish Design at its best - we are pretty proud to have fit all these features into a design this modern, sophisticated and elegant.

Is dishwasher safe - naturally...

 

 

 

So, if you are like us, and would like to get your hands on one of the first ONELIDS, please sign up - and we will do our utmost to make your cooking experience easier, safer and more enjoyable for years to come. For a little more in-depth knowledge - please read on...  

 

ONELID - HOW DOES IT WORK?

SIZE - having trouble finding a lid to fit?

Not to mention the cacophony of noisy metal striking metal when desperately trying to find the right lid inside your kitchen cabinet? ONELID offers 4 ingenious features combined with great modern design in one elegant lid that will fit all your existing pots (up to 22 cm/8.75"). 

 

 

Ever experienced boiling over?

Depending on what you’re cooking, every pot will tend to over boil if you turn the heat up too high. The bigger the pot - the more steam is let out. ONELID greatly reduces this tendency by letting out just the right amount of excess steam. The intelligently designed grooves on the underside of ONELID are shaped to match the size of your pot and release just the right amount of steam to prevent over-boiling. Simple :) 

 

 

And you know the moisture that drips from your current lids onto the stovetop? ONELIDs patented convex underside ensures the drops that form will run back into your pot, so your stovetop stays cleaner.

 

 

Draining  - no more burned fingers or spilled pasta in your sink

Tired of burning your fingers on metal/glass lids during cooking or while pouring? Ever tried sliding your conventional lid a little to the side allowing that boiling water to drain, but ended up soaking your pot holders and getting peas and pasta into the sink? Yeah - who hasn’t! 

Well no more. Because of the unique air-vents doubling as strainer (draining) holes, you now have trouble-free draining. ONELIDs silicone surface ensures great friction against the pot so your ONELID will stay centered and safe – even when held vertically. Your peas and pasta will remain in the pot where they belong.

 

 

Perfect for casseroles too. The ONELID handle have taken many forms to reach this final design. ONELID now boasts superior ergonomics - both for 1 and 2-handle pots. And with a diameter of 23 cm/9" ONELID will cover all you pots up to 3,5 liters. (covering 90-95 % of all private cooking). 

Just check your old pot diameters before signing up. 

 

 


If you are the "I want to look inside type" we are making a glass insert version
 

ONELID with 3 mm Tempered glass

Heat distribution - cool to the touch

 

This FLIR-photo comparison shows how much better the heat distribution of ONELID works compared to a steel lid (and btw. glass lids are the same). Other than the hotter steam areas (away from the handles) the ONELID handle has the same temperature as the room and is barely affected by the boiling process within. No matter where you grip ONELID, your fingers are safe from burning. The better insulation will also save you power !

 

 

Early tests on temperature...

 

CHECK OUT THE VIDEO BELOW HIGHLIGTING THE MAIN FEATURES 

THE BACKGROUND

The initial idea behind ONELID was spawned by professional chef, and ONELID co-creator, Sylvester Vantore. He observed how chefs would use tin foil as a substitute for the right size pot lid. This simple technique furthermore had the adjustability to let out just the right amount of excess steam in order to reduce over-boiling. Although functional, it’s not very practical nor pretty. Understanding that there must be a better way, Sylvester eventually came up with the idea of an oversized lid (to fit varying pot sizes) designed with under-lid grooves to allow excess steam to escape. 

Sylvester brought this discovery to the attention of prominent Danish designer, Martin Sonne. Martin eagerly took up the challenge to make the 'perfect lid'. From that point on, the lid began to evolve, but it would be years before the form and function were perfected.

CHALLENGES PRESENT OPPORTUNITIES

We knew we had to let out just enough steam to minimize the risk of over boiling without wasting energy so we added some more grooves and came up with the 'swing' to the channels so the vent holes 'adjusts' to the diameter of the pot. Small pot, small holes - larger pot, larger holes. It was only during early tests that we discovered that the vent holes provided the perfect effect for straining. And again - the bigger the pot the faster the water is let out so it was a win-win.  

We also came up with the now patented convex underside in order for the lid to fit multiple pot sizes. This had added benefits too: The lid will 'automatically' center on any pot and stay securely in place - and it takes very little effort to hold while pouring because it more or less 'hangs' from the friction created by the silicone. The condensed steam forming on the underside of the lid will flow back into the pot and not onto your stove top.

Even though it didn't exactly made things easier, requiring the silicone surface was a big priority. The benefits are many: 260 °C (500 °F) heat resistance, non-stick easy clean-up, non-toxic, and very resistant to microbiological growth. Add to that, ONELID makes a fashion statement in any kitchen. It not only looks and feels great, ONELID provides exceptional ergonomics, because the friction created when the lid is on the pot is far superior to metal. You’ll immediately feel the difference when you handle the pot - the lid just stays more securely in place. 

 

THE PROCESS

Along the way we have tested several designs. Below is an array of the various designs and prototypes ranging from the first 360 degree design through to a more solid design - unfortunately proving impossible to make but leading the way to the beautiful final design we have today.

 

 


THE IP
ONELID holds a patent based on the concave shape and the ingenious groove system on the lower side.
More to this we have applied for a design protection since we find it worth the money to try and protect the signature design by Martin. There will be copies sooner or later - but we aver none with the qualitiy of our design, material composition and finish.

 

 

 

ABOUT US

 

 

Martin Sonne - with more than 20 years of designing products and working with visual communication, Martin is still striving for the simplest solutions to the most complex problems. Designing ONELID has been a journey in just that - trying to fit all these unique features into a lid so simple and so clean that one would think it is just another lid. Staying within that comfort zone of what people expect a lid to look like and then add a little evolution on top seemed to be the right approach.

Sylvester Vantore - the man with the 1000 ideas. Sylvester is on a quest to make good things better; To find that little thing that will make a normal item become a unique item. Being a chef and having learned from the best (Rasmus Kofoed - world champion chef 2011) Sylvester knows what makes for good kitchen tools. So it comes as no surprise that he was the man to invent ONELID.

We couldn't have done this alone though. With great production expertise and patience from Lars Forsberg (from Danish company Fabrikators) we are now ready to move into production. 

 

 

Want to know more about Fabrikators go to www.fabrikators.com

And Kenny Kong the man will make sure tooling and production is second to none once we get there. 

So 5 years down the road and we are ready to let you guys take us the rest of the way. We can't tell you how much we want this to happen. We want to let the world try how cooking can be if you have the right tools. This lid is made like it should have been in the first place - ONELID - is all you need. So please help us get this baby to take its first steps...

 

 

PACKAGING

Maybe you want a lid for yourself - maybe you find it could be a great gift for your avid kitchen cooking sister, mom or good friend.
Therefore we will ensure your lid arrives in a nice box.

 

 

DANISH "HEERING & HYGGE EVENT" 
HYGGE : [COSY - HAVE A NICE TIME]

 

 

We move into new waters of production. 
It is a bit of a complicated proces but we have the right team.

The finishing touches: 
- Will the UV weld of the handle be perfect? 
- Getting the right Silicone surface look 
- Getting thickness of the Silicone just right 
- Getting the colors as deep and pretty as we want

Only getting it done will show us! 
No matter what obstacles lie ahead we promise you we will be 100% transparent in our communication to you. We want the best - and we know you do too. 

Thank you all for your support - if means the world to us.

story:
Le’ Cook is a one piece Silicone Spoonula with a “HOOK”

A "Spoonula" is 50% spoon and 50% spatula - and 100% useful around your kitchen for mixing, serving, scraping, flipping and cooking.

Pledge options

What makes Le’ Cook different from all other Spoonulas out there is our 'L' shape hook that we designed to allow you to rest and hang your Spoonula on the edge of your frying pan with ease while you cook. You will never have to spare a second thought of where to rest your saucy spatula when you need to free up your hands or walk away for a second to season your cooking.

Features


  • 'L' HOOK DESIGN - Our one of a kind hook design at the bottom of our product will give you a brand new and simplified cooking experience. The 'L' Hook design can attach our Spoonula on the edge of your pan with ease (patent pending).
  • ERGONOMIC EASY-TO-CLEAN SEAMLESS ONE-PIECE SMOOTH DESIGN - Le'Cook's Non-porous material means no seams or cracks to trap food and bacteria - these utensils clean up easy and stay that way.  It is stain-resistant, and also dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.
  • BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED FLEXIBLE EDGE - Will not scratch or damage surfaces of nonstick or enamel cookware.
  • SOFT GRIP NON-SLIP SATIN TEXTURE FINISH - The velvety finish design on these utensils also provide superior grip and easy no-slip handling.
  • INTERNAL NYLON HANDLE SUPPORT TECHNOLOGY - The lightweight nylon core makes this Spoonula easy to handle for all simple home cooked meals. 
  • HIGH HEAT 450°F PRO-GRADE SILICONE – High quality silicone material can take heat up to 450°F (your hands might not, so please use caution or oven mitts in such a scenario). Safe for Coated & Non-stick Cookware, perfect for use with hot foods, and safe while in contact with hot frying pans that are still on the burner. 
  • FDA APPROVED AND BPA FREE - High quality silicone material. Hygienic and hypoallergenic with no open pores. Nonstick silicone body is easily cleaned, without staining or accumulating odors.

Size: L 11.75" x W 2.2" x H 1"
Weight: 2.9 oz/ 80g

Quality and Function

The Material 

We've given much thought and put in great care into the design of Le'Cook from the inside and out.  After rigorous research we found that the best internal structure/core for our Spoonula is Nylon material. Originally we had our heart set on stainless steel for its strength and durability; however, it was too heavy, absorbed too much heat, and was too bendable - not very practical attributes to serve our purposes. We decided that the nylon core is most suitable for our needs of creating a lightweight and easy to handle kitchen utensil. It also didn't absorb as much heat as other materials, which is ideal for our product. 

As for the exterior, through further trials and error we ultimately decided that Silicone would be the best option for Le' Cook. The material is so flexible and easy to clean. You can gently yet effectively scrap anything from your frying pan without leaving any scratches on the surface.

Why you need our spoonula

  • Wooden cooking tools can burn easily when rested too long on the side of a heated cooking pan. It tends to scratch the surface of cooking pan when you try to scrape the leftovers from the bottom.
  • Steel cooking tools can easily become scorching hot when left in contact with the surface of a heated pan for too long. Similarly, this material will easily leave scratch marks the surface of most cooking pans. 
  • Nylon cooking tools tend to melt when they reach certain temperatures if rested on the edge of your heated pan. Nylon material is also quite fragile and easy to chip.

Functionality & Versatility of the "L" Hook 

The 'L' Hook was designed with an idea of facing gravity - the weight of the handle will help this Spoonula balance to the side of your cooking pan with ease as the hook secures to edge.  We tested Le' Cook with a variety of cooking pans and pots, and it works beautifully. Le' Cook Hook work best with a 90° edge angle cooking pan.

Timeline



The Story and Idea
  

I love cooking and experimenting with recipes almost every day. As I was preparing dinner one evening, the usual problem arose when it came time for me to season and spice up my dishes - I didn't know where to rest my saucy spatula.

That is when I start looking online for spoon rests and spatula holders. I ended up loving the idea of pan spatula holders - the moment I saw that product and how easily it clips to the side of your pans, I bought it without a second thought. However, this product still takes up room and needs to be cleaned separately after each use… “I wish there was a utensil that combines the pan spatula holder and the spatula itself - that would be amazing” ...the thought hit me!

That was me about a year ago. From that day I made a lot of sketches and drawings trying to combine both cooking spatula and pan spatula holder into one solid high quality product, and that is when the idea of Le’ Cook Spoonula was born!

We have designed and printed a 3D prototype. Shortly after we produced a sample and tested the mock up in our kitchen to make sure the functionality of the hook and the material meets our standards.

How you can help us reach our goal?  By selecting any of our perks that we offer, you help us to get closer to the MOQ that we need to produce this Spoonula to the world. 
We guaranteed a lifetime discount for our future Le' Cook Products if you back our campaign here on Indiegogo!

More shapes and designs are coming in our next campaign, please let us know what kind of cooking utensils you'd like to see the 'L' hook on the most! :)

Risk and challenges 

We take every project very seriously and try our best to show to people who believe in us that we are not only going to deliver high quality products but also truly appreciate everyone's support.  It is with your guys' trust and belief in our work that allows us to transform our ideas into a reality. 

Trust and respect is our motto for running this small business.  We just hope that we can make every backer happy and satisfied, not only with the product but also with our service.

Your pledge = Your trust

Please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns about our project anytime.

Email us here: LeCookproducts@gmail.com
story_txt:
Le’ Cook is a one piece Silicone Spoonula with a “HOOK”

A "Spoonula" is 50% spoon and 50% spatula - and 100% useful around your kitchen for mixing, serving, scraping, flipping and cooking.
Pledge options



What makes Le’ Cook different from all other Spoonulas out there is our 'L' shape hook that we designed to allow you to rest and hang your Spoonula on the edge of your frying pan with ease while you cook. You will never have to spare a second thought of where to rest your saucy spatula when you need to free up your hands or walk away for a second to season your cooking.





Features








'L' HOOK DESIGN - Our one of a kind hook design at the bottom of our product will give you a brand new and simplified cooking experience. The 'L' Hook design can attach our Spoonula on the edge of your pan with ease (patent pending).


ERGONOMIC EASY-TO-CLEAN SEAMLESS ONE-PIECE SMOOTH DESIGN - Le'Cook's Non-porous material means no seams or cracks to trap food and bacteria - these utensils clean up easy and stay that way.  It is stain-resistant, and also dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.


BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED FLEXIBLE EDGE - Will not scratch or damage surfaces of nonstick or enamel cookware.


SOFT GRIP NON-SLIP SATIN TEXTURE FINISH - The velvety finish design on these utensils also provide superior grip and easy no-slip handling.


INTERNAL NYLON HANDLE SUPPORT TECHNOLOGY - The lightweight nylon core makes this Spoonula easy to handle for all simple home cooked meals. 


HIGH HEAT 450°F PRO-GRADE SILICONE – High quality silicone material can take heat up to 450°F (your hands might not, so please use caution or oven mitts in such a scenario). Safe for Coated & Non-stick Cookware, perfect for use with hot foods, and safe while in contact with hot frying pans that are still on the burner.

Risk and challenges 
We take every project very seriously and try our best to show to people who believe in us that we are not only going to deliver high quality products but also truly appreciate everyone's support.  It is with your guys' trust and belief in our work that allows us to transform our ideas into a reality.

Your pledge = Your trust
