Email us here: LeCookproducts@gmail.com

story:
The Modern Zinc founders wondered why there had been no innovation in bedding. After all, we do spend a third of our lives in bed. Maybe we could provide people with bed sheets that give the user unique benefits.

We at Modern Zinc discovered an awesome technology that infused Zinc into fabrics. Zinc is an essential element of the human body and is especially beneficial to the skin, as well as effectively fighting against bacteria and fungi.

We immediately thought this would be perfect for bed sheets and, to our amazement, this had not been done yet. We went straight to the drawing board to develop a product we could sell. Right off the bat, we knew we would need to use only the best cotton to match this great technology. We work closely with our manufacturers to make sure we uphold the highest standards of quality. The best part is we will sell these sheets exclusively online, directly to you, so we can avoid that dreaded retail markup.

With all this in place, we are able to offer luxury linens infused with Zinc at just a fraction of the price you’d pay at a retailer.

Smartcell Sensitive® is a brand new fabric innovation with 2 years of development. We source these high-tech Zinc infused fibers from Smartfiber®, a German-based research firm. To manufacture Zinc fibers, Smartfiber® uses a patented Lyocell process to spin Zinc into textile fibers. Using this process means the Zinc will remain active at all times, even after many washes.

Zinc fibers are known for their antibacterial and skincare properties. By blending these Zinc fibers with ultra soft, long staple cotton we get bedding that provides ultimate comfort and unique user benefits.

Modern Zinc bed sheets use a sateen weave resulting in a smoother, silkier texture than a standard percale weave. We use single-ply threads to provide a “true” uninflated thread count. Many manufacturers claim to make "500—600" thread count sheets, but in reality, the product is simply 3-ply yarns of low-grade cotton at a 200 thread count. Through months of tests, we determined a 400 thread count of single-ply yarn offers the best balance between durability and breathability.

 

Like almost no other nutrient, Zinc has a big impact on our wellbeing. After Iron, Zinc is the most frequent trace element within the human body. Known to be healthy for skin cell production while strengthening people's immune system, Zinc is commonly found in pharmaceutical and cosmetic products, as well as in multivitamin preparations. Unfortunately, in the past century, many soils around the world have become Zinc deficient, meaning many of us don't get enough Zinc in our diets.

Zinc as a natural antibacterial agent prevents bacterial growth on fabric. While silver is a hard metal, Zinc is a natural element that our body needs and uses on a daily basis. Create a healthy, clean sleeping environment with Zinc.

The Zinc that has been integrated into the fibers acts directly on the skin. Rigorous testing at Hohenstein Institute in Germany confirmed the transfer of Zinc from the fabric to the skin. Testing in accordance with AATCC 100 showed strong antibacterial activity.

The fiber is environmentally friendly, eco-friendly and biodegradable. It is certified (for baby products) Oeko-Tex ® Standard 100, class 1.

  • Hohenstein Tested 
  • Oeko-Tex Certified 
  • BMP GmbH Tested 
  • Intertek Antimicrobial Tested 
  • Tested by Universitatsklinkium Schleswig-Holstein  

By selling online, we cut out the middleman and therefore reduce the cost to you. We will be able to cut costs and sell luxuriously crafted bed sheets normally costing $400 to $500 for less than half that price.

 

 

We've been working with our manufacturer for over a year now, completed a crowdfunding campaign and have now placed our first order. We've made and tested multiple prototypes and feel confident you will love Modern Zinc bed sheets. The sheets you see in the pictures are production-ready and are in the process of being made. We will offer these sheets on InDemand so Modern Zinc can continue to keep production costs low and pass those savings onto you as well as anyone else who would like to purchase this one-of-a-kind sheet set.

August 2016 Campaign closes. Backers’ selections finalized 

September 2016 
Raw materials are sourced and shipped to our factory 

October - November 2016 
Production period 

December 2016 
Finished products are shipped to our distribution and then straight to your doorstep with no retail markups.

Now Shipping!

Shipping is free on all orders in the United States and for international orders, a shipping charge will be added. If you would like your rewards shipped outside of the United States, please select the appropriate surcharge.

  • United States: Free!
  • Canada: $25
  • Mexico: $25
  • European Union: $50
  • Rest of the World: $50

 

 

 

Please connect with us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter & Pinterest to stay up to date!

story:
So smart. So connected. Sobro.

Simplify & Improve your life & sleep! Its a proven fact - Better Sleep will improve all aspects of your life. Or you can improve & ease life in any entertaining area. Perfect for small spaces (apartments, dorms, etc). You will be the envy of your friends!!

Wireless charging, a cooler drawer, bluetooth speakers, App Conrol with AI, LED accent lights and wired charging with cord management. Works/Pairs with Alexa and Google Home!

So smart. 

Whether you’re using it as an amazing end table, or your next gen nightstand, the Sobro Smart Side Table will seamlessly integrate and improve your life.

Four Color Options Now Available!! 

Thank you Indiegogo backers for helping us achieve the $1,550,000 goal. Now there are 4 color options that will be available (shown above). After the campaign is over you will be able to choose your color/finish option via a survey we send you from a website called Backerkit. 

   

We give you the Confidence to Back Us!!!

We're StoreBound, the team that successfully created and delivered that amazing coffee table with a refrigerator drawer, bluetooth speakers, charging, yadda, yadda, yadda. And now we're back with our next big idea.

Your life, reimagined. 

We believe the furniture in your home should help you live better. Your side table or night stand can be so much more than a lamp holder. By incorporating smart technology & smart thinking into our products, we’ve created furniture that can multitask and simplify your life.

Great for small spaces....

You could get all of this stuff on the left...OR you could just back us and enjoy the warm fuzzy feeling you get when you know you're making smart choices. 

The Sobro Smart Side table replaces a lot of stuff so it saves you space too. "What are some of the things it replaces?" you ask... 

A mini fridge, smart light, lockbox, magazine rack, nightlight, alarm clock, a light timer, a noise machine, bluetooth speakers, USB Hub, wireless charging pad, a table and more.  Add all that up and you're looking at a lot of moolah. 

So chill. 

The quiet thermoelectric cooler drawer keeps your drinks chilled & always at hand. The silent operation of the cooler drawer makes it perfect for the bedroom. Now you’ll never have to get out of your cozy bed in the middle of the night for refreshingly chill drink!

Wireless charging & power.

You asked for it and we did it! Wireless charging for 2 phones is built-in to the top of the Sobro Side Table. We’ve also added 2 USB ports and 2 USB-C Ports along with 2 (120v) outlets on the back so that you’ll always stay powered up. 

Bluetooth Speakers

Experience the rich sound of your favorite tunes with the built in bluetooth stereo speakers. Pair two Sobro Smart Side Tables together for even better audio output and TV audio can also be paired via Bluetooth. 

Contain the clutter

Who doesn't want to be more organized?? With our cable management system, there are 3 magnetic cord wraps on the back of the unit so that your cable clutter stays under wraps. There’s also a channel for arranging cords built into the top of the table and the back of the storage shelf so you can run your charging cords neatly behind the unit.

Sleep better, wake up easier.

Intelligent sleep mode helps you create great sleep habits and keep them. The LED lights on the back of the table can simulate sunrise to help you wake up easily while the built-in white noise generator can drown out noise pollution.* A variety of pleasant sounds will be available through the Sobro App’s Smart Sleep Mode.

* No guarantee to fully cancel your partner’s snoring

A smarter nightlight. 

The LED light bar on the front of the table  is motion activated to guide you safely in the dark. The range for the sensor operates in a 35-45º angle and 3 meter circumference and features 2 colors, warm white and bright white. The duration that the light stays on, the color and  brightness can all be controlled in the Sobro App.

Light it up.

Create the perfect mood! The color LED accent lighting on the back of the table allows you to customize your mood with a full color spectrum at your fingertip. You can also put it in party mode using the Sobro App to sync the lights to change color in sequence with your music. 

Future Proof 

We're building in wifi connectivity so that your Sobro Smart Side Table can be updated as tech progresses, can be controlled remotely and can even incorporate IFTTT actions. 

All the bells & whistles...

Based on the feed back from the awesome backers on the 1st Sobro smart furniture piece "The Smart Coffee Table" we have really packed this table with the features to make it the ultimate side table for your bedroom, entertaining area or office.

Don't have Sobro FOMO. 

Seriously, remember when bitcoin was $100 - don't miss out on this deal. FOMO, it's the worst. 

They love us, they really love us. 

Designed for all

So many backers said that they wished that there was a smaller version of the Sobro Coffee Table, that we wanted to make sure that the Sobro Smart Side Table was a fit for everyone. It's compact enough to fit inside a 350 sq. ft. studio apartment in the East Village, yet roomy enough to hold a lot of stuff. 

Should you want the table to be taller, we will also make a "Lift Kit" available in 2 different heights. 

The Sobro Lift Kit legs are in development but will make the table 24" or 29", tall respectively. 

 

Our Process 

We've been working hard to bring this product to life and this campaign to Indiegogo, here's a look behind the scenes into our design process...

 

Our Team 

We have a successful track record of bringing innovative technology into unlikely spaces through crowd funding. Delivering on time and above expectations to our backers. In 2016, we shipped the PancakeBot, the world's first 3D pancake printer to over 72 countries around the world. Then in 2017 with the now Famous Sobro Coffee Table, we raised over $1.6 Million dollars with over 2,000 backers (we're pretty sure that's some kind of record). Now we bringing you the ultimate side table.

 

Perks 

Be ahead of the curve and back us now to be the first to get this amazingly smart side table. Because of the incredible support that we’ve gotten from you, the Indiegogo community, we’ve decided to launch the Sobro Smart Side Table on Indiegogo and offer our backers a significant savings in order to help us bring this product to market. After the campaign ends, the MSRP for the table is $899.

Now’s your chance to be the first to get this amazing table before everyone else. The heat is on to get the deal. Unleash the hounds.

 

Get a FREE Sobro Smart Side Table & a FREE Coffee Table with our Referral Program! 

Help us reach for the stars and reach 1.55M so we can offer you an addtional color option. Encourage your friends to back us  and you could get not only your Sobro Smart Side Table for FREE, but a FREE Sobro Coffee table as well. That's right folks, zero dinero, no clams, free-99, nada dollas. Want the deal? Read on for details...

We are using Indiegogo’s referral program to offer Sobro Side Table contributors a chance to get the following:

  • Refer 1 new person to back the current perk for a Sobro Side Table and you will $50 back from your contribution
  • Refer 3 separate new people to back the current perk for a Sobro Side Table and you will get your Sobro Side Table for HALF PRICE **
  • Refer 6 separate new people to back the current perk for a Sobro Side Table and you get your Sobro Side Table for FREE + a FREE Sobro Coffee table***

To count as a referrer, you must promote the Sobro campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is very important because otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to the resulting backers and you will not get any credit for your referral.

When you're logged into your account and use Indiegogo’s share tools to send a tweet, for example, the link in the tweet includes your unique ID. Then, when anyone in your social network reads your tweet, clicks the link and backs Sobro Side Table, you're instantly recognized for your referral.

Anyone who has already shared the campaign on social when logged into your account and has referrals will be eligible for the above. Once the campaign has ended and we start shipping your Sobro Side Table.

Questions about how to link? See this article here: Referral Links

* We will credit you back $50

** We will credit you back half of your contribution toward one Sobro (shipping fee not included)

*** We will credit you back 100% of your contribution toward one Sobro (shipping fee not included) + send you a Sobro Coffee Table For FREE (Sorry but this can only be for US & Canada due to the voltage)

+ Please note that if you have purchased the twin pack, this Thank You referral program only applies to one of your Sobro Smart Side Tables.

++ We can not accept any claims of referral that do NOT come through your unique Indiegogo ID.

Project Timeline 

For the Sobro Coffee Table, we finished funding in April and shipped the table in October to backers. We're confident that lightning will strike twice in crowdfunding and we can achieve that same timetable this time around. 

 

Why Indiegogo 

We chose Indiegogo becasuse the Indiegogo platform allows us to communicate with our customers and make our backers a part of the development process. We want the community's suggestions to help us make the Sobro Smart Side Table & App an epic product and where possible, to incorporate the feedback into the final design.  

Launching on Indiegogo allows us to bring this product to market faster than we would be able to without the support of our backers. We hope that you will join us in bringing the Sobro Smart Side Table to life. 

 

FAQ

Can I claim multiple perks?

Yes, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

 

What about shipping?

As you can imagine, properly protecting and shipping your Sobro Smart Side Table is expensive.  The quotations we received so far have given us sticker shock. We don’t want the same to happen to you, so we are capping the maximum standard shipping charge at $29 and we will absorb the remainder. This will put the pressure on us to find the best methods available. Unfortunately, there will be an additional shipping charge for Canada, Hawaii, Alaska, and Puerto Rico. The shipping charge for these locations will be $89. For international customers, the shipping charge will be $119. Shipping will be available to the US, Canada, EU, UK, Switzerland and Norway. Please note this does not include any import/tax duties imposed by Canada as we have no control over these factors.

We have already started to work with our network of logistics partners and the one factor that substantially reduces the shipping cost is critical mass. Assuming this campaign gets the monstrous support that we are hoping for, we will be able to leverage multiple ports & facilities in regions closer to our backers to reduce distance and, when shipping full truckloads, the costs plummet.  If we gain enough efficiency to bring the cost below $29.00, we will pass 100% of the savings through to the most important component of this campaign - our backers. So help us help you and please share this campaign with your friends, colleagues and anyone you think needs to step toward the future.

 

When can I expect a delivery?

While the estimated delivery time frame is July 2019, certain factors may slightly delay the project. These include adding suggested features, improvements, obtaining appropriate certifications, and the time taken to clear customs. We will do our best to be as transparent as possible and keep you up to date on all developments. We want to make sure we deliver a quality product that you will enjoy and be proud of!

 

What happens if we don't reach our goal?

You will receive a full refund after the campaign has ended. With your support and sharing the campaign with friends and family, we truly hope we can get over the finish line and beyond!

 

Does the Sobro Smart Side Table come with a warranty?

Absolutely, we are just finalizing the details.

 

What happens if the project gets pushed back past the delivery date?

With crowdfunding we are expected to deliver a product that can otherwise take years to deliver. While we will do our best to deliver on the estimated time frame, we also want to make sure we produce a quality product. There may be certain setbacks beyond our control, which may delay the project. However, we will always be transparent and keep you all up to date!

 

What about colors?

The Sobro Smart Side Table will be available in White, Black, and Wood finish should we meet our stretch goal of $1 million. The reason this is a stretch goal is we have to meet our manufacturers' minimum order quantities. If we exceed our fundraising goals, we may be able to create more finish options.

 

Will the Sobro Smart Side Table vary from the design above?

While we have built the preliminary design and prototypes, we may still make some minor improvements. We love hearing from our supporters and if you have any suggestions we would be more than happy to consider them.

 

How can I choose my color?

Everyone will have the option to select what color they would like after we reach our stretch goal of 1 million. This will be done in the form of a survey after the campaign has ended.

 

Can I get a refund after the campaign has ended?

The money raised here on Indiegogo will go into product design and development, purchasing of materials, manufacturing and the final delivery of your Sobro Smart Side Table. Refunds will only be issued if we can not deliver the final product after exploring all possible options. We will do our best to be transparent and keep you updated on all developments.

 

Will the Sobro Smart Side Table vary from the design above?

While we have the preliminary design and prototypes built, we may still make some minor improvements. We love hearing from our supporters and if you have any suggestions we will be more than happy take it into consideration while we finalize the design.

 

Is the power cord compatible in all countries?

We have to produce the Sobro Side Table to comply with all appropriate voltage, outlets, and safety standards in the countries we plan to ship to. Please note that obtaining certifications may take longer for certain countries.

 

Does the Sobro Smart Side Table come assembled?

Yes, you only need to screw the legs into the bottom of the table and you are good to go.

 

What version of Bluetooth is being used and what is the range it will connect with my table?

The range is about 10 meters, or 32 feet.

 

Where is the power cable located?

The power cable is located underneath the table.

 

What can I charge on the wireless charging pads?

The wireless charging pad can charge up to two compatible cellular phones at a time. Please note that wireless charging may not work on all phones. 

 

What is the temperature of the cooler drawer?

The temperature of the cooler will vary based on the environment temperature. The average range is about 53-68 degrees Fahrenheit.

 

Can you charge devices using all USB ports at once?

Yes!


Can I disable the motion sensor?

Yes, the motion sensor can be disabled. You can also control the amount of time the light is on, the intensity (brightness) of the light, and the sensitivity level of the motion sensor within the Sobro app.

 

Can I pair with my other Sobro devices?

Up to 2 Sobro Smart Side Tables can be used for audio output. One table will serve as the ‘leading’ speaker and the second will connect via Bluetooth.

 

If a device has been synced and falls out of range, does it auto-reconnect when back in range?

Yes.

 

How big is the Sobro Smart Side Table?

The table height is 18.5 inches, the width is 24 inches, and the depth is 19.2 inches.

 

What are the LED light colors?

LED light bar on the bottom front side of the table is motion activated to guide you safely in the dark. The range for the sensor operates in a 35-45º angle and 3 meter circumference. The light bar features 2 colors, warm white and bright white. There are also 7 back-lighting colors.

 

What about voice control? Can I pair my Amazon Alexa with the Sobro Smart Side Table?

Yes. The Sobro Smart Side Table is Bluetooth compatible and ready to pair with your home assistant.

 

What about the Smart Sleep features?

Nowadays we include many devices in our lives that help us become more efficient. One of the many benefits of the Sobro Smart Side Table is that it keeps everything together, while working to help you de-stress. The Sobro Smart Side Table App includes features such as intelligent sleep mode to help you develop great sleep habits and settings for your LED lights and speakers.

 

Will I be notified after backing the Sobro Smart Side Table of any changes, and when my delivery is expected?

Yes, we will keep you up to date with the progress and changes by regularly posting updates right here on the campaign page.
story_txt:
So smart. So connected. Sobro.Simplify & Improve your life & sleep! Its a proven fact - Better Sleep will improve all aspects of your life. Or you can improve & ease life in any entertaining area. Perfect for small spaces (apartments, dorms, etc). You will be the envy of your friends!!Wireless charging, a cooler drawer, bluetooth speakers, App Conrol with AI, LED accent lights and wired charging with cord management. Works/Pairs with Alexa and Google Home!So smart. Whether you’re using it as an amazing end table, or your next gen nightstand, the Sobro Smart Side Table will seamlessly integrate and improve your life.Four Color Options Now Available!! Thank you Indiegogo backers for helping us achieve the $1,550,000 goal. Now there are 4 color options that will be available (shown above). After the campaign is over you will be able to choose your color/finish option via a survey we send you from a website called Backerkit.    
We give you the Confidence to Back Us!!!We're StoreBound, the team that successfully created and delivered that amazing coffee table with a refrigerator drawer, bluetooth speakers, charging, yadda, yadda, yadda. And now we're back with our next big idea.Your life, reimagined. We believe the furniture in your home should help you live better. Your side table or night stand can be so much more than a lamp holder. By incorporating smart technology & smart thinking into our products, we’ve created furniture that can multitask and simplify your life.Great for small spaces....You could get all of this stuff on the left...OR you could just back us and enjoy the warm fuzzy feeling you get when you know you're making smart choices. The Sobro Smart Side table replaces a lot of stuff so it saves you space too. "What are some of the things it replaces?" you ask... A mini fridge, smart light, lockbox, magazine rack, nightlight, alarm clock, a light timer, a noise machine, bluetooth speakers, USB Hub, wireless charging pad, a table and more.  Add all that up and you're looking at a lot of moolah. So chill. The quiet thermoelectric cooler drawer keeps your drinks chilled & always at hand. The silent operation of the cooler drawer makes it perfect for the bedroom. Now you’ll never have to get out of your cozy bed in the middle of the night for refreshingly chill drink!Wireless charging & power.You asked for it and we did it! Wireless charging for 2 phones is built-in to the top of the Sobro Side Table. We’ve also added 2 USB ports and 2 USB-C Ports along with 2 (120v) outlets on the back so that you’ll always stay powered up. Bluetooth SpeakersExperience the rich sound of your favorite tunes with the built in bluetooth stereo speakers. Pair two Sobro Smart Side Tables together for even better audio output and TV audio can also be paired via Bluetooth. Contain the clutterWho doesn't want to be more organized?? With our cable management system, there are 3 magnetic cord wraps on the back of the unit so that your cable clutter stays under wraps. There’s also a channel for arranging cords built into the top of the table and the back of the storage shelf so you can run your charging cords neatly behind the unit.Sleep better, wake up easier.Intelligent sleep mode helps you create great sleep habits and keep them. The LED lights on the back of the table can simulate sunrise to help you wake up easily while the built-in white noise generator can drown out noise pollution.* A variety of pleasant sounds will be available through the Sobro App’s Smart Sleep Mode.* No guarantee to fully cancel your partner’s snoringA smarter nightlight. The LED light bar on the front of the table  is motion activated to guide you safely in the dark. The range for the sensor operates in a 35-45º angle and 3 meter circumference and features 2 colors, warm white and bright white. The duration that the light stays on, the color and  brightness can all be controlled in the Sobro App.Light it up.Create the perfect mood! The color LED accent lighting on the back of the table allows you to customize your mood with a full color spectrum at your fingertip. You can also put it in party mode using the Sobro App to sync the lights to change color in sequence with your music. Future Proof We're building in wifi connectivity so that your Sobro Smart Side Table can be updated as tech progresses, can be controlled remotely and can even incorporate IFTTT actions. All the bells & whistles...Based on the feed back from the awesome backers on the 1st Sobro smart furniture piece "The Smart Coffee Table" we have really packed this table with the features to make it the ultimate side table for your bedroom, entertaining area or office.Don't have Sobro FOMO. Seriously, remember when bitcoin was $100 - don't miss out on this deal. FOMO, it's the worst. They love us, they really love us. Designed for allSo many backers said that they wished that there was a smaller version of the Sobro Coffee Table, that we wanted to make sure that the Sobro Smart Side Table was a fit for everyone. It's compact enough to fit inside a 350 sq. ft. studio apartment in the East Village, yet roomy enough to hold a lot of stuff. Should you want the table to be taller, we will also make a "Lift Kit" available in 2 different heights. The Sobro Lift Kit legs are in development but will make the table 24" or 29", tall respectively.  Our Process We've been working hard to bring this product to life and this campaign to Indiegogo, here's a look behind the scenes into our design process...

 Our Team We have a successful track record of bringing innovative technology into unlikely spaces through crowd funding. Delivering on time and above expectations to our backers. In 2016, we shipped the PancakeBot, the world's first 3D pancake printer to over 72 countries around the world. Then in 2017 with the now Famous Sobro Coffee Table, we raised over $1.6 Million dollars with over 2,000 backers (we're pretty sure that's some kind of record). Now we bringing you the ultimate side table. 
Perks Be ahead of the curve and back us now to be the first to get this amazingly smart side table. Because of the incredible support that we’ve gotten from you, the Indiegogo community, we’ve decided to launch the Sobro Smart Side Table on Indiegogo and offer our backers a significant savings in order to help us bring this product to market. After the campaign ends, the MSRP for the table is $899.Now’s your chance to be the first to get this amazing table before everyone else. The heat is on to get the deal. Unleash the hounds. Get a FREE Sobro Smart Side Table & a FREE Coffee Table with our Referral Program! Help us reach for the stars and reach 1.55M so we can offer you an addtional color option. Encourage your friends to back us  and you could get not only your Sobro Smart Side Table for FREE, but a FREE Sobro Coffee table as well. That's right folks, zero dinero, no clams, free-99, nada dollas. Want the deal? Read on for details...We are using Indiegogo’s referral program to offer Sobro Side Table contributors a chance to get the following:
Refer 1 new person to back the current perk for a Sobro Side Table and you will $50 back from your contribution
Refer 3 separate new people to back the current perk for a Sobro Side Table and you will get your Sobro Side Table for HALF PRICE **
Refer 6 separate new people to back the current perk for a Sobro Side Table and you get your Sobro Side Table for FREE + a FREE Sobro Coffee table***
To count as a referrer, you must promote the Sobro campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is very important because otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to the resulting backers and you will not get any credit for your referral.When you're logged into your account and use Indiegogo’s share tools to send a tweet, for example, the link in the tweet includes your unique ID. Then, when anyone in your social network reads your tweet, clicks the link and backs Sobro Side Table, you're instantly recognized for your referral.Anyone who has already shared the campaign on social when logged into your account and has referrals will be eligible for the above. Once the campaign has ended and we start shipping your Sobro Side Table.Questions about how to link? See this article here: Referral Links* We will credit you back $50** We will credit you back half of your contribution toward one Sobro (shipping fee not included)*** We will credit you back 100% of your contribution toward one Sobro (shipping fee not included) + send you a Sobro Coffee Table For FREE (Sorry but this can only be for US & Canada due to the voltage)+ Please note that if you have purchased the twin pack, this Thank You referral program only applies to one of your Sobro Smart Side Tables.++ We can not accept any claims of referral that do NOT come through your unique Indiegogo ID.Project Timeline For the Sobro Coffee Table, we finished funding in April and shipped the table in October to backers. We're confident that lightning will strike twice in crowdfunding and we can achieve that same timetable this time around.  Why Indiegogo We chose Indiegogo becasuse the Indiegogo platform allows us to communicate with our customers and make our backers a part of the development process. We want the community's suggestions to help us make the Sobro Smart Side Table & App an epic product and where possible, to incorporate the feedback into the final design.  Launching on Indiegogo allows us to bring this product to market faster than we would be able to without the support of our backers. We hope that you will join us in bringing the Sobro Smart Side Table to life.  FAQCan I claim multiple perks?Yes, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk. What about shipping?As you can imagine, properly protecting and shipping your Sobro Smart Side Table is expensive.  The quotations we received so far have given us sticker shock. We don’t want the same to happen to you, so we are capping the maximum standard shipping charge at $29 and we will absorb the remainder. This will put the pressure on us to find the best methods available. Unfortunately, there will be an additional shipping charge for Canada, Hawaii, Alaska, and Puerto Rico. The shipping charge for these locations will be $89. For international customers, the shipping charge will be $119. Shipping will be available to the US, Canada, EU, UK, Switzerland and Norway. Please note this does not include any import/tax duties imposed by Canada as we have no control over these factors.We have already started to work with our network of logistics partners and the one factor that substantially reduces the shipping cost is critical mass. Assuming this campaign gets the monstrous support that we are hoping for, we will be able to leverage multiple ports & facilities in regions closer to our backers to reduce distance and, when shipping full truckloads, the costs plummet.  If we gain enough efficiency to bring the cost below $29.00, we will pass 100% of the savings through to the most important component of this campaign - our backers. So help us help you and please share this campaign with your friends, colleagues and anyone you think needs to step toward the future. When can I expect a delivery?While the estimated delivery time frame is July 2019, certain factors may slightly delay the project. These include adding suggested features, improvements, obtaining appropriate certifications, and the time taken to clear customs. We will do our best to be as transparent as possible and keep you up to date on all developments. We want to make sure we deliver a quality product that you will enjoy and be proud of! What happens if we don't reach our goal?You will receive a full refund after the campaign has ended. With your support and sharing the campaign with friends and family, we truly hope we can get over the finish line and beyond! Does the Sobro Smart Side Table come with a warranty?Absolutely, we are just finalizing the details. What happens if the project gets pushed back past the delivery date?With crowdfunding we are expected to deliver a product that can otherwise take years to deliver. While we will do our best to deliver on the estimated time frame, we also want to make sure we produce a quality product. There may be certain setbacks beyond our control, which may delay the project. However, we will always be transparent and keep you all up to date! What about colors?The Sobro Smart Side Table will be available in White, Black, and Wood finish should we meet our stretch goal of $1 million. story:
Get hot water on demand for cleaning off house siding or outdoor furniture, and then turn down the heat to give your furry friend a warm bath or fill up the kiddie pool for your kids to play in! You can use HotWave™ anywhere you have a garden hose hookup and a power outlet, so it can be used at your home, on the farm, on your vehicle, at the campground, and more.

 

HotWave™ heats water instantly using tankless water heating technology to provide endless hot water outdoors whenever and wherever you need it. 

HotWave™’s multipurpose design features 4 spray patterns so you’re sure to have the right one for the job at hand. Change the pressure and spray pattern with a turn of the dial, and turn up the heat! 

The science doesn’t lie! Hot water has faster-moving molecules than cold water. This molecular speed translates into heat and energy for all your cleaning needs. HotWave™ makes cleaning an easy and enjoyable experience whether it be washing siding, patios, decks, trucks, or more. It’s even gentle enough for pets and children to play in.

 

Designed with the highest electric safety standards in mind, HotWave™ has been tested in RheemLabs™ under tough conditions so it’s built to last. The comfortable, insulated ergonomic grip and easy-to-use handling and trigger lock make it a breeze to use. Just plug it in and you’re ready to go.

 

 

Clean the outside of your home with ease using HotWave™!

 

Washing your car just got easier. Fill a bucket, grab a sponge, and use the different spray settings to easily clean off tough grime.

 

Your pet deserves a warm bath. Don't be surprised if he takes it as another invitation to play!

 

Cleaning hard-to-reach windows is a breeze! 

 

Dirty bike? Need to rinse off a sandy surfboard? HotWave™ has you covered.

 

Enjoy the warm water outside anytime you need to clean up. 

 

 

 

The HotWave™ Water Heating Spray Nozzle was an idea that came directly from listening to homeowners. They needed a way to get hot water from their indoor faucet to their outdoor needs— washing cars and windows, bathing the dog, etc. We realized that rather than transferring hot water from inside to outside, the more efficient solution would be to heat water outside.


The RheemLabs™ team is a cross-functional group set out to innovate creative, new solutions to some of consumers’ biggest hot water challenges. With over 50 years of combined business experience, the team has expertise in fields including engineering, marketing, product management, sales, and more. The group leverages these strengths to holistically address problems and provide winning solutions to consumers, enabling transformative hot water experiences for all. 

For nearly 100 years, the Rheem® name has been synonymous with innovation. Some of the biggest advancements in air conditioning and heating, water heating, and refrigeration began as ideas on the Rheem drawing board. We’ve realized along the way that the best path to continue leading in the industry is through demonstration. That’s how RheemLabs™ was born.

 

OUR PROCESS

We start with market evaluation, exploring consumers’ and professionals’ pain points—the inefficiencies and inconveniences they deal with day-to-day—and looking for ways we can address them. We then go through agile development to find the best solution that’s the right fit. Once we have a solution we think works, we build a small-batch manufactured prototype. From there, we test and learn, gathering invaluable feedback by working with real users. If we nailed it, we can launch full scale. If there are things we could do better, we can go back and tweak our solution.

Think of RheemLabs™ as the research and small-scale development arm of Rheem. By working nimbly and launching on Indiegogo to validate our ideas, we’re able to bring innovative solutions to your heating and cooling needs faster than ever before.

story:
As of today, 65% of the world population can not access the Internet. This means that a wide number of people is unable to exchange information, discover the world or improve his culture and knowledge.

Are you ready for the Crowd Communicating era?

To fight the digital divide, we have started to work on a brand new telecommunication standard. We focused on the possibility to reuse cheap and well-known devices such as smartphones and mini-PCs.

We want to make each device to take part in both exchanging data and computing it.

The idea

Our idea is to turn any wi-fi-capable device into a peer, allowing a wide number of peers to get interconnected each other. This would mainly work as the human brain, where each node stores and computes information, then transmits it back. The more peers, the fastest and more efficient network.

In this way, areas with a large population density will be automatically provided with a completely free wi-fi based data connection. 

Concept

The concept behind this is simple and based on the following assumptions:

  1. smartphones, tablet, PCs and mini-PCs already come with a built-in WiFi, Bluetooth or NFC connectivity module.

  2. The population density in a specific area gives both the size of bandwidth need and the availability of interconnectable devices.

  3. Human artifacts could host additional networking-capable smart devices (cars, trains, buildings, traffic lights, …), such as mini-PCs or used/legacy smartphones that would have been thrown away.

What about Telecom Operators?

Telecom Operators are not out-of-the-game: they will play an important role by focusing on long-distance and large-bandwidth links. Smart devices are also connected to standard Internet gateways, such as modems, to bridge the Crowd Communicating networks with the Internet. 


How can you contribute?

We started to work on this project on our spare time, this way will take too long. We have decided to involve the Company we are working for (Gruppo MAASI) that accepted by providing time and resources. Unluckily this is not sufficient yet, and we need money to pay for prototypes, researches and consultancies.

Your money we will receive are required to:

  1. buy mini-PCs and refurbished smartphones of many different vendors that will be used for testing
  2. buy markets database access (eg: wifi-capable devices specifications, market penetration etc)
  3. buy experts consultancies (telecommunication engineers, legal advisers for country-related regulations etc)
  4. advertise our project in the world

Perks

The most important perk you will receive, is the satisfaction of being part of a big change. Furthermore, we have created some gadgets to let you share with everybody this great challenge.

Crowd Communicating Official T-shirt

T-shirts will be available for both adults and babies, currently in black only.

We will ask you your preferred size (and color) via e-mail one month before the estimated shipping date.



Backer bracelet 

Silicone bracelets in many colors. 

We will ask you your preferred size (and color) via e-mail one month before the estimated shipping date.


Kick-off dinner seat

You will invited to our kick-off dinner in London scheduled for August 2014.

The Team will attend in full and everyone there will be happy to answer to all questions you may have for us. (limited seats available)

Nominate your City!

This perk is reserved to Mayors .. whether you want your City to be one of the 3 Metropolitan-area pilot, please get in touch with us. We will verify the base requisites (such as minimum density, regulations, need of coverage by Citizens, ...). The Metropolitan-area pilot phase will start by the end of Q1/2015.

Businesses sponsorship

We also accept corporate sponsorship. We require our sponsors to be provided with a Social Responsibility certification (eg: SA8000). Please contact us for further information.

Roadmap

Our team has started working on the target architecture, here you the high-level project deliverables:

  1. Architecture and standards design.

  2. Creation of the information secure delivery algorithms.

  3. Definition of the communication protocol.

  4. Definition of the implementation specifications.

  5. Creation of an Open Source development framework.

  6. Development of 2 pilot applications: voice (telephone) and instant messaging.

  7. Pilot execution: free distribution of the App set within 3 Metropolitan and 3 Country areas - we will focus primarily on system resiliency and security.
  8. General availability.

The time we will require is strictly dependent on YOUR contribution! 

Important

Flexible funding: this means we will keep the money even if the total amount is not reached. We are committed to this project, so we will keep working on this even if the campaign does not reach the objective.

We also commit to the delivery of all perks even if the funding goal is not achieved. .. but, please, help us reaching it and going beyond! We want to give our sons a better world.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us also by:

  1. sharing our campaign with your friends (link to this page)
  2. offering free technical consultancy (Wi-Fi telecommunications, legal, marketing)
  3. donating stocks of retired Wi-Fi capable devices (no clue with the battery, but should be working and provided with the power supply) 

Crowd Communicating
a simple and foolish idea to change the World!

As of today, 65% of the world population can not access the Internet. This means that a wide number of people is unable to exchange information, discover the world or improve his culture and knowledge.Are you ready for the Crowd Communicating era?To fight the digital divide, we have started to work on a brand new telecommunication standard. We focused on the possibility to reuse cheap and well-known devices such as smartphones and mini-PCs.We want to make each device to take part in both exchanging data and computing it.The ideaOur idea is to turn any wi-fi-capable device into a peer, allowing a wide number of peers to get interconnected each other. This would mainly work as the human brain, where each node stores and computes information, then transmits it back. The more peers, the fastest and more efficient network.In this way, areas with a large population density will be automatically provided with a completely free wi-fi based data connection. ConceptThe concept behind this is simple and based on the following assumptions:
smartphones, tablet, PCs and mini-PCs already come with a built-in WiFi, Bluetooth or NFC connectivity module.
The population density in a specific area gives both the size of bandwidth need and the availability of interconnectable devices.
Human artifacts could host additional networking-capable smart devices (cars, trains, buildings, traffic lights, …), such as mini-PCs or used/legacy smartphones that would have been thrown away.
What about Telecom Operators?Telecom Operators are not out-of-the-game: they will play an important role by focusing on long-distance and large-bandwidth links. Smart devices are also connected to standard Internet gateways, such as modems, to bridge the Crowd Communicating networks with the Internet. How can you contribute?We started to work on this project on our spare time, this way will take too long. We have decided to involve the Company we are working for (Gruppo MAASI) that accepted by providing time and resources. Unluckily this is not sufficient yet, and we need money to pay for prototypes, researches and consultancies.Your money we will receive are required to:
buy mini-PCs and refurbished smartphones of many different vendors that will be used for testing
buy markets database access (eg: wifi-capable devices specifications, market penetration etc)
buy experts consultancies (telecommunication engineers, legal advisers for country-related regulations etc)
advertise our project in the world
PerksThe most important perk you will receive, is the satisfaction of being part of a big change. Furthermore, we have created some gadgets to let you share with everybody this great challenge.Crowd Communicating Official T-shirtT-shirts will be available for both adults and babies, currently in black only.We will ask you your preferred size (and color) via e-mail one month before the estimated shipping date.Backer bracelet Silicone bracelets in many colors. We will ask you your preferred size (and color) via e-mail one month before the estimated shipping date.Kick-off dinner seatYou will invited to our kick-off dinner in London scheduled for August 2014.The Team will attend in full and everyone there will be happy to answer to all questions you may have for us. (limited seats available)Nominate your City!This perk is reserved to Mayors .. whether you want your City to be one of the 3 Metropolitan-area pilot, please get in touch with us. We will verify the base requisites (such as minimum density, regulations, need of coverage by Citizens, ...). The Metropolitan-area pilot phase will start by the end of Q1/2015.Businesses sponsorshipWe also accept corporate sponsorship. We require our sponsors to be provided with a Social Responsibility certification (eg: SA8000). Please contact us for further information.RoadmapOur team has started working on the target architecture, here you the high-level project deliverables:
Architecture and standards design.
Creation of the information secure delivery algorithms.
Definition of the communication protocol.
Definition of the implementation specifications.
Creation of an Open Source development framework.
Development of 2 pilot applications: voice (telephone) and instant messaging.
Pilot execution: free distribution of the App set within 3 Metropolitan and 3 Country areas - we will focus primarily on system resiliency and security.
General availability.
The time we will require is strictly dependent on YOUR contribution! ImportantFlexible funding: this means we will keep the money even if the total amount is not reached. We are committed to this project, so we will keep working on this even if the campaign does not reach the objective.We also commit to the delivery of all perks even if the funding goal is not achieved. .. but, please, help us reaching it and going beyond! We want to give our sons a better world.
Other Ways You Can Help
You can help us also by:
sharing our campaign with your friends (link to this page)
offering free technical consultancy (Wi-Fi telecommunications, legal, marketing)
donating stocks of retired Wi-Fi capable devices (no clue with the battery, but should be working and provided with the power supply) 
Crowd Communicatinga simple and foolish idea to change the World!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, our names are Zach, Allen, Shayna and Justin. We are all just your average working class citizens in the Greater-St. Louis area. We have no children, one cat, and we all love each other very much. We are all currently in school, or graduated, and let me tell ya, we go through a lot of clothes. Our new apartment does not come with a Washer and Dryer, so we need your help!

What We Need & What You Get

So we need a washer and dryer:

  • It must accommodate all four of us (including the cat)
  • It must accommodate for 1 female resident, which is double the amount the 3 gentlemen together will use it. 
  • Every penny raised will be used towards the purchase of our washer and dryer. 
  • Each donor will have their name written on the washer and dryer with a sharpie, and a photo will be posted on Facebook.

The Impact

We feel that there are major impacts for purchasing this washer and dryer:

  • Fresh, clean clothes provide safer working environments for us, and our co-workers.
  • Clean laundry allows clothes to be folded and put away neatly, which is better for our environment.
  • Today's society is more accepting to people with clean, fresh clothes rather than people with dirty clothes.
  • Everyone living together will get along if we all are wearing fresh clean clothes.
  • If you ever stay the night, you may use the washer and dryer as well (accommodations for personal detergent must be made).

Risks & Challenges

There are a few risks and challenges if we don't meet our goal:

  • Being unable to purchase a washer and dryer will lead to laundry buildup.
  • Eventually we will run out of clean clothes entirely.
  • First our social life will be impacted, then our careers.
  • Smelly clothes lead to loss of job, which will result in eviction. 
  • Families won't be so warm-welcoming to family functions and events.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and we understand that, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Here's what you can do:

  • Print this off and hang it up at school, at work, or in the office lunchroom.
  • Share on social media such as Facebook or Twitter, even Instagram!
  • Hang flyers on popular walking trails and in parks!
  • Pats on the back and moral support are ALWAYS welcome!

And that's all there is to it. Please note that ALL contributions will be used towards the purchase of a new washer and dryer, whether or not our complete goal is met. Please note that 9% of all contributions go to IndieGoGo allowing us to use their site.

story:
REMEMBER TO SPREAD THE WORD AND SHARE VIA FACEBOOK/TWITTER/OR HOWEVER ELSE YOU SEE FIT!  THANKS IN ADVANCE FOR THE SUPPORT...

ONLY $999,994 LEFT TO GO!

NEW PERKS AVAILIBLE!

Reason to donate:

- It would be the best "how I made my first million story"

- At least one of us could experience having a million dollars

- You know you're going to make atleast one frivilous purchase in the next 99 days, why not have it be this

- It makes an interesting conversation starter..."You know I contributed to that guy becoming a millionaire"

- I'd like to fill a suitcase with money, just to say I've done it one time in my life. 

- While trying to spread the word over twitter I got carried away and temporarily suspended...

story:
In Eclipse: Avalon's Gate humanity has stumbled upon a treasure trove known as Avalon. This is a galaxy full of exotic and precious resources which could help us turn humanity into a Utopian society.

However, every treasure has a guardian. And this treasures guardian is a vicious race known as the Kha'Dari. They are a greedy, proud people, and they want to keep Avalon to themselves. They believe our knowledge of Avalon's location is a threat to their existence, and they will stop at nothing to destroy the human race as we know it.


Fight off the Kha'Dari sector by sector using fleets to destroy their strongholds on planets. Infiltrate the Humans territory to sabotage and halt their advance into Avalon as the Kha'Dari.

  • 2 Engaging races with extended content to come
  • Multiplayer mode with experience and money gains (main mode)
  • Single Player vrs AI Mode (using your upgraded multiplayer lv)
  • Story Mode for campaigning via a galaxy map
  • Upgrade and Master your race to dominate your opponents
  • Tons of Achievements to be unlocked
  • Item trading between players

Build Your Base Defenses 

  • Build  your towers including, turrets, barricades, and more to defend your bases
  • Tech Shop for customizing your race's ships, buildings, and traits
  • Upgrade and advance your building to outmatch your opponents
  • Repaint your ships with fearsome skins to unlock
  • Make your building better... stronger... unbeatable

Upgrade your units 

  • Become Elite Fighters or Unstoppable tanks Via the Tech Shop
  • Boast Power, Stealth, or Utility to Prevail

       

        


Don't just donate, take part in the rewards! Were giving you plenty of opportunity to be a part of this game with us. We can't do it alone! 

From Comfortable T-Shirts, to unbelievable artwork posters, we've got you covered.

Wanna be in the Beta, Done. Wanna be in the APLHA, Done. What else you got? Want to sit in and be apart of the game design meetings. DONE. Be an donater and all your dreams can come true!

We'll be giving you updates. More than you can count. Showing off our progress, teasing you with the designs, tantalizing you with game play. If we can reach our funding goals and beyond, well theres so much more we can give you.

Goals Reached

Reach $40,000 - Include a third race at launch!

Reach $75,000 - Includes the Kha'Dari story mode!


Let us know what else you'd like to see in this project!




                     


         


 Phillip - Project Manager, & Gamer Designer

 James - Lead Artist

 Tim - Lead Programmer, Game Designer, & Director

 Louis - Game Designer & Video Producer

 Alexander - Programmer & Networking Manager


            Bit Bot - Team Mascot                             Game Concept & Designs

   

                 


Thank you for taking the time to check out our project! We really hope this helps you build excitement towards our goal and please feel free to ask any questions relating to our project! Updates will be coming soon!

story:
What Is HereLink

     HereLink do the reseach of WIFI.This module is a coin-sized Linux computer with wifi. It is also able to work as a full functional router. It runs OpenWrt on top of Linux. It contains 32MB SDRAM, 8MB SPI Flash and using RT5350(360MHz MIPS) as its heart. It provides many interfaces such as 10/100M Ethernet, USB, UART, I2C, I2S, GPIOs,its size is 29mm x40mm.


Pin No Signal Type Description
1 VCC5V Supply Voltage, 5V+/-10%
2 GND Analogue Ground
3 WIFILED WLAN Activity LED
4 VO3.3 3.3V Output (Suuport Atmost 300mA)
5 LINK1 10/100 PHY Port #1 activity LED
6 N/A Reserved
7 N/A Reserved
8 GPIO0 General GPIO  Reserved
9 GPIO1 General GPIO  Reserved
10 ES/RST Exit transparent transmission mode/Restore factory value
11 TXOP1 10/100 PHY Port #1 TXP
12 TXON1 10/100 PHY Port #1 TXN
13 RXIP2 10/100 PHY Port #2 TXP
14 RXIN2 10/100 PHY Port #2 TXN
15 RXIN1 10/100 PHY Port #1 RXN
16 RXIP1 10/100 PHY Port #1 RXP
17 TXON2 10/100 PHY Port #2 OXN
18 TXOP2 10/100 PHY Port #2 OXP
19 GPIO2 General GPIO  Reserved
20 UART_RX UART RXD.
21 UART_TX UART TXD.
22 GPIO3 General GPIO  Reserved
23 LINK2 10/100 PHY Port #2 activity LED
24 GPIO4 General GPIO  Reserved
25 WPS/RST WiFi Protected Setup /Restore factory value
26 GPIO5 General GPIO  Reserved
27 VO1.8 1.8V Output (Suuport Atmost 300mA)
28 VCC5V Supply Voltage, 5V+/-10%

What can You DO with HereLink?

1. Use your Iphone or android to control your LED or Switch.

2. A remote control robot with camera.

3. A portable VPN router.

4. A wireless speaker.

5. A offline downloader.

6. WIFI -> TTL(or Serial Port) to control Arduino remotely.

7.Smart Home Gateway.

8.We can guide you how to put the Airplay and DLNA in it.

9.Wireless a USB device such as printer, scanner,  hard disk, camera and etc

10.P2P function,so you do not need to do port map.

11.3G Support.We can support more than 20 number 3G usb wireless WAN cards

12.....................

And many many possibilities, awaiting discovery!


What will You Get?

    You will not only get the HereLink Module, but also its full hardware design including sch, pcb, bom; full source code including boot loader and os(openwrt), applications. You are able to control EveryThing of your own project.


The Life of HereLink Module:

story:
Cooking Brings Great Joy

Do you agree that cooking is one of the most underrated pleasures in life? Nothing can compare to the joy of permeating your living room with the pleasant aromas of a batch of precisely integrated ingredients. Cooking is as much a science as it is an art. But when was the last time you splurged and got yourself a nice knife, the quintessential tool of any cook? Well you don't need to pay an arm and a leg for a great chef's knife anymore, you just need the Mizu Chef's Knife.

 

Make Every Cut, A Cut Above

The Mizu Chef's Knife was crafted and tested by professionals so that you would have the ultimate cooking experience. Every tomato you slice, every breast you fillet, every herb that you rock will all happen effortlessly. You will feel the difference that comes from the high carbon, VG10 cutting edge. Boasting a HRC (Hardness Rating) of 60-62, this ultra sharp edge will surgically disassemble anything you toss at it, for a long, long time. Gordon Ramsay won't be complaining about your imperfectly cut french fries no more!


Did You Know?

That a sharp knife is regarded as safer than a dull knife? As contradicting as that may sound, the reasoning is quite simple: sharp knives are easier to control and perform as expected, while dull knives tend to require more force and are more difficult to operate. Simply put, sharp knives do the work for you, while dull knives make you work harder. If you've ever experienced your knife slipping or sliding off a bell pepper or onion skin then you experienced dull knife syndrome. Save time, energy and injuries by using a sharp knife!

 


Cutting Edge Specifications

The only way you can get a better knife is if you went out and bought a $150 knife. Really, you won't find a better knife better than ours at this price!

  • G10 Handle - Synthetic fiber resin greatly increases durability and grip
  • Dual Stainless Steel Rivets - Solid design to hold the partial tang blade in place
  • Slanted Bolster - Allows for a more natural pinch grip
  • Curved Heel - Prevents unnecessary finger nicks
  • VG10 Damascus Blade - Premium Japanese steel, beautiful and easier to sharpen
  • HRC 60-62 - Superior edge retention
  • 15° Dual Bevel - Accommodates left and right handed users, while providing a razor sharp cutting edge



Can you believe it?

Knives sold at retailers can be marked up by more than 200%! By employing a direct to consumer business model, we are able to drastically slash the price of our Mizu Chef's knife. Which saves you money to use for more groceries!


Mizu Chef's Knife is a Game Changer  

Don't overpay for knives of inferior steel or outrageous markups. Get the Mizu Chef's knife and make your meals a cut above!


The Team


Partners

Risks and Challenges

Our team has over 20 years of experience in the restaurant industry and with manufacturing. While we are confident that the production process will commence without any issues, nothing is ever guaranteed. Below are some of the problems that may arise.

Delay in Raw Material procurement - The material we are using is manufactured by a single factory in Japan. Although rare, there are instances where the demand for the material outpaces their supply and this could create an unforeseen delay. Fortunately for us, we've already contacted other manufactures that use VG10 and have the ability to purchase the raw material at a slightly higher price point if needed.

Delay in Manufacturing - The factory we are using has told us that they will provide us manufacturing capacity once we place the order. In reality, that's based on their pipeline today and we are not able to estimate any future pipeline additions from their other clients. The worst case would be an additional 1-2 month delay in our estimate delivery date. We will have a definitive answer on the production timeline once we successfully place our purchase order with the factory.

Delay in Testing - We are making it an emphasis to ensure our products are properly tested before shipping out. In the case that a quality issue does arise, we may need to redo certain batches.

Rest assured that we will have a team member monitoring the progress of the production during every stage. Regardless of what happens, we will guarantee that everyone will receive their knives!

story:
Our Mission & Our Campaign

  • Our mission is to create and assist in the development of quality affordable housing through the preservation of historic buildings. 
  • We believe that providing low to moderate income renters with affordable housing opportunities results in a healthier and more sustainable neighborhood. 
  • Our first project is located in an historic neighborhood outside of the downtown core in Roanoke, VA. The neighborhood has suffered in the past with mis-management of rental properties and general deterioration of both the homes and the neighborhood atmosphere. 
  • Our goal is to perform a high-quality rehabilitation of one of the neighborhood's most dilapidated homes in order to provide affordable rental housing to the area. 
  • We are just $5,000 shy of meeting our funding goals to acquire our first property and begin our rehabilitation. Here's where you come in...

Restoration Housing's Goals & Your Role

  • We're very close to meeting our goal to purchase our first home and only need an additional $5,000 in order to make the acquisition. Once the home is purchased, our nonprofit will use a combination of historic tax credits and local grants to begin the construction loan process and get our work started!
  • If we can't meet our goal of $5,000 on IndieGoGo, we will continue to pursue other grants and monetary contributions throughout the community until we can afford to purchase our first property. 
  • We are determined to get this project up and moving in the very near future and would love to include you in the process! Even the smallest donation counts...

The Impact of Historic Rehabilitation & Affordable Housing

  • Not only will this project help to reduce vacancy and blight, it will provide affordability in an area that is quickly becoming less and less affordable. Our goal is to rehab this home and provide rental units for tenants that earn 50% of the area's median income. 
  • Our projects strive to promote an appreciation for the history and integrity of a neighborhood and its surrounding community. Roanoke, Virginia is the childhood home of Restoration Housing's founding director and it holds a very special place in her heart. We hope to make Roanoke a better place to live for all of its citizens and all of its neighborhoods. 
  • We believe that all of our work should reflect our desire for a better social and cultural environment for future generations and we're confident that our work will have a lasting and positive effect on the community. 

You Can Help

Restoration Housing appreciates your time and consideration of our campaign and understands that it isn't always possible to make a monetary donation, especially after the holidays. In lieu of a donation, we also welcome any additional help that you can offer our organization:

  • Please spread the word for our campaign as much as possible. Even just a quick click of a share tool like Facebook can make a difference.
  • Please contact us at 540-797-0819 or info@restorationhousing.org to see how you can help. We can provide more detailed financial and project-specific information that can be used to spread the word of the work that we're doing. 
  • You can also visit our website at www.restorationhousing.org to learn more about our mission, goals, and values.

story:
Meet Tertill™, the solar powered weeding robot for your garden

Tertill™ is a solar-powered and weatherproof robot that weeds your garden every day.

With Tertill™, gardeners can now enjoy weed-free vegetable and flower gardens, without the monotony and frustration of weeding.  Organic gardeners can breathe easy and enjoy a weed-free, chemical-free garden all season long.

Created by roboticist Joe Jones – inventor of the Roomba – Franklin Robotics’ Tertill™ is designed to live in your garden and take care of the weeding, come rain or shine.

 

How does it work?

Tertill™ lives in your garden and prevents weeds from becoming established.  Using unique design elements and a variety of sensors, Tertill™ patrols the garden daily, avoiding plants and obstacles while looking for weeds to eliminate.

 

How does it know what's a weed and what's a plant?

Tertill™ has a very simple method: weeds are short, plants are tall. A plant tall enough to touch the front of the shell activates a sensor that makes the robot turn away. A plant short enough to pass under the shell, though, activates a different sensor that turns on the weed cutter.  

 

Because Tertill™ uses a height-based approach, put one of the provided plant collars around short plants until they are tall enough for the robot to recognize. When Tertill™ approaches the collar, it will recognize it and turn away.

 

How does it get rid of weeds? Won't they come back?

Tertill™ whacks weeds using a spinning string trimmer, which cuts the weed off near the ground. Because Tertill™ lives in your garden and goes looking for weeds every day, weeds are always small when the robot finds them.

 

A whacked weed may sprout again, but sprouting takes energy stored in the seed or root. By coming back every day, Tertill never lets a weed develop the leaves it needs to replenish this energy, so eventually the weed gives up and dies.

 

How often do I need to charge Tertill™?

Tertill™ gets its power from the sun. When there is sunlight—even on cloudy days—the solar cell converts the light into electricity. The robot stores the energy in a battery, which you don’t need to charge or replace. Tertill™ uses its stored power smartly—during cloudy stretches, when less power is available, it patrols for weeds less often. Tertill™ is more aggressive during periods with more sun. Fortunately, weeds grow more slowly when they have less light.

 

Do I need more than one?

Most gardeners will need only one robot. If you have an unusually large garden (good for you!) you might get better performance with more than one robot. (The area of a typical garden in the US is about 100 square feet.)

 

Will Tertill™ get stuck?

Tertill™ uses four-wheel-drive. This helps the robot move through soft soil, sand, and mulch, and also helps it climb slopes. Its distinctive diagonal wheels make Tertill™ more stable on slopes and help it get past certain terrain challenges.

Tertill™ relies on several sensors and clever programming to keep out of trouble. To detect objects like the garden fence and big plants, the robot uses sensors similar to those found in many smart phones—the lightest touch is all it takes. To detect steep slopes, Tertill™ uses the same sort of sensor that tells your cell phone which way is up. Tertill™ can also sense if a motor stops turning—perhaps jammed by a rock—so it can protect itself from damage.

 

How does Tertill™ know where the edge of my garden is?

There needs to be at least a short barrier around your garden to keep the robot from wandering away. The barrier might be a fence, edging that’s two inches or taller, or the wooden border of a raised bed.

Tertill™ has a simple, reliable strategy to ensure that it covers the garden. It uses a combination of bouncing away from, and sometimes following, obstacles and plants. This is the same strategy employed by some models of Roomba and other robotic vacuums.

Advantages of a Weeding Robot

Using a robot to weed your garden has some important advantages.

No herbicides: Gardeners with persistent weed problems sometimes resort to chemical herbicides to protect their crops. But by patiently chopping weeds when they are small, Tertill™ keeps weeds well controlled using only mechanical means. The expense, the hassle, the danger to children and pets, and the worries associated with chemical herbicides are eliminated. (Have you ever actually read what you're supposed to do with herbicides? There's a lot to it.)

Diligence: Gardeners often forget to weed but weeds never forget to grow. At one time or another most of us have been dismayed to find a once pristine garden “suddenly” choked with weeds. We all intend to give our gardens regular attention but sometimes life gets in the way. Not so for Tertill™. Its only purpose is weeding, so it never forgets, never gets distracted, and never goes on vacation.

Productivity: All the fertilizer, all the water, and all the sunlight that reaches your garden should go to growing healthy, productive crops. But weeds use these resources, too, depriving them of the light and food they need to thrive. By keeping the weeds from establishing themselves, Tertill™ makes sure that your plants (the good ones!) get all the resources they can.

Gardening limitations: Gardening offers great benefit to the gardener. It gives us time outdoors surrounded by growing plants, it’s good exercise, it rewards us with delicious, fresh food, and it is a source of pride and accomplishment. But older folks or anyone with a mobility challenge may find that their physical limitations force them to cut back on gardening. Tertill™ can help. Because weeding is often the most arduous gardening job, assigning that task to a robot can help the gardener keep doing what they love.

Robotic Awesomeness: People have been trying to get weeds out of their garden for a long time: they have tried plastic groundcloth, homemade herbicides, boiling water, and countless other approaches.  But all of these remedies lack a certain robotic awesomeness that Tertill™ brings to the situation.

Specifications

Tertill in the News

We have come a long way since the Lego and Wiffle ball prototype that first ran in Joe's garden.  After building and testing 6 generations of prototypes, we are nearly ready to set up manufacturing to get Tertill delivered as soon as possible.

We need to place a large enough order to produce the robots cost-effectively.  In return, you will be one of the first to receive a weeding robot for your garden.

Our team

Our team is experienced in designing, building, and marketing consumer products, and has a deep experience in robots, particularly in AgTech or agriculture technology. 

Timeline 

Thank you

We’d like to say thanks to our followers who have helped shape Tertill™, and to our friends and families that have supported us. Your ideas, feedback, and support have allowed us to make this idea real, and we’re excited to be on this journey.

If you can, please help us spread the word. Every extra person who knows about Tertill™ really helps.

Thanks!

story:
Remember how people first reacted to the idea of the Tesla car?  The Enerzator is about heating and cooling, but with a bigger difference and advantage!


The Science and Engineering behind the Enerzator is well-established; the design is innovative.


The Need and Demand for Something Like the Enerzator


R744 is refrigerant-grade, high-purity, carbon dioxide with a moisture content of less than 10 parts per million.  It has the kind of chemical properties that make the Enerzator possible.


Here Are Just a Few of the Many R744.com Partner Companies [Enerzator is not claiming association w/R774.com nor their partners]




We are listing these so that you get the idea about the Enerzator's potential (there are many more R744 partner companies than listed here.)


Why the Enerzator Works

With the right kind of gas, such as carbon dioxide (CO2), and an efficient system, it does not take much temperature differential to produce energy.  For example, with a camper propane refrigerator just a small flame produces the required energy (as per picture of flame housing below.)

Because CO2 boils (!) at -70.6 degrees Fahrenheit (57 degrees C) it will "steam" and create pressure (practically anywhere in the world), which can be turned into energy at very low cost.  In other words:

1. Steam engines work
2. CO2 boils practically anywhere

Therefore, a device can be designed and built that takes advantage of ambient temperature to produce energy.


How the Enerzator Works

The Enerzator is basically a steam engine plus super efficient heat pump that takes advantage of carbon dioxide's (CO2) properties (R744) to produce very green energy.  Bear in mind that CO2 is a major air waste product (cheap.)

"A heat pump is a device that provides heat energy from a source of heat to a destination called a "heat sink". Heat pumps are designed to move thermal energy opposite to the direction of spontaneous heat flow by absorbing heat from a cold space and releasing it to a warmer one, and vice-versa." [Wikipedia]

For the technically inclined, here is an example of a propane refrigeration drawing.


What Is So Great About the Enerzator?

It is important that you recognize this as an example of a "breakthrough" innovation where the principles are so well-known that people simply haven't thought about applying them in a different way.  When people think steam engines, they think 18th and early 19th Centuries.  The Enerzator uses advance technology components but powerful "old-fashioned" principles.

Planned Model Specs and Design Details


The Team

  Royce Hamer is  a Mechanical Engineer with particular

expertise in rotating equipment.  He  holds 4 inter-provincial certifications and has been awarded about 8 Industrial Designs (similar to a patent.)  Royce has a successful history of improving on technology and developing new concepts.  He has been interested in energy-efficient design for many years.

Royce started researching energy efficiency about seven years ago when he worked in the oil and gas industry.  He started serious work on the design of the Enerzator about three years ago, investing time and a considerable sum of his own monies.

Vlad Gouzenko has worked as a project manager and systems engineer for several companies with responsibilities relating to mechanical and industrial engineering.

Funding Goal

We asking for $ 70,000.00 in order to get the product design finalized and produce the Model ZP002.  Then fund an awareness campaign and move into marketing and production.

All funds will be used for expenses and to retain qualified outside assistance.  The principals will not receive compensation until the project is profitable.  We are doing this because it is an important cause.

As we move forward we will go to hire very talented individuals to master the assembly lines and to develop new devices for large industry and to miniaturize the units for portable personal devices. 

Serious donations will receive vouchers equal or greater in value matching the donation. This is part of our belief system ( the price of giving is receiving). We cannot easily do this without your help.

Great Perks

Would you like to have had first dips on the Tesla car (e.g. check what's happened to the value of their stock)?  If you missed that, now you have a chance with the Enerzator(tm) ZPP Green Energy System!  Remember, people were talking about electric cars for a long time, before Elon Musk got it done the right way.  Wouldn't it be fun if you had received a t-shirt proving that you were one of the early Tesla cars supporters?


Risks & Challenges

During the funding and support phase we expect considerable skepticism because of the negative associations people have about radical energy innovations.  For example, Zero Point Energy is a physical reality that has been presented in both positive and negative ways.
Furthermore, when the Enerzator starts large-scale production, we expect competitors to act fiercely because of the general impact this technology can have.  For example, we plan to develop very basic and simple units that can be build in a home workshop.

Other Ways You Can Help

We do not wish to create a lot of publicity at this time as the R744 market has been drawing a lot of attention and we are a start-up.  We are vulnerable to those who (1) have their own, inferior products and/or (2) prefer to control the dissemination of efficient energy products.  You can help by passing the word of this project to potential donors and be aware that we reward those who help others with no expectations.
