story:
MaituFoods is a community based Vegan Meal provider. We provide meals for our clients who include community members and families with special dietary needs. We have special food programs and packages for pregnant and postpartum mothers and their families as well as programs catered towards children. We also extend our work to serve other facets of the community be it through food demonstrations, catering, community events, etc. 


This campaign is to help us extend our reach and increase our ability to serve our community in a viable, sustainable way. For the last 6 years since MaituFoods was established we have been running our Food service by any means using the bare minimum. In that time period we have been able to overcome a number of hurdles and obstacles to make sure that we stayed consistent with our duty and service to our community to provide fresh, local, healthy food and education. We feel the time has come to solidify our mission and secure ourselves within our community as a reliable, continuous resource for their nutritional needs, in an environment and community that offers little to no aid in that arena. Through your contributions, it will help to keep MaituFoods as an affordable and tangible resource within our community and wherever else we are called to serve.

What We Need & What You Get

So we are calling on you, to pool your resources for a total of $6,000. With that $6,000 we can get some great headway in areas that will push MaituFoods forward to the next level of service.

1. CERTIFICATION and LICENSING: We want to make sure MaituFoods has all the certifications, licensing and education we need to bring our food to your table through local markets, stores, etc. Wherever you are, when you call we want to be able to say YES!! We also want to be able to share the education and information within our communities and wherever else we are called to serve.


2. TOOL REPAIR and UPGRADE: It's time to repair and upgrade our equipment and tools. Items will include a commercial refrigerator,stove, food transportation supplies, and catering supplies. As we are growing and opportunities are arising to serve larger amounts of people we want to be able to serve in fullness. Up until this point we have been churning out the best food for years, with the bare minimum. Now let's churn out the best foods with the right tools.


3. MARKETING and OUTREACH: We want you to know who and where we are. The last bit is for marketing, packaging, research and outreach. Be it our merchandise or our classes, we want to be able to support those initiatives and push them forward so they are available for you. Not only available, but affordable.

If for whatever reason we dont reach our entire goal, do not be discouraged, we will utilize every penny we receive towards our goal, little by little and keep up the momentum and service to our families and community members.


AND WITH GRATITUDE FOR YOU WE HAVE:

$5 -$20: Our Humble Appreciation and Thanks for your support and Contribution.


$25: Our Humble Appreciation and Thanks for your support and Contribution. A Recipe card of one of MaituFoods "Top-Ten" Favorite recipes.


$100: A MaituFoods "Mother". One of our MaituFoods Kombucha scobies, along with a bottle of our Kombucha brew and instructions on how to make your own. Along with a MaituFoods Recipe card.


$200:  MaituFoods "Mother-Load" Bundle. An assortment of our homemade/homegrown tea blends, our MaiutFoods signature Hot Sauce and a Pickled item.


$500: MaituFoods "Come Eat" Class. Receive a 30 minute cooking class video of Maitu making one of our signature dishes/meals.

The Impact

The word Maitu comes from the Kikuyu language of East Africa. It's the word for mother, however the literal translation is Maa( truth) itu (our) "our truth". As an entity MaituFoods is one part of the Grow Where You Are family, a collective  working together to establish a local food abundance system and economy. Moreover, we are re-establishing and maintaining a healthy food culture with respect and reverence to nature and the process of growing and serving food. MaituFoods has a mission to honor food rituals as a real place within the scheme of civilization and good, healthy, nutritious food for families and children is at the forefront of that mission.

MaituFoods along with the other facets of the Grow Where You Are Collective is working to respect our duty to serve the Earth and Humanity utilizing the bounty of Earth and following the blueprint set by Nature of abundance and efficiency. We understand that we are endowed with all that we need to be fulfilled on this planet and Mother Earth provides us with the sustenance. It is a part of our personal mission to not only say it, but express it, share it and show a way to educe this sentiment within communities and a world that often become hopeless in seemingly dire situations. Healthy, viable, functioning communities are not only a possibility but the highest potential. Working together we can achieve that goal and the conversation starts at the kitchen table.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    You want to help, but may not be able to do it financially? No problem, there are a number of ways to help in this cause, one of the first is to get the word out. Share with your friends, co-workers, social media followers, wherever and whoever you can think of. Help us spread the word about what MaituFoods is doing, and don't forget Indiegogo has awesome share tools to help spread the message as well. Also if you are in the Atlanta area, come out to our farm, The Good Shepherd AgroEcology Center and markets to see just what we are doing and how you can be a part of it. 

    As Always From Our Kitchen To Your Table. MaituFoods...Come Eat!!!
story_txt:
MaituFoods is a community based Vegan Meal provider. We provide meals for our clients who include community members and families with special dietary needs. We have special food programs and packages for pregnant and postpartum mothers and their families as well as programs catered towards children. We also extend our work to serve other facets of the community be it through food demonstrations, catering, community events, etc. 



This campaign is to help us extend our reach and increase our ability to serve our community in a viable, sustainable way. For the last 6 years since MaituFoods was established we have been running our Food service by any means using the bare minimum. In that time period we have been able to overcome a number of hurdles and obstacles to make sure that we stayed consistent with our duty and service to our community to provide fresh, local, healthy food and education. We feel the time has come to solidify our mission and secure ourselves within our community as a reliable, continuous resource for their nutritional needs, in an environment and community that offers little to no aid in that arena. Through your contributions, it will help to keep MaituFoods as an affordable and tangible resource within our community and wherever else we are called to serve.   What We Need & What You Get
So we are calling on you, to pool your resources for a total of $6,000. With that $6,000 we can get some great headway in areas that will push MaituFoods forward to the next level of service.
1. CERTIFICATION and LICENSING: We want to make sure MaituFoods has all the certifications, licensing and education we need to bring our food to your table through local markets, stores, etc. Wherever you are, when you call we want to be able to say YES!! We also want to be able to share the education and information within our communities and wherever else we are called to serve.

2. TOOL REPAIR and UPGRADE: It's time to repair and upgrade our equipment and tools. Items will include a commercial refrigerator,stove, food transportation supplies, and catering supplies. As we are growing and opportunities are arising to serve larger amounts of people we want to be able to serve in fullness. Up until this point we have been churning out the best food for years, with the bare minimum. Now let's churn out the best foods with the right tools.

3. MARKETING and OUTREACH: We want you to know who and where we are. The last bit is for marketing, packaging, research and outreach. Be it our merchandise or our classes, we want to be able to support those initiatives and push them forward so they are available for you. Not only available, but affordable.
If for whatever reason we dont reach our entire goal, do not be discouraged, we will utilize every penny we receive towards our goal, little by little and keep up the momentum and service to our families and community members.

AND WITH GRATITUDE FOR YOU WE HAVE:
$5 -$20: Our Humble Appreciation and Thanks for your support and Contribution.

$25: Our Humble Appreciation and Thanks for your support and Contribution. A Recipe card of one of MaituFoods "Top-Ten" Favorite recipes.

$100: A MaituFoods "Mother". One of our MaituFoods Kombucha scobies, along with a bottle of our Kombucha brew and instructions on how to make your own. Along with a MaituFoods Recipe card.

$200:  MaituFoods "Mother-Load" Bundle. An assortment of our homemade/homegrown tea blends, our MaiutFoods signature Hot Sauce and a Pickled item.

$500: MaituFoods "Come Eat" Class. Receive a 30 minute cooking class video of Maitu making one of our signature dishes/meals.

Share with your friends, co-workers, social media followers, wherever and whoever you can think of. Help us spread the word about what MaituFoods is doing, and don't forget Indiegogo has awesome share tools to help spread the message as well. story:
She-Z-Mirror is a smart-mirror that analyzes a user’s skin condition and providing a solution by connecting to a real-time expert with the results.

Not only analyzes the skin condition, but combines a security camera function for a single family, the ability to check the daily life of pets, a Bluetooth speaker, and a light therapy function.

We combined the mirror with ICT to make a next-generation smart mirror that brings new life.

SheZmirror will transform your daily life to a place that is at a higher level.

 
 

1) Complexion Analysis 

 
  • The results of the user face taken via the front-facing camera of the mirror are analyzed by the brightening, wrinkle, freckle, and pimple indexes.
  • Records and graphs daily, weekly, and monthly comments on when your skin is at its best and worst to show the best lifestyle pattern, eating habits, etc. for your skin. 
  • You can check the degree of change in your skin through the measurement data statistics. 
  • A different solution depending on analysis results is provided (recommended cosmetics, skin care videos/skin care clinic recommendations (ver. II) 

 

2) Security Camera 

 
  • Automatically set to start filming video surveillance.
  • Automatic emergency notification texts sent out to pre-registered contacts.  
  • Real-time streaming can be enabled when in the “out” mode.
  • Check your pet’s daily routine.

 

3) Bluetooth Speaker

 
  • Bluetooth pairing with smart devices makes it easy to enjoy music at any time. 
  • Can automatically pair your smartphone to She-Z-Mirror when you return home without any manual reconnecting.  
  • You can enjoy music while putting on makeup with the sound-rich Bluetooth speaker mounted on the mirror.
  • The speakers on the back of the mirror allow you to enjoy well-balanced music with a high-power sound.

 

4) LED Light 

  • The Lithium polymer battery boasts excellent battery efficiency.
  • A simple design of LED lights illuminates the mirror for applying makeup. 
  • The LED lights' brightness can be adjusted for general purposes.
  • Create the desired atmosphere with the mood lamp that has various colours and adjustable brightness.
  • Can be used with a soft mood lamp and bright makeup light.

 

 
We are not working long periods of time to keep from failing, we are working long periods of time to move forward and succeed.
 

 

SheZmirror App has been tested and will be released first. 

  1. Facial Recognition: User recognition and skin-scanning.  
  2. Analysis and Management: Analysis of user's skin condition (skin health, ageing, spot, wrinkle and others) through the module connected to the camera.  
  3. Proposal of Management and Solution: To propose management and solution corresponding to information by forwarding the analytical results to mobile applications. (recommendations about improvement programs, related videos, products, and clinics)  
  4. Construction and Sharing DB: To motivate users to use the product by statistically providing daily, weekly and monthly information on skin condition and Social Networks share function.

 

 

"Only if the Mirror I Have Been Dreaming Of Could Be Created. Woman Would Be Staring At Themselves Everyday!" 

My daughter told me that if this mirror really makes it to the marketplace, worldwide, then so many women will not take their eyes off of it. So, I kept repeating the word 'She-Z-Mirra' and we decided to name it " She-Z-Mirror", "She-Z-M".

 
I went on a lot of business trips while it was only me and my daughter living together. I thought to myself, it would be nice if there was something that would alert me with a text message if my daughter screamed. That's why I added this feature that makes the siren go off. I set the siren to go off when my daughter screams. 
 

I believe this small mirror can protect my family.  

  • Bosung Kim, Magic Nanny CEO, Inventor

 

 

 

 
The purpose of this project is not only for sales.
It is to see what reaction it brings. 
 
We were curious to see how many people would respond to this.
 
So instead of having the goal of persuasion, we wanted to convey the feeling of watching a drama. Therefore, the goal of this project is to see if we could get a reaction from them.
 
 
 

 

We went to Tim Horton's, a coffee shop in Toronto near York University that many students go to, and test our product on them.

Everyone was amazed at the unique experience and showed much interest. We were able to get feedback on the product from Vanessa Huynh, York University student.

 

 

Countless challenges and failures produce much know-how

SZM Inc. is an ICT specialized business located in Toronto, Ontario in Canada.

We would like to greet you with our know-how learned from failures because an experience of failure is the more important asset than the success story.

We have a reach experience in R&D with 8 years in Korea and 12 years in North America & China. We also have our own know-how learned from much trial and error in various fields ranging from the manufacture of aesthetic devices to development of ICT (Information & Communications Technology) products combined with office equipment and manufacture of automotive parts. However, we have never ended in failure.

From now on, we will put our own know-how learned from failures into ICT convergence products under development.

 

Every time we attend an event, we try to share new information and analyze the trends.

 

Would you like to see the future product we created?

We were born to accomplish something remarkable. We would like to do our best job in our best field. We aim to become the top in the field we are good at and enjoy. Well known for our good process strategy, we combine Internet expertise, innovative talent, and business know-how to our assist clients across various industries achieve rapid, measurable online marketing results.

Why You Can Trust Us: Hardware development, production and distribution are tough, but we are well placed to deliver on our promise. Below are some of the concerns we’ve identified, with our action plan to secure success.  

Manufacturing: We have already contracted an established manufacturing company in South Korea, which is capable of producing our product to the time frames we have set. The facility has extensive experience in manufacturing IoT products and has been thoroughly vetted by our internal team and external advisors. 

Investment: We have already signed deals with local investors who have made financial commitments to Magic Nanny and are helping us connect with strategic partners and future clients. 

Strategic Partners: We are currently in discussions with a number of world-renowned cosmetics manufacturers in Canada & South Korea. They are providing strategic support and will offer powerful global marketing assistance once we begin full production. Once final details of partnerships are confirmed, we will update.

 

 

1. How do the functions below work? Also, is this information accurate and reliable?

  • Condition of Skin:

The Magic Nanny algorithm uses the k NN algorithm and artificial intelligence analysis to analyze the degree of wrinkles, skin complexion, freckles, and blemish index. The accuracy has been tested by an accredited testing agency, and operates with a 90% accuracy range and 10% error range.

  • Cosmetics Recommendations:

There is a recommendation algorithm that automatically analyzes the latest user’s preferred order depending on their skin complexion index. Users will receive automatic daily cosmetic recommendations best for their skin index and can be used to aid in selecting products.

2. How long is the warranty valid?

The warranty is valid for up to six months after purchase. You can receive service at any time during the warranty period at the AS Center.

3. Is it possible to manufacture a limited-edition design?

We are ready to cooperate, so you may discuss the quantity and method in a consultation with a Toronto representative.

4. How much does it take for the streaming function to work? (Does it not work?)

  • D: 120 Degrees (Diagonal)
  • H: 85 Degrees (Squared Angle)
  • V: 62 (Perpendicular)

The purpose of the above angle for the security camera is based on the optimal angle for skin analysis.

  • Is there any limitation in camera use if the angle is narrow?

In the case of home CCTVs, it is common for devices to be fixed in place, and we chose this angle for analysis and real-time videos.

  • If the angle is narrow, then you probably have to keep moving it from when you put on makeup and when you go out.

The camera for analysis is mounted on the center of the mirror. The user can put it in a convenient place, such as a vanity, bathroom, or desk, to use. The angle can be adjusted freely, allowing the user to adjust the angle to their optimum angle. Additionally, SheZmirror is designed to be detachable and portable so that it can be carried in a purse.

5. How loud are the speakers?

There are two 3w speakers. Volume is important when having a barbeque party outdoors or have a house party.

6. Once you connect the Bluetooth, will it automatically connect afterwards?

Yes, once you connect for the first time, it will automatically pair from then on. (Although it is simple to do, it will be a hassle to continue to reconnect after an outing or some time has passed.)

7. Is there a notification when the skin analyzing is ready?

Yes, you will get a notification through your mobile device. However, you can check the result on the mirror as well. You can get additional information through application

8. Do they come in different colours?

There are black, pink and white.

9. Can you use the camera's real-time functions no matter how far away you are? (Security camera function)

As long as you have wi-fi, you can observe your home from wherever you are. If you do not have wi-fi, you can use data for this function. As long as you are in a wi-fi zone, you can observe your home from wherever you are. If you are not in a wi-fi zone, you can use data for this function.

10. How long does it take to fully charge, and how long does the battery last?

It takes about 40 minutes to an hour, and it can be used for approximately 4 hours, depending on the situation.

11. Will the LED hurt my eyes from being too bright?

The LED is 2,000LM ±50LM. This is the brightest setting and has 4 adjustable settings.

12. Where will my SheZmirror ship from?

All orders will ship from Toronto, Canada, Los Angeles, United States & Busan, South Korea.

13.  When can I expect my order to arrive?

All orders will begin to ship in September, 2018. Shipping within USA or Canada should take 3-5 business days from the date of shipment and international orders should take around 1-3 weeks.  

 

We have prepared a special event. While upgrading the current version for next year, we created a new prototype, but it is not yet at the stage where it can be mass-produced. (It is adjustable 360 degrees up and down with speakers and a camera built in.)

However, if you all join us actively, we will be able to make this prototype.

If we raise more than $100,000, we will upgrade to this version at no additional cost.

 

The fruits of our efforts over the last two years are before our eyes.

There were many trials and errors, but our efforts came through in the end. Now we can reap its sweet fruit. We will finally disclose the processes we have gone through.

The time is very close.

Here are our Facebook and Instagram. Please follow us and share the fruit with us.


We are different from others. We pursue a different approach than others.

We like to try very different things. Therefore, we want to try something completely opposite from what we have done so far.

Ultimately the bottom line is creativity. The judgment is up to you.


We are proud to finally show the project that we have worked so hard on.

Learning from countless failures, we developed our very own, one-of-a-kind recording mirror.

Using the technology of smart mirrors that focus on fashion and beauty, this mirror has implemented home security in its IT functions for the added benefit of personal safety. With this product, anyone will be able to enjoy basic home security and contribute to crime prevention.

Though we are not very well-known, we came this far on our project without making great marketing expenditures, and we now ask for your help.

Please support our team as we advance further into our pioneering projects.

  • Allen Chung, ALC21 Inc. Founder & CEO

 

When developing something completely new, unforeseen circumstances can arise. We are confident that we have made all preparations to follow-up on our promises. With a working prototype developed and testing completed, we are prepared to enter the mass production stage. To facilitate mass production, we are currently simplifying the design and assembly processes. Manufacturing will be done in South Korea so we can ensure quality control of the products, despite increased cost. Should there be any changes in our schedule, we will immediately pass this information along to you.

Our software has been robustly tested on several prototypes. We’ve overcome the most critical technical challenges and are about to start transforming our code into production-grade software. Once done and tested, we plan to make a pilot run of several hundred units for beta testing and fixing bugs.

Once done and tested, we plan to make a pilot run of several hundred units for beta testing and fixing bugs.

story:
Please help me take my invention to market.

                     

                            "The Genie"

      Toilet Seat Sanitizing Wipe & Dispenser.


The loaded anti-bacterial sanitizing toilet wipe dispenser located or affixed above/beside the toilet paper.


Most washroom users are weary of dirty toilet seats and poor toilet hygiene for good reason; tiny droplets of water spray up from the bowl after flushing and land on the toilet seat and other surfaces in the cubicle.


These droplets can contain infection-spreading bacteria such as E coli and can be found some distance from the toilet for up to half an hour after flushing. This is called the ‘sneeze’ effect.


The Genie toilet wipes offers a toilet seat cleaning solution that provides an anti-bacterial reloadable toilet wipe dispenser that is installed in every rest rooms.


This toilet seat cleaner is safe to use and dries quickly on the toilet seat to provide “peace of mind” to the user. The toilet seat sanitizer wipe has active anti-bacterial agents that neutralize the spread of the bacterial infection.


The Genie Toilet Seat Sanitizer Dispensers are positioned in an accessible location near the toilet paper. Simply pull and wipe with an anti-bacterial solution. Wipe down the toilet seat and drop the wipe into the toilet. The seat will be clean, sanitized and ready to use.


Anti-bacterial products is used extensively in the hospital system to neutralize the spread of infection.  The Genie Toilet Seat Sanitizer Wipes are looking after your health and well being.

story:
Hear from our founders, Erin & Adiya.

         

      

 

Everyone has experienced the pain of arranging a room only to find that the outlet you want to use is in the wrong spot.  Switchflip lets you control multiple outlets with your existing switch.  

Switchflip™ is simple to setup (no wiring or installation).  You can connect multiple switchflip receivers and control multiple outlets with a single switch.  We made switchflip compatible with the way you live. You don't walk into a room and pull out your phone to find the lights, you use the wall switch.  There is no app to download and switchflip will save you hundreds of dollars vs paying an electrician to rewire your outlets.  Simple is smart and switchflip is the simplest solution for a smart home.

Featured On

              

 

                  

Plug the transmitter into your switch-controlled outlet

 

Plug the receiver into any other outlet 

 

Use the existing wall switch and control your lights, fans, or other devices

When you flip the wall switch on, the switchflip transmitter sends a wireless signal to all receivers connected to it telling them to turn on as well. The transmitter will also continuously send signals to the receivers making sure the receivers know that power is still on. When you flip the wall switch off, the switchflip transmitter sends a wireless signal to the receivers telling them all to turn off.

Simple Setup

Setting up switchflip is easy.  Simply plug the transmitter into the outlet controlled by the wall switch and plug the receiver into any other outlet. That’s It!  No smart phone, No additional switches, No rewiring, and No WiFi required.  With a range of up to 100 ft, you can even control lights in other rooms which is perfect for brightening up your home at night for security and peace of mind.

It works right out of the box. Plus you can still use the original outlet controlled by the wall switch too! With switchflip, your existing outlet controlled by the light switch can control any outlet in your room.

 

Control Multiple Outlets

And if you want to connect additional receivers to your switchflip transmitter, that's easy too! Just buy an additional receiver, plug the receiver into whichever transmitter you want it connected to, plug that transmitter into the wall and you're done. Now that transmitter controls that receiver too. Take the receiver and put it anywhere in your house or apartment. Again, no complicated setup or connecting to your phone. Everything with switchflip was designed to make it as easy as possible to arrange a room the way you want.

               

According to the International Association of Certified Home Inspectors, habitable rooms should have at least one wall switch-controlled lighting outlet. 

 

 

What's Inside:

Switchflip uses patent-pending technology to help you arrange any room the way you want. Every box comes with one transmitter and one receiver.  When we ship you switchflip, the two devices are already paired. Just open the box, plug the transmitter into the outlet that is currently controlled by the wall switch, plug the receiver into any other outlet in your house or apartment and you're done. It's that simple. Now both outlets will act like switch-controlled outlets.                    

            

Switchflip can be used in any room at home or at the office.  Switchflip works with 120 volt outlets with a 2-prong appliance such as a lamp, fan, LED light string, and many other electronics that can be conveniently turned on when you walk into a room. With switchflip, there is no need for a smartphone or app, no rewiring, and you can finally get rid of the ugly extension cords.  

 

You Asked, We Listened

 

Before we began making switchflip 2 years ago, we started by looking for something that could change around our power outlets while still using the existing wall switch.  We found tons of people like us asking for the same thing, with no solution to be found.  So we made switchflip! 

Check out a few quotes from people that were looking for switchflip:

By supporting our campaign, you will be the first to receive switchflip and we are making a large percentage of our first shipment available at a super low price.   Click one of the perks on the right to back our campaign.

 

 

 

We have all experienced the pain of arranging a room only to finish and realize that the outlet where you want to put your favorite lamp isn’t controlled by a light switch because it’s stuck behind the bed or on the other side of the room. This is what happened to me, and I knew I needed an affordable solution to this problem.

I came up with the idea for switchflip during a five hour drive from Columbus, OH to Buffalo, NY. My wife and I, along with our two kids, had recently moved into our very first house, and we were in the midst of trying to decorate and arrange our bedroom. I discovered that the light switch when you entered the bedroom only controlled the outlet on my side of the bed. While I was driving, I started wondering what I could do to have outlets on both sides of the bed controlled by the same switch. I didn't really want to tear up the room to rewire it, and I already spend too much time on my phone so didn't want a smart home system for this little problem.

So I spent the car ride thinking about how to solve the problem. That's how I came up with switchflip. And then, after I came up with the idea, I remembered how every apartment I had in New York had that room, or rooms, where the wall switch was useless because it controlled the wrong outlet. You'd have to stumble your way into the room and find the lamp. It was at that point that I realized switchflip could really help a lot of people and I decided I needed to build it. 

 

 

Our goal was to make a device that would be an easy and affordable solution to controlling power outlets.  We learned that this did not exist, so we spent the last 2 years developing http://www.appliedxp.com/switchflip in Columbus, Ohio.   We are finally ready to begin manufacturing.  Switchflip has completed design for manufacture, which means that we are almost ready to hand off our designs to the production company.  We partnered with two local businesses in Columbus, Ohio to help us develop this innovative product.  We are coming to Indiegogo now that development is complete.    

 

 

               

 

We have overcome many of the risks associated with developing a consumer electronics device before coming to Indiegogo.  With any crowdfunding campaign, we do have potential risks and challenges that we want you to know about.  If we reach our goal, we will be able to proceed with manufacturing and deliver switchflip according to our timeline.  

Our commitment to you is that we will communicate frequently with you and share all aspects of our final stages of manufacturing.  If there are any unforeseen delays or challenges, we will communicate that to you, our indiegogo supporters, first.

If you have any questions, please send us a message on Indiegogo or email us.  You can also submit your questions on our website: www.switchflip.me

 

Shipping Timelines

There is a risk of delay due to changes in timelines for shipping.  This includes the parts that are included in switchflip for manufacturing as well as the final shipping of switchflip to you.  Shipping delays can be caused by weather as well as work stoppage.  

Parts Availability

If the quantity of parts that we need to manufacture switchflip should increase beyond the capacity of our current suppliers, there is a risk of delay.  If we have an issue with parts availability, we will notify our backers to inform you of the delay.

Regulatory Approval

Switchflip has not yet received clearance from the Federal Communications Commission (FCC). We will be doing that soon and don't anticipate any delays. If we do have a delay, however, we will notify our backers as soon as possible and update you on a revised timeline.

 

Designed in

story:
Fresh sheets can lead to better sleep but changing them is such a chore. It’s no surprise changing the sheets is often delayed! Koa’s inventive central opening and zips make changing the bed easier in 3 simple steps.

 

 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

We’ve lined up partners who share our commitment to social and sustainable values and developed a product that’s made to last. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

In addition to the essential designs, we’ve partnered with British artist Kitty McCall to create two exclusive Koa patterns, Landscape and Fragment.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Duvet Cover Perks

 

Bedding Set Perks

 

Duvet Cover Sizes 

 

 

Looking for a different size? Send us a comment or message. If there's enough interest we'll add additional sizes.

 

 

 

 

After 2 years of testing, product development and sourcing of the finest production partners in Portugal, we’re ready to press go on the production process.

 

 

 

 

 

We launched Koa to solve overlooked everyday problems through inventive design and bring years of experience creating innovative products for people all around the world, including working together at homewares brand Joseph Joseph.

Luke’s Grandma stopped changing the duvet cover because it was too difficult, which inspired us to find a solution. We’ve made over 30 prototypes and spent months testing Koa covers, to create a duvet cover that’s comfy, soft and easy to change for everyone, including Luke’s Grandma.

 

 

 

 

“I am extremely proud of the drive and determination of the Koa Team to make life better by design. The Koa duvet cover is a delightful and beautiful solution to a previously overlooked problem.” - Design Council’s Chief Executive, Sarah Weir OBE

Simpler, easier and quicker. See below the Koa Cover VS Standard Duvet Cover.


 
 
 

 
The Koa cover isn't just easier, it's also much quicker. Check out Ben changing the Koa Cover in world record time without even breaking a sweat

 
      
 
 
 
 
 
Patent pending:1914272.8
Koa’s zipper has been specifically designed to be so soft that you won’t even notice it’s there, and the extra fabric flap discreetly hides the zipper so you won’t see it either. We've also designed a fabric zipper pull that's soft, reliable and easy to use.

story:
In the Land of Dragons everyday life is relaxing and care-free, the dragons are content as they go about their day never hungry, thirsty or ill. But there was something missing in the amazing Land of Dragons and that something was a little thing called parties. 

   You see, for all of the wonderful things dragons could do, they are terrible at throwing parties. Actually they are so bad at it that centuries ago the Dragon Investigative Council of Knowledge (DICK) decided that parties would be banned in the Land of Dragons. 

  Well one day a red & black dragon came across a tear in the space-time-fiction-non-fiction continuum and on the other side it saw amazing parties taking place. The tear was closing so the dragon had to act fast but if it went through it may never see it's friends and family again. The decision was so great the dragon froze, just as the tear was about to close the dragon saw two human females wrestling in a pool of lube and in a blink of an eye the dragon flew through. The dragon was flying so fast that when it emerged it couldn't stop in time and it accidentally crashed into the pool of lube. Because the dragon was small no one was hurt, actually no one even noticed the dragon was there. The dragon climbed out of the pool, shook off the lube, watched some more of the wrestling and then explored the rest of the party. 

It found that there were multiple parties throughout the place. There was yummy food to eat, delicious drinks to drink, great music and fun people. The dragon eventually made it's way back to the first party and as it was enjoying an alcoholic gummi worm a tall human saw the dragon. 

"Hello there little friend, my name is Cajun. Are you having a good time at con?"

The dragon had so many questions like what is a "con", why were many of the humans wearing costumes and why were there so many great parties in one place, just to name a few, so Cajun answered all of its questions. After the convention weekend Cajun asked Kevin, Leif, Charlie and Brad if they could figure out a way to send the dragon home. After much drinking and other things to get their creative juices going they came up with... nothing. 

   So we invited the little Dragon to join Dethcon and we are very happy that it agreed to join BUT the dragon's name is impossible to pronounce by humans, elves, dwarves, orcs, gelflings or any other 2 legged intelligent/somewhat intelligent species. So whether your name is Obi-Wan or not, we need your help to name the dragon.

story:
Baan Unrak

Baan Unrak “Home of Joy”, is a children’s home and community development project in Sangkhlaburi, Kanchanaburi Province, Thailand. The home accommodates and cares for more than 150 children that are orphaned (often from parents suffering from illnesses related to HIV and AIDS), sick and poverty stricken, many of whom are refugees fleeing persecution in Burma. Every day we aim to give these forgotten border children a safe and healthy future.


The Project

In a place where sunshine is plentiful, but reliable, clean and safe water is not, there is one very simple solution. 

Harnessing the natural energy of sunlight to generate power and provide running water is certainly not a new concept, yet it will undoubtedly revolutionize the lives and futures of the children here at Baan Unrak. With bountiful sunlight and a huge reservoir on our doorstep, natural resources are plentiful and are waiting to be utilized. To make clean and reliable running water for the children here a reality we will install solar panels at the farm to power the two existing solar pumps which were generously donated and kindly received.

Our home in Sangkhlaburi is stationed on a hill; a large reservoir is situated at the foot of the hill.  The reservoir is potentially a healthy source of water for our home.  However, since our home is situated at a height above the reservoir, water has to be pumped upwards, which has always been a challenge given the unstable electricity supply that we receive from the grid.  As our home is located within a natural surrounding that receives sufficient sunlight all year round, solar-powered water pumps running on electricity generated by solar panels provide a means to receive a steady supply of water from the reservoir. The water will be transported from the reservoir to the house through a series of pipes and be stored in a water pond which will be able to store 50,000 liters of water. The operation of solar powered pumps is also more economical mainly due to the lower operation and maintenance costs, and they have a lesser impact on the environment.

To be able to implement this efficient, cost effective and environmentally sound system we need:

40x 280w solar panels (12,000 THB or $365 each)

The benefits of this system go beyond simple running water for the children to drink. Clean, running water will improve sanitation and hygiene, preventing sickness and giving the children a clean and safe environment in which to live and thrive. Extra labour to collect the water will be reduced, saving valuable time and resources leaving more available for essentials such as food and education.

For children who have come from some of the most uncertain pasts, turning on a tap and being sure that water will flow would bring emotional and practical stability. Reliable water is a building block to a safe and secure future. Whether your donation buys a whole panel or just part, you will be helping to bring certainty, stability, water and light to many children who began their lives in uncertainty and darkness.

The natural resources are ready, and so are we. Now we just need you to help us harness it. Don’t wait until tomorrow because Here Comes the Sun.


Other Ways You Can Help...


Donate Via PayPal:

Account name: baanunrak@gmail.com

 

Or Donate Directly:

Name: Baanunrak Childrens Home

Bank name: Siam Commercial Bank Sangkhlaburi

Account no: 679-214-7928

SWIFT code: SICOTHBK


If you cannot support our appeal yourself, do the next best thing. Why not run a cake sale or school fete? Holding your own event in your community could make all the difference.

Then, tell everyone that you know about "Baan Unrak's Here Comes The Sun Appeal" and encourage them to support us too!

Finally - Forward, Post, Like, Share, Add, Tag and Send!

All of our social media links are below.

 benefits of this system go beyond simple running water for the children
 to drink. Clean, running water will improve sanitation and hygiene, 
preventing sickness and giving the children a clean and safe environment
 in which to live and thrive. Extra labour to collect the water will be 
reduced, saving valuable time and resources leaving more available for 
essentials such as food and education.
For
 children who have come from some of the most uncertain pasts, turning 
on a tap and being sure that water will flow would bring emotional and 
practical stability. Reliable water is a building block to a safe and 
secure future. Whether your donation buys a whole panel or just part, 
you will be helping to bring certainty, stability, water and light to 
many children who began their lives in uncertainty and darkness.
The
 natural resources are ready, and so are we. Now we just need you to 
help us harness it. Don’t wait until tomorrow because Here Comes the 
Sun.
